column3: Johannes 21:14 Dit was al die derde keer dat Jesus aan sy dissipels verskyn het nadat Hy opgestaan het uit die dode.

column2: John 21:15 So when they had dined, Jesus saith to Simon Peter, Simon, [son] of Jonas, lovest thou me more than these? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my lambs.
column3: Johannes 21:15 Toe hulle dan klaar was met die môre-ete, vra Jesus vir Simon Petrus: Simon, seun van Jona, het jy My waarlik lief, meer as hulle hier? Hy antwoord Hom: Ja, Here, U weet dat ek U liefhet. Hy sê vir hom: Laat my lammers wei.

column2: John 21:16 He saith to him again the second time, Simon, [son] of Jonas, lovest thou me? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my sheep.
column3: Johannes 21:16 Hy vra hom weer die tweede maal: Simon, seun van Jona, het jy My waarlik lief? Hy antwoord Hom: Ja, Here, U weet dat ek U liefhet. Hy sê vir hom: Pas my skape op.

column2: John 21:17 He saith unto him the third time, Simon, [son] of Jonas, lovest thou me? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time, Lovest thou me? And he said unto him, Lord, thou knowest all things; thou knowest that I love thee. Jesus saith unto him, Feed my sheep.
column3: Johannes 21:17 Hy vra hom die derde maal: Simon, seun van Jona, het jy My lief? Petrus het bedroef geword, omdat Hy hom die derde maal vra: Het jy My lief? En hy antwoord Hom: Here, U weet alles, U weet dat ek U liefhet. Jesus sê vir hom: Laat my skape wei.

column2: John 21:18 Verily, verily, I say unto thee, When thou wast young, thou girdedst thyself, and walkedst whither thou wouldest: but when thou shalt be old, thou shalt stretch forth thy hands, and another shall gird thee, and carry [thee] whither thou wouldest not.
column3: Johannes 21:18 Voorwaar, voorwaar Ek sê vir jou, toe jy jonger was, het jy jouself gegord en rondgegaan waar jy wou; maar wanneer jy oud geword het, sal jy jou hande uitsteek, en ’n ander een sal jou gord en bring waar jy nie wil wees nie.

column2: John 21:19 This spake he, signifying by what death he should glorify God. And when he had spoken this, he saith unto him, Follow me.
column3: Johannes 21:19 En dit het Hy gesê om aan te dui deur hoedanige dood hy God sou verheerlik; en toe Hy dit gespreek het, sê Hy vir hom: Volg My.

column2: John 21:20 Then Peter, turning about, seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following; which also leaned on his breast at supper, and said, Lord, which is he that betrayeth thee?
column3: Johannes 21:20 En Petrus het hom omgedraai en die dissipel sien volg vir wie Jesus liefgehad het, die een wat by die maaltyd op sy bors geval en gesê het: Here, wie is u verraaier?

column2: John 21:21 Peter seeing him saith to Jesus, Lord, and what [shall] this man [do]?
column3: Johannes 21:21 Toe Petrus hom sien, vra hy vir Jesus: Here, maar wat van hom?

column2: John 21:22 Jesus saith unto him, If I will that he tarry till I come, what [is that] to thee? follow thou me.
column3: Johannes 21:22 Jesus antwoord hom: As Ek wil hê dat hy bly totdat Ek kom, wat gaan dit jou aan? Volg jy My.

column2: John 21:23 Then went this saying abroad among the brethren, that that disciple should not die: yet Jesus said not unto him, He shall not die; but, If I will that he tarry till I come, what [is that] to thee?
column3: Johannes 21:23 Hierdie woord het toe onder die broeders uitgegaan dat daardie dissipel nie sou sterwe nie; en Jesus het nie vir hom gesê dat hy nie sou sterwe nie, maar: As Ek wil hê dat hy bly totdat Ek kom, wat gaan dit jou aan?

column2: John 21:24 This is the disciple which testifieth of these things, and wrote these things: and we know that his testimony is true.
column3: Johannes 21:24 Dit is daardie dissipel wat van hierdie dinge getuig en hierdie dinge geskryf het, en ons weet dat sy getuienis waar is.

column2: John 21:25 And there are also many other things which Jesus did, the which, if they should be written every one, I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written. Amen.
column3: Johannes 21:25 En daar is nog baie ander dinge wat Jesus alles gedoen het; maar as hulle een vir een beskrywe moes word, sou die wêreld self, dink ek, die geskrewe boeke nie bevat nie. Amen.

column2: Acts 1:1 The former treatise have I made, O Theophilus, of all that Jesus began both to do and teach,
column3: Handelinge 1:1 DIE eerste verhaal, Theófilus, het ek opgestel oor alles wat Jesus begin doen en leer het

column2: Acts 1:2 Until the day in which he was taken up, after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen:
column3: Handelinge 1:2 tot op die dag dat Hy opgeneem is, nadat Hy aan die apostels wat Hy uitverkies het, deur die Heilige Gees bevele gegee het;

column2: Acts 1:3 To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs, being seen of them forty days, and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God:
column3: Handelinge 1:3 aan wie Hy ook, ná sy lyde, Hom lewend vertoon het deur baie kentekens, terwyl Hy gedurende veertig dae aan hulle verskyn het en oor die dinge van die koninkryk van God gespreek het.

column2: Acts 1:4 And, being assembled together with [them], commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem, but wait for the promise of the Father, which, [saith he], ye have heard of me.
column3: Handelinge 1:4 En toe Hy nog met hulle saam was, het Hy hulle bevel gegee om nie van Jerusalem weg te gaan nie, maar om te wag op die belofte van die Vader, wat julle, het Hy gesê, van My gehoor het.

column2: Acts 1:5 For John truly baptized with water; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence.
column3: Handelinge 1:5 Want Johannes het wel met water gedoop, maar julle sal met die Heilige Gees gedoop word nie lank ná hierdie dae nie.

column2: Acts 1:6 When they therefore were come together, they asked of him, saying, Lord, wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel?
column3: Handelinge 1:6 Die wat bymekaargekom het, vra Hom toe en sê: Here, gaan U in hierdie tyd die koninkryk vir Israel weer oprig?

column2: Acts 1:7 And he said unto them, It is not for you to know the times or the seasons, which the Father hath put in his own power.
column3: Handelinge 1:7 En Hy antwoord hulle: Dit kom julle nie toe om die tye of geleenthede te weet wat die Vader deur sy eie mag bepaal het nie;

column2: Acts 1:8 But ye shall receive power, after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem, and in all Judaea, and in Samaria, and unto the uttermost part of the earth.
column3: Handelinge 1:8 maar julle sal krag ontvang wanneer die Heilige Gees oor julle kom, en julle sal my getuies wees in Jerusalem sowel as in die hele Judéa en Samaría en tot aan die uiterste van die aarde.

column2: Acts 1:9 And when he had spoken these things, while they beheld, he was taken up; and a cloud received him out of their sight.
column3: Handelinge 1:9 En nadat Hy dit gesê het, is Hy opgeneem terwyl hulle dit sien; en ’n wolk het Hom voor hulle oë weggeneem.

column2: Acts 1:10 And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel;
column3: Handelinge 1:10 En toe hulle nog stip na die hemel kyk terwyl Hy weggaan, staan daar twee manne in wit klere by hulle,

column2: Acts 1:11 Which also said, Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.
column3: Handelinge 1:11 wat sê: Galilése manne, waarom staan julle en kyk na die hemel? Hierdie Jesus wat van julle opgeneem is in die hemel, sal net so kom soos julle Hom na die hemel sien wegvaar het.

column2: Acts 1:12 Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet, which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day's journey.
column3: Handelinge 1:12 Daarop draai hulle om na Jerusalem van die berg af wat genoem word Olyfberg, wat naby Jerusalem is, ’n sabbatsreis ver.

column2: Acts 1:13 And when they were come in, they went up into an upper room, where abode both Peter, and James, and John, and Andrew, Philip, and Thomas, Bartholomew, and Matthew, James [the son] of Alphaeus, and Simon Zelotes, and Judas [the brother] of James.
column3: Handelinge 1:13 En toe hulle daar kom, gaan hulle na die bovertrek waar hulle gewoond was om te vertoef, naamlik: Petrus en Jakobus en Johannes en Andréas, Filippus en Thomas, Bartholoméüs en Matthéüs, Jakobus, die seun van Alféüs, en Simon, die Yweraar, en Judas, die seun van Jakobus.

column2: Acts 1:14 These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication, with the women, and Mary the mother of Jesus, and with his brethren.
column3: Handelinge 1:14 Hulle almal het eendragtig volhard in gebed en smeking, saam met ’n aantal vroue en Maria, die moeder van Jesus, en met sy broers.

column2: Acts 1:15 And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples, and said, (the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty,)
column3: Handelinge 1:15 EN in dié dae het Petrus in die midde van die dissipels opgestaan — die skare van persone daar bymekaar was omtrent honderd-en-twintig — en gesê:

column2: Acts 1:16 Men [and] brethren, this scripture must needs have been fulfilled, which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas, which was guide to them that took Jesus.
column3: Handelinge 1:16 Broeders, hierdie Skrif moes vervul word wat die Heilige Gees voorspel het deur die mond van Dawid aangaande Judas wat die leier was van die wat Jesus gevange geneem het;

column2: Acts 1:17 For he was numbered with us, and had obtained part of this ministry.
column3: Handelinge 1:17 want hy is saam met ons getal gereken en het die lot van hierdie bediening verkry.

column2: Acts 1:18 Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity; and falling headlong, he burst asunder in the midst, and all his bowels gushed out.
column3: Handelinge 1:18 Hy het dan ’n stuk grond gekoop met die loon van ongeregtigheid en het vooroor geval en oopgebars, en al sy ingewande het uitgestort;

column2: Acts 1:19 And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue, Aceldama, that is to say, The field of blood.
column3: Handelinge 1:19 en dit het bekend geword aan al die inwoners van Jerusalem, sodat daardie stuk grond in hulle eie taal Akeldáma genoem is, dit is Bloedgrond.

column2: Acts 1:20 For it is written in the book of Psalms, Let his habitation be desolate, and let no man dwell therein: and his bishoprick let another take.
column3: Handelinge 1:20 Want daar staan geskrywe in die boek van die Psalms: Laat sy woonplek woes word, en laat daar geen inwoner in wees nie! En: Laat ’n ander een sy opsienersamp neem.

column2: Acts 1:21 Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us,
column3: Handelinge 1:21 Van die manne dan wat saam met ons rondgegaan het al die tyd waarin die Here Jesus by ons in- en uitgegaan het,

column2: Acts 1:22 Beginning from the baptism of John, unto that same day that he was taken up from us, must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection.
column3: Handelinge 1:22 van die doop van Johannes af tot op die dag dat Hy van ons opgeneem is — van hulle moet daar een saam met ons getuie word van sy opstanding.

column2: Acts 1:23 And they appointed two, Joseph called Barsabas, who was surnamed Justus, and Matthias.
column3: Handelinge 1:23 En hulle het twee voorgestel: Josef wat genoem is Bársabas, met die bynaam van Justus, en Matthías.

column2: Acts 1:24 And they prayed, and said, Thou, Lord, which knowest the hearts of all [men], shew whether of these two thou hast chosen,
column3: Handelinge 1:24 En hulle het gebid en gesê: U, Here, wat die harte van almal ken, wys uit hierdie twee die een aan wat U uitverkies het

column2: Acts 1:25 That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship, from which Judas by transgression fell, that he might go to his own place.
column3: Handelinge 1:25 om die lot van hierdie bediening en apostelskap te verkry, waarvan Judas afgewyk het om heen te gaan na sy eie plek.

column2: Acts 1:26 And they gave forth their lots; and the lot fell upon Matthias; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles.
column3: Handelinge 1:26 Toe werp hulle die lot, en die lot het op Matthías geval; en hy is gekies om saam met die elf apostels te wees.

column2: Acts 2:1 And when the day of Pentecost was fully come, they were all with one accord in one place.
column3: Handelinge 2:1 EN toe die dag van die pinksterfees aangebreek het, was hulle almal eendragtig bymekaar.

column2: Acts 2:2 And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind, and it filled all the house where they were sitting.
column3: Handelinge 2:2 En daar kom skielik uit die hemel ’n geluid soos van ’n geweldige rukwind, en dit het die hele huis gevul waar hulle gesit het.

column2: Acts 2:3 And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire, and it sat upon each of them.
column3: Handelinge 2:3 Toe is deur hulle tonge gesien soos van vuur, wat hulleself verdeel en op elkeen van hulle gaan sit.

column2: Acts 2:4 And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and began to speak with other tongues, as the Spirit gave them utterance.
column3: Handelinge 2:4 En hulle is almal vervul met die Heilige Gees en het begin spreek in ander tale, soos die Gees aan hulle gegee het om uit te spreek.

column2: Acts 2:5 And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews, devout men, out of every nation under heaven.
column3: Handelinge 2:5 En daar het in Jerusalem Jode gewoon, godsdienstige manne, uit elke nasie wat onder die hemel is.

column2: Acts 2:6 Now when this was noised abroad, the multitude came together, and were confounded, because that every man heard them speak in his own language.
column3: Handelinge 2:6 En toe hierdie geluid kom, het die menigte saamgestroom en was in die war, want elkeen het gehoor hoe hulle in sy eie taal spreek;

column2: Acts 2:7 And they were all amazed and marvelled, saying one to another, Behold, are not all these which speak Galilaeans?
column3: Handelinge 2:7 en hulle was almal verbaas en verwonderd en sê vir mekaar: Is almal wat daar spreek, dan nie Galiléërs nie?

column2: Acts 2:8 And how hear we every man in our own tongue, wherein we were born?
column3: Handelinge 2:8 En hoe hoor ons hulle, elkeen in ons eie taal waarin ons gebore is?

column2: Acts 2:9 Parthians, and Medes, and Elamites, and the dwellers in Mesopotamia, and in Judaea, and Cappadocia, in Pontus, and Asia,
column3: Handelinge 2:9 Parthers en Meders en Elamiete en die inwoners van Mesopotámië, Judéa en Kappadócië, Pontus en Asië,

column2: Acts 2:10 Phrygia, and Pamphylia, in Egypt, and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene, and strangers of Rome, Jews and proselytes,
column3: Handelinge 2:10 Frígië en Pamfílië, Egipte en die streke van Líbië by Ciréne, en Romeine wat hier vertoef, Jode en Jodegenote,

column2: Acts 2:11 Cretes and Arabians, we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God.
column3: Handelinge 2:11 Kretense en Arabiere — ons hoor hulle in ons eie taal oor die groot dade van God spreek.

column2: Acts 2:12 And they were all amazed, and were in doubt, saying one to another, What meaneth this?
column3: Handelinge 2:12 En hulle was almal verbaas en radeloos en sê die een vir die ander: Wat kan dit tog wees?

column2: Acts 2:13 Others mocking said, These men are full of new wine.
column3: Handelinge 2:13 Maar ander het gespot en gesê: Hulle is vol soetwyn.

column2: Acts 2:14 But Peter, standing up with the eleven, lifted up his voice, and said unto them, Ye men of Judaea, and all [ye] that dwell at Jerusalem, be this known unto you, and hearken to my words:
column3: Handelinge 2:14 MAAR Petrus het opgestaan met die elf en sy stem verhef en hulle toegespreek: Joodse manne en almal wat in Jerusalem woon, dit moet julle weet, en luister na my woorde.

column2: Acts 2:15 For these are not drunken, as ye suppose, seeing it is [but] the third hour of the day.
column3: Handelinge 2:15 Hierdie mense is tog nie dronk soos julle dink nie, want dit is nog maar die derde uur in die môre.

column2: Acts 2:16 But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel;
column3: Handelinge 2:16 Maar dit is wat deur die profeet Joël gespreek is:

column2: Acts 2:17 And it shall come to pass in the last days, saith God, I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh: and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy, and your young men shall see visions, and your old men shall dream dreams:
column3: Handelinge 2:17 En in die laaste dae, spreek God, sal Ek van my Gees uitstort op alle vlees, en julle seuns en julle dogters sal profeteer, en julle jongelinge sal gesigte sien, en julle ou mense sal drome droom.

column2: Acts 2:18 And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit; and they shall prophesy:
column3: Handelinge 2:18 En ook op my diensknegte en diensmaagde sal Ek in dié dae van my Gees uitstort, en hulle sal profeteer.

column2: Acts 2:19 And I will shew wonders in heaven above, and signs in the earth beneath; blood, and fire, and vapour of smoke:
column3: Handelinge 2:19 En Ek sal wonders gee bo in die hemel en tekens onder op die aarde, bloed en vuur en rookdamp.

column2: Acts 2:20 The sun shall be turned into darkness, and the moon into blood, before that great and notable day of the Lord come:
column3: Handelinge 2:20 Die son sal verander in duisternis en die maan in bloed voordat die groot en deurlugtige dag van die Here kom.

column2: Acts 2:21 And it shall come to pass, [that] whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
column3: Handelinge 2:21 En elkeen wat die Naam van die Here aanroep, sal gered word.

column2: Acts 2:22 Ye men of Israel, hear these words; Jesus of Nazareth, a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs, which God did by him in the midst of you, as ye yourselves also know:
column3: Handelinge 2:22 Israeliete, luister na hierdie woorde! Jesus, die Nasaréner, ’n man deur God vir julle aangewys met kragte en wonders en tekens wat God deur Hom onder julle gedoen het, soos julle ook self weet —

column2: Acts 2:23 Him, being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God, ye have taken, and by wicked hands have crucified and slain:
column3: Handelinge 2:23 Hom, wat deur die bepaalde raad en voorkennis van God oorgelewer is, het julle deur die hande van goddelose manne geneem en gekruisig en omgebring;

column2: Acts 2:24 Whom God hath raised up, having loosed the pains of death: because it was not possible that he should be holden of it.
column3: Handelinge 2:24 Hom het God opgewek, nadat Hy die smarte van die dood ontbind het, omdat dit onmoontlik was dat Hy daardeur vasgehou sou word.

column2: Acts 2:25 For David speaketh concerning him, I foresaw the Lord always before my face, for he is on my right hand, that I should not be moved:
column3: Handelinge 2:25 Want Dawid sê van Hom: Ek het die Here altyddeur voor My gesien, want Hy is aan my regterhand, dat Ek nie sou wankel nie.

column2: Acts 2:26 Therefore did my heart rejoice, and my tongue was glad; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope:
column3: Handelinge 2:26 Daarom is my hart bly en my tong juig, ja, ook sal my vlees nog rus in hoop.

column2: Acts 2:27 Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell, neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
column3: Handelinge 2:27 Want U sal my siel nie aan die doderyk oorlaat of u Heilige oorgee om verderwing te sien nie.

column2: Acts 2:28 Thou hast made known to me the ways of life; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance.
column3: Handelinge 2:28 U het My die weë van die lewe bekend gemaak, U sal My vervul met vreugde by u aangesig.

column2: Acts 2:29 Men [and] brethren, let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David, that he is both dead and buried, and his sepulchre is with us unto this day.
column3: Handelinge 2:29 Broeders, ek kan vry-uit met julle spreek oor die aartsvader Dawid, dat hy gesterf het en ook begrawe is, en sy graf is by ons tot vandag toe.

column2: Acts 2:30 Therefore being a prophet, and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him, that of the fruit of his loins, according to the flesh, he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne;
column3: Handelinge 2:30 Omdat hy dan ’n profeet was en geweet het dat God vir hom met ’n eed gesweer het dat hy uit die vrug van sy lendene, wat die vlees betref, die Christus sou verwek om op sy troon te sit,

column2: Acts 2:31 He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ, that his soul was not left in hell, neither his flesh did see corruption.
column3: Handelinge 2:31 het hy, omdat hy dit vooruit gesien het, gespreek van die opstanding van Christus, dat sy siel nie in die doderyk verlaat is en sy vlees ook nie verderwing gesien het nie.

column2: Acts 2:32 This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
column3: Handelinge 2:32 Hierdie Jesus het God opgewek, waarvan ons almal getuies is.

column2: Acts 2:33 Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted, and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost, he hath shed forth this, which ye now see and hear.
column3: Handelinge 2:33 Nadat Hy dan deur die regterhand van God verhoog is en van die Vader die belofte van die Heilige Gees ontvang het, het Hy dít uitgestort, wat julle nou sien en hoor.

column2: Acts 2:34 For David is not ascended into the heavens: but he saith himself, The LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand,
column3: Handelinge 2:34 Want Dawid het nie in die hemele opgevaar nie, maar hy self sê: Die Here het gespreek tot my Here: Sit aan my regterhand

column2: Acts 2:35 Until I make thy foes thy footstool.
column3: Handelinge 2:35 totdat Ek u vyande gemaak het ’n voetbank van u voete.

column2: Acts 2:36 Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly, that God hath made that same Jesus, whom ye have crucified, both Lord and Christ.
column3: Handelinge 2:36 Laat dan die hele huis van Israel sekerlik weet dat God Hom Here en Christus gemaak het, hierdie Jesus wat julle gekruisig het.

column2: Acts 2:37 Now when they heard [this], they were pricked in their heart, and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles, Men [and] brethren, what shall we do?
column3: Handelinge 2:37 TOE hulle dit hoor, is hulle diep in die hart getref en het vir Petrus en die ander apostels gesê: Wat moet ons doen, broeders?

column2: Acts 2:38 Then Peter said unto them, Repent, and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost.
column3: Handelinge 2:38 En Petrus sê vir hulle: Bekeer julle, en laat elkeen van julle gedoop word in die Naam van Jesus Christus tot vergewing van sondes, en julle sal die gawe van die Heilige Gees ontvang.

column2: Acts 2:39 For the promise is unto you, and to your children, and to all that are afar off, [even] as many as the Lord our God shall call.
column3: Handelinge 2:39 Want die belofte kom julle toe en julle kinders en almal wat daar ver is, die wat die Here onse God na Hom sal roep.

column2: Acts 2:40 And with many other words did he testify and exhort, saying, Save yourselves from this untoward generation.
column3: Handelinge 2:40 En met baie ander woorde het hy hulle besweer en vermaan en gesê: Laat julle red uit hierdie verkeerde geslag.

column2: Acts 2:41 Then they that gladly received his word were baptized: and the same day there were added [unto them] about three thousand souls.
column3: Handelinge 2:41 Die wat toe sy woord met blydskap aangeneem het, is gedoop; en daar is op dié dag omtrent drieduisend siele toegebring.

column2: Acts 2:42 And they continued stedfastly in the apostles' doctrine and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and in prayers.
column3: Handelinge 2:42 En hulle het volhard in die leer van die apostels en in die gemeenskap en in die breking van die brood en in die gebede.

column2: Acts 2:43 And fear came upon every soul: and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles.
column3: Handelinge 2:43 En vrees het op elkeen gekom, en baie wonders en tekens het deur die apostels plaasgevind.

column2: Acts 2:44 And all that believed were together, and had all things common;
column3: Handelinge 2:44 En almal wat gelowig geword het, was bymekaar, en het alles gemeenskaplik besit.

column2: Acts 2:45 And sold their possessions and goods, and parted them to all [men], as every man had need.
column3: Handelinge 2:45 En hulle eiendomme en besittings het hulle verkoop en die opbrings onder almal verdeel, volgens wat elkeen nodig gehad het.

column2: Acts 2:46 And they, continuing daily with one accord in the temple, and breaking bread from house to house, did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart,
column3: Handelinge 2:46 En dag vir dag het hulle eendragtig volhard in die tempel en van huis tot huis brood gebreek en hulle voedsel met blydskap en eenvoudigheid van hart geniet,

column2: Acts 2:47 Praising God, and having favour with all the people. And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved.
column3: Handelinge 2:47 terwyl hulle God geprys het en in guns was by die hele volk. En die Here het daagliks by die gemeente gevoeg die wat gered is.

column2: Acts 3:1 Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer, [being] the ninth [hour].
column3: Handelinge 3:1 EN Petrus en Johannes het saam na die tempel opgegaan op die uur van die gebed, die negende uur.

column2: Acts 3:2 And a certain man lame from his mother's womb was carried, whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful, to ask alms of them that entered into the temple;
column3: Handelinge 3:2 En daar is ’n sekere man aangedra wat van sy geboorte af kreupel was; hulle het hom elke dag neergesit by die tempelpoort wat die Skone genoem word, om ’n aalmoes te vra van die wat in die tempel ingaan.

column2: Acts 3:3 Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms.
column3: Handelinge 3:3 Toe hy sien dat Petrus en Johannes die tempel wou binnegaan, het hy om ’n aalmoes gevra.

column2: Acts 3:4 And Peter, fastening his eyes upon him with John, said, Look on us.
column3: Handelinge 3:4 En Petrus saam met Johannes het hom stip aangekyk en gesê: Kyk na ons.

column2: Acts 3:5 And he gave heed unto them, expecting to receive something of them.
column3: Handelinge 3:5 En hy het sy oë op hulle gehou in die verwagting dat hy iets van hulle sou ontvang.

column2: Acts 3:6 Then Peter said, Silver and gold have I none; but such as I have give I thee: In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk.
column3: Handelinge 3:6 Maar Petrus sê: Silwer en goud het ek nie; maar wat ek het, dit gee ek vir jou: In die Naam van Jesus Christus, die Nasaréner, staan op en loop!

column2: Acts 3:7 And he took him by the right hand, and lifted [him] up: and immediately his feet and ankle bones received strength.
column3: Handelinge 3:7 Toe gryp hy hom aan sy regterhand en rig hom op, en onmiddellik het sy voete en enkels sterk geword.

column2: Acts 3:8 And he leaping up stood, and walked, and entered with them into the temple, walking, and leaping, and praising God.
column3: Handelinge 3:8 En hy het opgespring en gestaan en rondgeloop en saam met hulle in die tempel ingegaan terwyl hy rondloop en spring en God prys.

column2: Acts 3:9 And all the people saw him walking and praising God:
column3: Handelinge 3:9 En die hele volk het gesien hoe hy daar loop en God prys.

column2: Acts 3:10 And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple: and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him.
column3: Handelinge 3:10 En hulle het hom herken, dat dit hy was wat by die Skone Poort van die tempel gesit het om te bedel, en hulle is vervul met verwondering en verbasing oor wat met hom gebeur het.

column2: Acts 3:11 And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John, all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon's, greatly wondering.
column3: Handelinge 3:11 En toe die kreupel man wat genees was, aan Petrus en Johannes vashou, het die hele volk uitermate verbaas na hulle gehardloop in die pilaargang wat Salomo s’n genoem word.

column2: Acts 3:12 And when Peter saw [it], he answered unto the people, Ye men of Israel, why marvel ye at this? or why look ye so earnestly on us, as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk?
column3: Handelinge 3:12 En toe Petrus dit sien, sê hy vir die volk: Israeliete, waarom is julle hieroor verwonderd, of waarom kyk julle ons so aan asof ons deur ons eie krag of godsvrug bewerk het dat hy loop?

column2: Acts 3:13 The God of Abraham, and of Isaac, and of Jacob, the God of our fathers, hath glorified his Son Jesus; whom ye delivered up, and denied him in the presence of Pilate, when he was determined to let [him] go.
column3: Handelinge 3:13 Die God van Abraham en Isak en Jakob, die God van ons vaders, het sy Kind Jesus verheerlik, Hom wat julle oorgelewer en voor Pilatus verloën het toe hy besluit het om Hom los te laat.

column2: Acts 3:14 But ye denied the Holy One and the Just, and desired a murderer to be granted unto you;
column3: Handelinge 3:14 En julle het die Heilige en Regverdige verloën en gevra dat ’n moordenaar aan julle geskenk sou word,

column2: Acts 3:15 And killed the Prince of life, whom God hath raised from the dead; whereof we are witnesses.
column3: Handelinge 3:15 en die Leidsman tot die lewe het julle gedood. God het Hom uit die dode opgewek, waarvan ons getuies is.

column2: Acts 3:16 And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong, whom ye see and know: yea, the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all.
column3: Handelinge 3:16 En deur die geloof in sy Naam het sy Naam hierdie man, wat julle sien en ken, sterk gemaak, en die geloof wat deur Hom is, het hom hierdie volkome gesondheid gegee in die teenwoordigheid van julle almal.

column2: Acts 3:17 And now, brethren, I wot that through ignorance ye did [it], as [did] also your rulers.
column3: Handelinge 3:17 En nou, broeders, ek weet dat julle dit in onwetendheid gedoen het, net soos julle owerstes;

column2: Acts 3:18 But those things, which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets, that Christ should suffer, he hath so fulfilled.
column3: Handelinge 3:18 maar God het op dié manier vervul wat Hy tevore verkondig het deur die mond van al sy profete, dat die Christus sou ly.

column2: Acts 3:19 Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord;
column3: Handelinge 3:19 Kom dan tot inkeer en bekeer julle, sodat julle sondes uitgewis kan word en tye van verkwikking van die aangesig van die Here mag kom,

column2: Acts 3:20 And he shall send Jesus Christ, which before was preached unto you:
column3: Handelinge 3:20 en Hy Hom mag stuur wat vooraf aan julle verkondig is, naamlik Jesus Christus,

column2: Acts 3:21 Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things, which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began.
column3: Handelinge 3:21 Hom wat die hemel moet ontvang tot op die tye van die wederoprigting van alle dinge, waarvan God van ouds af gespreek het deur die mond van al sy heilige profete.

column2: Acts 3:22 For Moses truly said unto the fathers, A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you.
column3: Handelinge 3:22 Want Moses het tot die vaders gespreek: Die Here julle God sal vir julle ’n Profeet verwek uit julle broeders net soos ek is; na Hom moet julle luister volgens alles wat Hy met julle sal spreek.

column2: Acts 3:23 And it shall come to pass, [that] every soul, which will not hear that prophet, shall be destroyed from among the people.
column3: Handelinge 3:23 En elke siel wat nie na dié Profeet luister nie, sal uit die volk uitgeroei word.

column2: Acts 3:24 Yea, and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after, as many as have spoken, have likewise foretold of these days.
column3: Handelinge 3:24 En ook al die profete van Samuel af en die wat gevolg het, almal wat gespreek het, het ook hierdie dae aangekondig.

column2: Acts 3:25 Ye are the children of the prophets, and of the covenant which God made with our fathers, saying unto Abraham, And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed.
column3: Handelinge 3:25 En julle is kinders van die profete en van die verbond wat God met ons vaders gesluit het toe Hy vir Abraham gesê het: En in jou saad sal al die geslagte van die aarde geseën word.

column2: Acts 3:26 Unto you first God, having raised up his Son Jesus, sent him to bless you, in turning away every one of you from his iniquities.
column3: Handelinge 3:26 God het, nadat Hy sy Kind Jesus opgewek het, Hom eers vir julle gestuur om julle te seën deur elkeen van sy booshede te bekeer.

column2: Acts 4:1 And as they spake unto the people, the priests, and the captain of the temple, and the Sadducees, came upon them,
column3: Handelinge 4:1 EN terwyl hulle besig was om met die volk te spreek, het die priesters en die hoofman van die tempel en die Sadduseërs op hulle afgekom,

column2: Acts 4:2 Being grieved that they taught the people, and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead.
column3: Handelinge 4:2 baie ontevrede dat hulle die volk leer en in Jesus die opstanding uit die dode verkondig.

column2: Acts 4:3 And they laid hands on them, and put [them] in hold unto the next day: for it was now eventide.
column3: Handelinge 4:3 En hulle het die hande aan hulle geslaan en hulle in die gevangenis gesit tot die volgende môre toe, want dit was al aand.

column2: Acts 4:4 Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed; and the number of the men was about five thousand.
column3: Handelinge 4:4 En baie van die wat die woord gehoor het, het geglo; en die getal van die manne het omtrent vyfduisend geword.

column2: Acts 4:5 And it came to pass on the morrow, that their rulers, and elders, and scribes,
column3: Handelinge 4:5 Die volgende dag kom toe hulle owerstes en ouderlinge en skrifgeleerdes in Jerusalem bymekaar,

column2: Acts 4:6 And Annas the high priest, and Caiaphas, and John, and Alexander, and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest, were gathered together at Jerusalem.
column3: Handelinge 4:6 ook Annas, die hoëpriester, en Kájafas en Johannes en Alexander en almal wat van die hoëpriesterlike familie was;

column2: Acts 4:7 And when they had set them in the midst, they asked, By what power, or by what name, have ye done this?
column3: Handelinge 4:7 en toe hulle hul voorgebring het, vra hulle: Deur watter mag en deur watter naam het julle dit gedoen?

column2: Acts 4:8 Then Peter, filled with the Holy Ghost, said unto them, Ye rulers of the people, and elders of Israel,
column3: Handelinge 4:8 Daarop sê Petrus, vervul met die Heilige Gees, aan hulle: Owerstes van die volk en ouderlinge van Israel,

column2: Acts 4:9 If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man, by what means he is made whole;
column3: Handelinge 4:9 as ons vandag ondervra word oor ’n weldaad aan ’n siek man, waardeur hy gesond geword het,

column2: Acts 4:10 Be it known unto you all, and to all the people of Israel, that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth, whom ye crucified, whom God raised from the dead, [even] by him doth this man stand here before you whole.
column3: Handelinge 4:10 laat dit bekend wees aan julle almal en aan die hele volk van Israel dat deur die Naam van Jesus Christus, die Nasaréner, wat julle gekruisig het, maar wat God uit die dode opgewek het, dat deur Hom hierdie man gesond voor julle staan.

column2: Acts 4:11 This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders, which is become the head of the corner.
column3: Handelinge 4:11 Hy is die steen wat deur julle, die bouers, verag is, wat ’n hoeksteen geword het.

column2: Acts 4:12 Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
column3: Handelinge 4:12 En die saligheid is in niemand anders nie, want daar is ook geen ander naam onder die hemel wat onder die mense gegee is, waardeur ons gered moet word nie.

column2: Acts 4:13 Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men, they marvelled; and they took knowledge of them, that they had been with Jesus.
column3: Handelinge 4:13 En toe hulle die vrymoedigheid van Petrus en Johannes sien en verstaan dat hulle ongeleerde en eenvoudige manne was, was hulle verwonderd en het hulle as metgeselle van Jesus herken.

column2: Acts 4:14 And beholding the man which was healed standing with them, they could say nothing against it.
column3: Handelinge 4:14 En omdat hulle die man wat genees was, by hulle sien staan, kon hulle niks daarteen sê nie.

column2: Acts 4:15 But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council, they conferred among themselves,
column3: Handelinge 4:15 Hulle het hul toe gelas om buitekant die Raad te gaan, en met mekaar beraadslaag

column2: Acts 4:16 Saying, What shall we do to these men? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them [is] manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem; and we cannot deny [it].
column3: Handelinge 4:16 en gesê: Wat moet ons met hierdie manne doen? Want dat daar ’n kenlike teken deur hulle plaasgevind het, is duidelik vir al die inwoners van Jerusalem; ons kan dit nie ontken nie.

column2: Acts 4:17 But that it spread no further among the people, let us straitly threaten them, that they speak henceforth to no man in this name.
column3: Handelinge 4:17 Maar dat dit nie nog meer onder die volk versprei word nie, laat ons hulle dreig om nie meer in hierdie Naam met enige mens te spreek nie.

column2: Acts 4:18 And they called them, and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus.
column3: Handelinge 4:18 En hulle het hul geroep en hulle bevel gegee om in die geheel nie in die Naam van Jesus te spreek of te leer nie.

column2: Acts 4:19 But Peter and John answered and said unto them, Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God, judge ye.
column3: Handelinge 4:19 Toe antwoord Petrus en Johannes en sê vir hulle: Of dit reg is voor God om julle meer gehoorsaam te wees as God, moet julle self beslis;

column2: Acts 4:20 For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard.
column3: Handelinge 4:20 want vir ons is dit onmoontlik om nie te spreek oor wat ons gesien en gehoor het nie.

column2: Acts 4:21 So when they had further threatened them, they let them go, finding nothing how they might punish them, because of the people: for all [men] glorified God for that which was done.
column3: Handelinge 4:21 En nadat hulle nog dreigemente bygevoeg het, aangesien hulle geen rede kon vind om hulle te straf nie, het hulle ter wille van die volk hulle losgelaat, want almal het God verheerlik oor wat gebeur het.

column2: Acts 4:22 For the man was above forty years old, on whom this miracle of healing was shewed.
column3: Handelinge 4:22 Want die man aan wie hierdie teken van genesing plaasgevind het, was meer as veertig jaar oud.

column2: Acts 4:23 And being let go, they went to their own company, and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them.
column3: Handelinge 4:23 En nadat hulle losgelaat was, het hulle na hul eie mense gegaan en alles vertel wat die owerpriesters en die ouderlinge aan hulle gesê het.

column2: Acts 4:24 And when they heard that, they lifted up their voice to God with one accord, and said, Lord, thou [art] God, which hast made heaven, and earth, and the sea, and all that in them is:
column3: Handelinge 4:24 En toe hulle dit hoor, het hulle eendragtig die stem tot God verhef en gesê: Here, U is die God wat die hemel en die aarde en die see en alles wat daarin is, gemaak het,

column2: Acts 4:25 Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said, Why did the heathen rage, and the people imagine vain things?
column3: Handelinge 4:25 wat deur die mond van u kneg Dawid gesê het: Waarom het die nasies gewoed en die volke nietige dinge bedink?

column2: Acts 4:26 The kings of the earth stood up, and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord, and against his Christ.
column3: Handelinge 4:26 Die konings van die aarde het saamgestaan en die owerstes het saam vergader teen die Here en teen sy Gesalfde.

column2: Acts 4:27 For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus, whom thou hast anointed, both Herod, and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles, and the people of Israel, were gathered together,
column3: Handelinge 4:27 Want waarlik, Herodes en Pontius Pilatus het saam met heidene en die volke van Israel vergader teen u heilige Kind Jesus wat U gesalf het,

column2: Acts 4:28 For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done.
column3: Handelinge 4:28 om alles te doen wat u hand en u raad vooruit bepaal het om plaas te vind.

column2: Acts 4:29 And now, Lord, behold their threatenings: and grant unto thy servants, that with all boldness they may speak thy word,
column3: Handelinge 4:29 En nou, Here, let op hulle dreigemente en gee aan u diensknegte om met alle vrymoedigheid u woord te spreek,

column2: Acts 4:30 By stretching forth thine hand to heal; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus.
column3: Handelinge 4:30 deurdat U u hand uitstrek tot genesing, en tekens en wonders deur die Naam van u heilige Kind Jesus plaasvind.

column2: Acts 4:31 And when they had prayed, the place was shaken where they were assembled together; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and they spake the word of God with boldness.
column3: Handelinge 4:31 En toe hulle gebid het, is die plek geskud waar hulle saam was, en hulle is almal vervul met die Heilige Gees en het die woord van God met vrymoedigheid gespreek.

column2: Acts 4:32 And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul: neither said any [of them] that ought of the things which he possessed was his own; but they had all things common.
column3: Handelinge 4:32 EN die menigte van die wat gelowig geword het, was een van hart en siel, en nie een het gesê dat iets van sy besittings sy eie was nie, maar hulle het alles in gemeenskap gehad.

column2: Acts 4:33 And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus: and great grace was upon them all.
column3: Handelinge 4:33 En met groot krag het die apostels getuienis gegee van die opstanding van die Here Jesus, en groot genade was oor hulle almal.

column2: Acts 4:34 Neither was there any among them that lacked: for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them, and brought the prices of the things that were sold,
column3: Handelinge 4:34 Want niemand onder hulle was behoeftig nie; want almal wat besitters van gronde of huise was, het dit verkoop en die prys van wat verkoop is, gebring en aan die voete van die apostels neergelê.

column2: Acts 4:35 And laid [them] down at the apostles' feet: and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need.
column3: Handelinge 4:35 En aan elkeen is uitgedeel volgens wat hy nodig gehad het.

column2: Acts 4:36 And Joses, who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas, (which is, being interpreted, The son of consolation,) a Levite, [and] of the country of Cyprus,
column3: Handelinge 4:36 En Joses wie se bynaam onder die apostels Bárnabas was — wat, as dit vertaal word, beteken seun van vertroosting — ’n Leviet, van geboorte uit Ciprus,

column2: Acts 4:37 Having land, sold [it], and brought the money, and laid [it] at the apostles' feet.
column3: Handelinge 4:37 het ’n stuk grond gehad en dit verkoop en die geld gebring en aan die voete van die apostels neergelê.

column2: Acts 5:1 But a certain man named Ananias, with Sapphira his wife, sold a possession,
column3: Handelinge 5:1 MAAR ’n sekere man met die naam van Ananías het saam met sy vrou Saffíra ’n eiendom verkoop,

column2: Acts 5:2 And kept back [part] of the price, his wife also being privy [to it], and brought a certain part, and laid [it] at the apostles' feet.
column3: Handelinge 5:2 en ook met die medewete van sy vrou van die prys agtergehou en ’n sekere deel gebring en aan die voete van die apostels neergelê.

column2: Acts 5:3 But Peter said, Ananias, why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost, and to keep back [part] of the price of the land?
column3: Handelinge 5:3 Toe sê Petrus: Ananías, waarom het die Satan jou hart vervul om vir die Heilige Gees te lieg en van die prys van die grond agter te hou?

column2: Acts 5:4 Whiles it remained, was it not thine own? and after it was sold, was it not in thine own power? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart? thou hast not lied unto men, but unto God.
column3: Handelinge 5:4 As dit nie verkoop was nie, het dit nie joue gebly nie? En toe dit verkoop is, was dit nie in jou mag nie? Waarom is dit dat jy hierdie saak in jou hart voorgeneem het? Jy het nie vir mense gelieg nie, maar vir God.

column2: Acts 5:5 And Ananias hearing these words fell down, and gave up the ghost: and great fear came on all them that heard these things.
column3: Handelinge 5:5 En toe Ananías hierdie woorde hoor, het hy neergeval en gesterwe; en ’n groot vrees het gekom oor almal wat dit gehoor het.

column2: Acts 5:6 And the young men arose, wound him up, and carried [him] out, and buried [him].
column3: Handelinge 5:6 Daarna het die jongmanne opgestaan en hom toegedraai en uitgedra en begrawe.

column2: Acts 5:7 And it was about the space of three hours after, when his wife, not knowing what was done, came in.
column3: Handelinge 5:7 En ná verloop van omtrent drie uur kom sy vrou in sonder om te weet wat voorgeval het.

column2: Acts 5:8 And Peter answered unto her, Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much? And she said, Yea, for so much.
column3: Handelinge 5:8 En Petrus het haar aangespreek: Sê vir my of julle die grond vir soveel verkoop het? En sy sê: Ja, vir soveel.

column2: Acts 5:9 Then Peter said unto her, How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord? behold, the feet of them which have buried thy husband [are] at the door, and shall carry thee out.
column3: Handelinge 5:9 En Petrus sê vir haar: Waarom het julle ooreengekom om die Gees van die Here te versoek? Kyk, die voete van die wat jou man begrawe het, is by die deur, en hulle sal jou uitdra.

column2: Acts 5:10 Then fell she down straightway at his feet, and yielded up the ghost: and the young men came in, and found her dead, and, carrying [her] forth, buried [her] by her husband.
column3: Handelinge 5:10 Toe val sy onmiddellik aan sy voete neer en het gesterwe. En die jongmanne het ingekom en haar dood gevind en haar uitgedra en by haar man begrawe.

column2: Acts 5:11 And great fear came upon all the church, and upon as many as heard these things.
column3: Handelinge 5:11 En ’n groot vrees het oor die hele gemeente gekom en oor almal wat dit gehoor het.

column2: Acts 5:12 And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people; (and they were all with one accord in Solomon's porch.
column3: Handelinge 5:12 En deur die hande van die apostels het daar baie tekens en wonders onder die volk plaasgevind; en hulle was almal eendragtig saam in die pilaargang van Salomo.

column2: Acts 5:13 And of the rest durst no man join himself to them: but the people magnified them.
column3: Handelinge 5:13 En daar was niemand van die ander wat dit gewaag het om hom by hulle te voeg nie, maar die volk het hulle baie geëer.

column2: Acts 5:14 And believers were the more added to the Lord, multitudes both of men and women.)
column3: Handelinge 5:14 En daar is meer en meer gelowiges in die Here bygevoeg, menigtes van manne sowel as vroue,

column2: Acts 5:15 Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets, and laid [them] on beds and couches, that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them.
column3: Handelinge 5:15 sodat hulle die siekes op die strate uitgedra en op bedde en draagbare gelê het, met die bedoeling dat, as Petrus kom, al was dit net sy skaduwee op iemand van hulle sou val.

column2: Acts 5:16 There came also a multitude [out] of the cities round about unto Jerusalem, bringing sick folks, and them which were vexed with unclean spirits: and they were healed every one.
column3: Handelinge 5:16 En die menigte van die stede in die omtrek het ook in Jerusalem bymekaargekom en siekes gebring en mense wat deur onreine geeste gekwel was; en hulle is almal genees.

column2: Acts 5:17 Then the high priest rose up, and all they that were with him, (which is the sect of the Sadducees,) and were filled with indignation,
column3: Handelinge 5:17 EN die hoëpriester het opgestaan en almal wat saam met hom was — dit is die party van die Sadduseërs — en hulle was met nydigheid vervul,

column2: Acts 5:18 And laid their hands on the apostles, and put them in the common prison.
column3: Handelinge 5:18 en hulle het die hande aan die apostels geslaan en hulle in die openbare gevangenis gesit.

column2: Acts 5:19 But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors, and brought them forth, and said,
column3: Handelinge 5:19 Maar ’n engel van die Here het in die nag die deure van die gevangenis oopgemaak en hulle uitgelei en gesê:

column2: Acts 5:20 Go, stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life.
column3: Handelinge 5:20 Gaan heen, staan en vertel in die tempel aan die volk al die woorde van hierdie lewe.

column2: Acts 5:21 And when they heard [that], they entered into the temple early in the morning, and taught. But the high priest came, and they that were with him, and called the council together, and all the senate of the children of Israel, and sent to the prison to have them brought.
column3: Handelinge 5:21 En hulle het geluister en vroeg in die môre in die tempel gegaan en begin leer. Maar die hoëpriester en die wat saam met hom was, het gekom en die Raad en al die oudstes van die kinders van Israel bymekaargeroep; en hulle het na die gevangenis gestuur om hulle te laat haal.

column2: Acts 5:22 But when the officers came, and found them not in the prison, they returned, and told,
column3: Handelinge 5:22 Maar toe die dienaars daar kom, het hulle hul nie in die gevangenis gekry nie; en hulle het omgedraai en berig gebring en gesê:

column2: Acts 5:23 Saying, The prison truly found we shut with all safety, and the keepers standing without before the doors: but when we had opened, we found no man within.
column3: Handelinge 5:23 Die gevangenis het ons in alle sekerheid toegesluit gevind, en die wagte het buite gestaan voor die deure; maar toe ons oopmaak, kry ons niemand daarbinne nie.

column2: Acts 5:24 Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things, they doubted of them whereunto this would grow.
column3: Handelinge 5:24 En toe die hoëpriester en die hoofman van die tempel en die owerpriesters hierdie woorde hoor, was hulle daarmee verleë wat nou hiervan sou word.

column2: Acts 5:25 Then came one and told them, saying, Behold, the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple, and teaching the people.
column3: Handelinge 5:25 En daar kom een en bring aan hulle berig en sê: Kyk, die manne wat julle in die gevangenis gesit het, staan in die tempel en leer die volk.

column2: Acts 5:26 Then went the captain with the officers, and brought them without violence: for they feared the people, lest they should have been stoned.
column3: Handelinge 5:26 Daarop gaan die hoofman met die dienaars en bring hulle, maar nie met geweld nie, uit vrees vir die volk dat hulle gestenig sou word.

column2: Acts 5:27 And when they had brought them, they set [them] before the council: and the high priest asked them,
column3: Handelinge 5:27 Hulle het hul dan gebring en voor die Raad gestel; en die hoëpriester het hulle gevra en gesê:

column2: Acts 5:28 Saying, Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name? and, behold, ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine, and intend to bring this man's blood upon us.
column3: Handelinge 5:28 Het ons julle nie uitdruklik verbied om in dié Naam te leer nie? En kyk, julle het Jerusalem met julle leer vervul; en julle wil die bloed van hierdie Man op ons bring.

column2: Acts 5:29 Then Peter and the [other] apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
column3: Handelinge 5:29 En Petrus en die apostels antwoord en sê: Ons moet aan God meer gehoorsaam wees as aan die mense.

column2: Acts 5:30 The God of our fathers raised up Jesus, whom ye slew and hanged on a tree.
column3: Handelinge 5:30 Die God van ons vaders het Jesus opgewek, wat julle omgebring het deur Hom aan ’n kruishout te hang.

column2: Acts 5:31 Him hath God exalted with his right hand [to be] a Prince and a Saviour, for to give repentance to Israel, and forgiveness of sins.
column3: Handelinge 5:31 Hom het God as Leidsman en Verlosser deur sy regterhand verhoog om aan Israel bekering en vergifnis van sondes te skenk.

column2: Acts 5:32 And we are his witnesses of these things; and [so is] also the Holy Ghost, whom God hath given to them that obey him.
column3: Handelinge 5:32 En ons is sy getuies van hierdie dinge, en ook die Heilige Gees wat God gegee het aan die wat Hom gehoorsaam is.

column2: Acts 5:33 When they heard [that], they were cut [to the heart], and took counsel to slay them.
column3: Handelinge 5:33 Toe hulle dit hoor, was hulle woedend en wou hulle om die lewe bring.

column2: Acts 5:34 Then stood there up one in the council, a Pharisee, named Gamaliel, a doctor of the law, had in reputation among all the people, and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space;
column3: Handelinge 5:34 Maar ’n Fariseër met die naam van Gamáliël, ’n leraar van die wet wat by die hele volk hoog in aansien was, het in die Raad opgestaan en bevel gegee dat hulle die apostels ’n bietjie buitentoe moes bring.

column2: Acts 5:35 And said unto them, Ye men of Israel, take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men.
column3: Handelinge 5:35 Toe sê hy vir hulle: Israeliete, pas op wat julle gaan doen met hierdie manne;

column2: Acts 5:36 For before these days rose up Theudas, boasting himself to be somebody; to whom a number of men, about four hundred, joined themselves: who was slain; and all, as many as obeyed him, were scattered, and brought to nought.
column3: Handelinge 5:36 want nie lank gelede nie het Theudas opgestaan en gesê dat hy iets besonders was. By hom het ’n aantal mense — omtrent vierhonderd — aangesluit. Hy is gedood, en almal wat na hom geluister het, is uitmekaargejaag en het tot niet geword.

column2: Acts 5:37 After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing, and drew away much people after him: he also perished; and all, [even] as many as obeyed him, were dispersed.
column3: Handelinge 5:37 En ná hom het Judas, die Galiléër, opgestaan, in die dae van die inskrywing, en ’n aansienlike getal mense afvallig gemaak agter hom aan. Hy het ook omgekom, en almal wat na hom geluister het, is verstrooi.

column2: Acts 5:38 And now I say unto you, Refrain from these men, and let them alone: for if this counsel or this work be of men, it will come to nought:
column3: Handelinge 5:38 En nou sê ek vir julle, bly af van hierdie manne en laat hulle staan; want as hierdie voorneme of hierdie werk uit mense is, sal dit vernietig word;

column2: Acts 5:39 But if it be of God, ye cannot overthrow it; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God.
column3: Handelinge 5:39 maar as dit uit God is, kan julle dit nie vernietig nie — dat dit nie miskien bevind word dat julle selfs teen God stry nie.

column2: Acts 5:40 And to him they agreed: and when they had called the apostles, and beaten [them], they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go.
column3: Handelinge 5:40 En hulle het na hom geluister. En nadat hulle die apostels ingeroep het, het hulle hul laat slaan en hulle bevel gegee om nie in die Naam van Jesus te spreek nie en hulle laat gaan.

column2: Acts 5:41 And they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.
column3: Handelinge 5:41 Hulle het toe van die Raad af weggegaan, bly dat hulle waardig geag was om vir sy Naam oneer te ly.

column2: Acts 5:42 And daily in the temple, and in every house, they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ.
column3: Handelinge 5:42 En hulle het nie opgehou om elke dag in die tempel en van huis tot huis te leer nie, en die evangelie te verkondig dat Jesus die Christus is.

column2: Acts 6:1 And in those days, when the number of the disciples was multiplied, there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews, because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration.
column3: Handelinge 6:1 EN in dié dae toe die dissipels vermeerder het, het daar ’n murmurering ontstaan van die Griekssprekende Jode teen die Hebreërs, omdat hulle weduwees in die daaglikse versorging oor die hoof gesien is.

column2: Acts 6:2 Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples [unto them], and said, It is not reason that we should leave the word of God, and serve tables.
column3: Handelinge 6:2 En die twaalf het die menigte van die dissipels byeengeroep en gesê: Dit is nie reg dat ons die woord van God nalaat om die tafels te bedien nie.

column2: Acts 6:3 Wherefore, brethren, look ye out among you seven men of honest report, full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom, whom we may appoint over this business.
column3: Handelinge 6:3 Kyk dan uit, broeders, na sewe manne uit julle, van goeie getuienis, vol van die Heilige Gees en wysheid, wat ons oor hierdie nodige saak kan aanstel;

column2: Acts 6:4 But we will give ourselves continually to prayer, and to the ministry of the word.
column3: Handelinge 6:4 maar ons sal volhard in die gebed en die bediening van die woord.

column2: Acts 6:5 And the saying pleased the whole multitude: and they chose Stephen, a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost, and Philip, and Prochorus, and Nicanor, and Timon, and Parmenas, and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch:
column3: Handelinge 6:5 En die woord het byval gevind by die hele menigte; en hulle het gekies: Stéfanus, ’n man vol van geloof en van die Heilige Gees, en Filippus en Próchorus en Nikánor en Timon en Pármenas en Nikoláüs, ’n Jodegenoot uit Antiochíë,

column2: Acts 6:6 Whom they set before the apostles: and when they had prayed, they laid [their] hands on them.
column3: Handelinge 6:6 wat hulle voor die apostels gestel het; en hulle het gebid en hulle die hande opgelê.

column2: Acts 6:7 And the word of God increased; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith.
column3: Handelinge 6:7 En die woord van God het toegeneem, en die getal van die dissipels het in Jerusalem baie vermeerder, en ’n groot menigte van priesters het gehoorsaam geword aan die geloof.

column2: Acts 6:8 And Stephen, full of faith and power, did great wonders and miracles among the people.
column3: Handelinge 6:8 EN Stéfanus, vol van geloof en krag, het groot wonders en tekens onder die volk gedoen.

column2: Acts 6:9 Then there arose certain of the synagogue, which is called [the synagogue] of the Libertines, and Cyrenians, and Alexandrians, and of them of Cilicia and of Asia, disputing with Stephen.
column3: Handelinge 6:9 En daar het sommige van die sogenaamde sinagoge van die Libertyne opgestaan, en van die Cirenéërs en Alexandryne, en van die mense van Cilícië en Asië, en hulle het met Stéfanus geredetwis.

column2: Acts 6:10 And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake.
column3: Handelinge 6:10 Maar hulle kon die wysheid en die Gees waardeur hy gespreek het, nie weerstaan nie.

column2: Acts 6:11 Then they suborned men, which said, We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses, and [against] God.
column3: Handelinge 6:11 Toe het hulle manne opgestook om te sê: Ons het hom lasterlike dinge hoor praat teen Moses en God.

column2: Acts 6:12 And they stirred up the people, and the elders, and the scribes, and came upon [him], and caught him, and brought [him] to the council,
column3: Handelinge 6:12 En hulle het die volk en die ouderlinge en die skrifgeleerdes in beweging gebring en op hom afgekom en hom gegryp en voor die Raad gebring.

column2: Acts 6:13 And set up false witnesses, which said, This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place, and the law:
column3: Handelinge 6:13 En hulle het valse getuies laat optree om te sê: Dié man hou nie op om lasterlike dinge te praat teen hierdie heilige plek en die wet nie.

column2: Acts 6:14 For we have heard him say, that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place, and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us.
column3: Handelinge 6:14 Want ons het hom hoor sê: Hierdie Jesus, die Nasaréner, sal hierdie plek afbreek en die sedes wat Moses aan ons oorgelewer het, verander.

column2: Acts 6:15 And all that sat in the council, looking stedfastly on him, saw his face as it had been the face of an angel.
column3: Handelinge 6:15 En terwyl almal wat in die Raad sit, hul oë stip op hom hou, sien hulle dat sy gesig soos die gesig van ’n engel was.

column2: Acts 7:1 Then said the high priest, Are these things so?
column3: Handelinge 7:1 TOE sê die hoëpriester: Is hierdie dinge dan so?

column2: Acts 7:2 And he said, Men, brethren, and fathers, hearken; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham, when he was in Mesopotamia, before he dwelt in Charran,
column3: Handelinge 7:2 En hy sê: Broeders en vaders, luister! Die God van die heerlikheid het verskyn aan ons vader Abraham toe hy in Mesopotámië was, voordat hy in Haran gewoon het,

column2: Acts 7:3 And said unto him, Get thee out of thy country, and from thy kindred, and come into the land which I shall shew thee.
column3: Handelinge 7:3 en vir hom gesê: Trek uit jou land en uit jou familie, en kom na die land wat Ek jou sal wys.

column2: Acts 7:4 Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans, and dwelt in Charran: and from thence, when his father was dead, he removed him into this land, wherein ye now dwell.
column3: Handelinge 7:4 Toe het hy getrek uit die land van die Chaldeërs en in Haran gaan woon; en ná die dood van sy vader het Hy hom daarvandaan laat verhuis na hierdie land waarin julle nou woon.

column2: Acts 7:5 And he gave him none inheritance in it, no, not [so much as] to set his foot on: yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession, and to his seed after him, when [as yet] he had no child.
column3: Handelinge 7:5 En Hy het hom geen erfdeel daarin gegee nie, selfs nie ’n voetbreed nie, maar Hy het belowe om dit aan hom en sy nageslag ná hom as eiendom te gee, toe hy nog geen kind gehad het nie.

column2: Acts 7:6 And God spake on this wise, That his seed should sojourn in a strange land; and that they should bring them into bondage, and entreat [them] evil four hundred years.
column3: Handelinge 7:6 En God het aan hom dít gesê, dat sy nageslag bywoners in ’n vreemde land sou wees en die mense hulle tot slawe sou maak en mishandel, vierhonderd jaar lank.

column2: Acts 7:7 And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge, said God: and after that shall they come forth, and serve me in this place.
column3: Handelinge 7:7 En die nasie aan wie hulle diensbaar sal wees, sal Ek oordeel, het God gesê; en daarna sal hulle uittrek en My in hierdie plek dien.

column2: Acts 7:8 And he gave him the covenant of circumcision: and so [Abraham] begat Isaac, and circumcised him the eighth day; and Isaac [begat] Jacob; and Jacob [begat] the twelve patriarchs.
column3: Handelinge 7:8 En Hy het hom die verbond van die besnydenis gegee, en so het hy die vader van Isak geword en hom op die agtste dag besny; en Isak het die vader van Jakob geword, en Jakob van die twaalf aartsvaders.

column2: Acts 7:9 And the patriarchs, moved with envy, sold Joseph into Egypt: but God was with him,
column3: Handelinge 7:9 En die aartsvaders was jaloers op Josef en het hom verkoop na Egipte toe; maar God was met hom

column2: Acts 7:10 And delivered him out of all his afflictions, and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house.
column3: Handelinge 7:10 en het hom uit al sy verdrukkinge verlos en hom guns en wysheid geskenk voor Farao, die koning van Egipte; en dié het hom goewerneur gemaak oor Egipte en oor sy hele huis.

column2: Acts 7:11 Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan, and great affliction: and our fathers found no sustenance.
column3: Handelinge 7:11 En ’n hongersnood en groot benoudheid het oor die hele Egipteland en Kanaän gekom, en ons vaders kon geen voedsel kry nie.

column2: Acts 7:12 But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt, he sent out our fathers first.
column3: Handelinge 7:12 En toe Jakob hoor dat daar koring in Egipte was, het hy ons vaders die eerste keer uitgestuur.

column2: Acts 7:13 And at the second [time] Joseph was made known to his brethren; and Joseph's kindred was made known unto Pharaoh.
column3: Handelinge 7:13 En die tweede keer is Josef deur sy broers herken, en die afkoms van Josef het aan Farao bekend geword.

column2: Acts 7:14 Then sent Joseph, and called his father Jacob to [him], and all his kindred, threescore and fifteen souls.
column3: Handelinge 7:14 Toe het Josef gestuur en sy vader Jakob laat roep en sy hele familie, vyf-en-sewentig siele.

column2: Acts 7:15 So Jacob went down into Egypt, and died, he, and our fathers,
column3: Handelinge 7:15 En Jakob het afgetrek na Egipte en daar gesterwe, hy en ons vaders.

column2: Acts 7:16 And were carried over into Sychem, and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor [the father] of Sychem.
column3: Handelinge 7:16 En hulle is oorgebring na Sigem en weggelê in die graf wat Abraham vir ’n som geld gekoop het van die seuns van Hemor, die vader van Sigem.

column2: Acts 7:17 But when the time of the promise drew nigh, which God had sworn to Abraham, the people grew and multiplied in Egypt,
column3: Handelinge 7:17 En namate die tyd van die belofte wat God aan Abraham met ’n eed beloof het, nader kom, het die volk toegeneem en vermeerder in Egipte,

column2: Acts 7:18 Till another king arose, which knew not Joseph.
column3: Handelinge 7:18 totdat daar ’n ander koning opgestaan het wat nie vir Josef geken het nie.

column2: Acts 7:19 The same dealt subtilly with our kindred, and evil entreated our fathers, so that they cast out their young children, to the end they might not live.
column3: Handelinge 7:19 Hy het listig met ons geslag te werk gegaan en ons vaders mishandel deur hulle te verplig om hul kindertjies weg te gooi, sodat hulle nie in die lewe behou kon word nie.

column2: Acts 7:20 In which time Moses was born, and was exceeding fair, and nourished up in his father's house three months:
column3: Handelinge 7:20 In dié tyd is Moses gebore, en hy was wonderlik mooi. Drie maande lank is hy in die huis van sy vader versorg;

column2: Acts 7:21 And when he was cast out, Pharaoh's daughter took him up, and nourished him for her own son.
column3: Handelinge 7:21 en toe hy weggegooi is, het Farao se dogter hom opgeneem en hom as haar seun grootgemaak.

column2: Acts 7:22 And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians, and was mighty in words and in deeds.
column3: Handelinge 7:22 En Moses is opgelei in al die wysheid van die Egiptenaars en was magtig in woorde en dade.

column2: Acts 7:23 And when he was full forty years old, it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel.
column3: Handelinge 7:23 En nadat hy die ouderdom van veertig jaar bereik het, het dit in sy hart opgekom om sy broers, die kinders van Israel, te besoek;

column2: Acts 7:24 And seeing one [of them] suffer wrong, he defended [him], and avenged him that was oppressed, and smote the Egyptian:
column3: Handelinge 7:24 en toe hy sien dat iemand onreg aangedoen word, het hy hom verdedig en die man wat mishandel was, gewreek deur die Egiptenaar te verslaan.

column2: Acts 7:25 For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them: but they understood not.
column3: Handelinge 7:25 En hy het gedink dat sy broers sou verstaan dat God hulle deur sy hand redding sou gee; maar hulle het dit nie verstaan nie.

column2: Acts 7:26 And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove, and would have set them at one again, saying, Sirs, ye are brethren; why do ye wrong one to another?
column3: Handelinge 7:26 En die volgende dag het hy by hulle verskyn terwyl hulle besig was om te veg, en hy het by hulle aangedring om vrede te maak en gesê: Manne, julle is broers; waarom doen julle mekaar onreg aan?

column2: Acts 7:27 But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us?
column3: Handelinge 7:27 Maar hy wat sy naaste onreg aangedoen het, het hom afgestoot en gesê: Wie het jou as ’n owerste en regter oor ons aangestel?

column2: Acts 7:28 Wilt thou kill me, as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday?
column3: Handelinge 7:28 Jy wil my tog nie doodmaak soos jy gister die Egiptenaar doodgemaak het nie?

column2: Acts 7:29 Then fled Moses at this saying, and was a stranger in the land of Madian, where he begat two sons.
column3: Handelinge 7:29 En Moses het op hierdie woord gevlug en ’n bywoner geword in die land Mídian, waar hy die vader van twee seuns geword het.

column2: Acts 7:30 And when forty years were expired, there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush.
column3: Handelinge 7:30 En toe veertig jaar verby was, het ’n Engel van die Here aan hom verskyn in die woestyn van die berg Sinai, in die vuurvlam van ’n doringbos.

column2: Acts 7:31 When Moses saw [it], he wondered at the sight: and as he drew near to behold [it], the voice of the Lord came unto him,
column3: Handelinge 7:31 En Moses het dit gesien en hom oor die gesig verwonder; en toe hy daarheen gaan om dit te besien, het die stem van die Here tot hom gekom:

column2: Acts 7:32 [Saying], I [am] the God of thy fathers, the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob. Then Moses trembled, and durst not behold.
column3: Handelinge 7:32 Ek is die God van jou vaders, die God van Abraham en die God van Isak en die God van Jakob. En Moses het begin bewe en nie gewaag om dit te bekyk nie.

column2: Acts 7:33 Then said the Lord to him, Put off thy shoes from thy feet: for the place where thou standest is holy ground.
column3: Handelinge 7:33 Toe sê die Here vir hom: Trek die skoene van jou voete af, want die plek waarop jy staan, is heilige grond.

column2: Acts 7:34 I have seen, I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt, and I have heard their groaning, and am come down to deliver them. And now come, I will send thee into Egypt.
column3: Handelinge 7:34 Ek het duidelik gesien die mishandeling van my volk wat in Egipte is, en hulle gesug gehoor en neergedaal om hulle te verlos. En nou, kom hier, Ek wil jou na Egipte stuur.

column2: Acts 7:35 This Moses whom they refused, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge? the same did God send [to be] a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush.
column3: Handelinge 7:35 Hierdie Moses wat hulle verloën het deur te sê: Wie het jou aangestel as ’n owerste en regter? — hom het God as owerste en verlosser gestuur deur die hand van die Engel wat aan hom verskyn het in die doringbos.

column2: Acts 7:36 He brought them out, after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt, and in the Red sea, and in the wilderness forty years.
column3: Handelinge 7:36 Hy het hulle uitgelei en wonders en tekens in Egipteland en in die Rooi See en die woestyn gedoen, veertig jaar lank.

column2: Acts 7:37 This is that Moses, which said unto the children of Israel, A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear.
column3: Handelinge 7:37 Dit is dié Moses wat aan die kinders van Israel gesê het: Die Here julle God sal vir julle ’n Profeet verwek uit julle broers net soos ek is; na Hom moet julle luister.

column2: Acts 7:38 This is he, that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina, and [with] our fathers: who received the lively oracles to give unto us:
column3: Handelinge 7:38 Dit is hy wat in die vergadering in die woestyn was saam met die Engel wat met hom op die berg Sinai gespreek het, en saam met ons vaders; hy het die lewende woorde ontvang om aan ons te gee.

column2: Acts 7:39 To whom our fathers would not obey, but thrust [him] from them, and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt,
column3: Handelinge 7:39 Na hom wou ons vaders nie luister nie, maar hulle het hom verstoot en met hulle harte na Egipte teruggekeer

column2: Acts 7:40 Saying unto Aaron, Make us gods to go before us: for [as for] this Moses, which brought us out of the land of Egypt, we wot not what is become of him.
column3: Handelinge 7:40 toe hulle vir Aäron gesê het: Maak vir ons gode wat voor ons uit sal trek; want hierdie Moses wat ons uit Egipteland uitgelei het, ons weet nie wat van hom geword het nie.

column2: Acts 7:41 And they made a calf in those days, and offered sacrifice unto the idol, and rejoiced in the works of their own hands.
column3: Handelinge 7:41 En hulle het in daardie dae ’n kalf gemaak en aan die afgodsbeeld ’n offer gebring en hulle in die werke van hulle hande verbly.

column2: Acts 7:42 Then God turned, and gave them up to worship the host of heaven; as it is written in the book of the prophets, O ye house of Israel, have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices [by the space of] forty years in the wilderness?
column3: Handelinge 7:42 Maar God het Hom afgewend en hulle oorgegee om die leër van die hemel te dien, soos geskrywe is in die boek van die profete: Julle het tog nie aan My slagoffers en offers gebring gedurende veertig jaar in die woestyn nie, o huis van Israel?

column2: Acts 7:43 Yea, ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch, and the star of your god Remphan, figures which ye made to worship them: and I will carry you away beyond Babylon.
column3: Handelinge 7:43 Ja, julle het die tent van Molog opgeneem en die ster van julle god Remfan, die beelde wat julle gemaak het om hulle te aanbid. En Ek sal julle anderkant Babilon wegvoer.

column2: Acts 7:44 Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness, as he had appointed, speaking unto Moses, that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen.
column3: Handelinge 7:44 Die tent van die Getuienis was onder ons vaders in die woestyn, soos Hy wat met Moses gespreek het, hom bevel gegee het om dit te maak volgens die afbeelding wat hy gesien het.

column2: Acts 7:45 Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles, whom God drave out before the face of our fathers, unto the days of David;
column3: Handelinge 7:45 En ons vaders het dit ontvang en met Josua ingebring in die besitting van die nasies wat God voor ons vaders uitgedryf het, tot op die dae van Dawid

column2: Acts 7:46 Who found favour before God, and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob.
column3: Handelinge 7:46 wat genade gevind het voor God en gevra het om ’n woonplek vir die God van Jakob te verkry.

column2: Acts 7:47 But Solomon built him an house.
column3: Handelinge 7:47 En Salomo het ’n huis vir Hom gebou.

column2: Acts 7:48 Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands; as saith the prophet,
column3: Handelinge 7:48 Maar die Allerhoogste woon nie in tempels wat met hande gemaak is nie, soos die profeet sê:

column2: Acts 7:49 Heaven [is] my throne, and earth [is] my footstool: what house will ye build me? saith the Lord: or what [is] the place of my rest?
column3: Handelinge 7:49 Die hemel is my troon en die aarde die voetbank van my voete. Watter soort huis sal julle vir My bou, sê die Here, of hoedanig is die plek van my rus?

column2: Acts 7:50 Hath not my hand made all these things?
column3: Handelinge 7:50 Het my hand nie al hierdie dinge gemaak nie?

column2: Acts 7:51 Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears, ye do always resist the Holy Ghost: as your fathers [did], so [do] ye.
column3: Handelinge 7:51 Julle hardnekkiges en onbesnedenes van hart en ore, julle weerstaan altyd die Heilige Gees; net soos julle vaders, so ook julle.

column2: Acts 7:52 Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers:
column3: Handelinge 7:52 Watter een van die profete het julle vaders nie vervolg nie? Ja, hulle het dié gedood wat vooraf die koms verkondig het van die Regverdige, van wie julle nou verraaiers en moordenaars geword het;

column2: Acts 7:53 Who have received the law by the disposition of angels, and have not kept [it].
column3: Handelinge 7:53 julle wat die wet deur die beskikkinge van engele ontvang het en tog nie onderhou het nie!

column2: Acts 7:54 When they heard these things, they were cut to the heart, and they gnashed on him with [their] teeth.
column3: Handelinge 7:54 En toe hulle dit hoor, was hulle woedend in hul harte en het teen hom op die tande gekners.

column2: Acts 7:55 But he, being full of the Holy Ghost, looked up stedfastly into heaven, and saw the glory of God, and Jesus standing on the right hand of God,
column3: Handelinge 7:55 Maar hy was vol van die Heilige Gees en het die oë na die hemel gehou en die heerlikheid van God gesien en Jesus wat staan aan die regterhand van God.

column2: Acts 7:56 And said, Behold, I see the heavens opened, and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God.
column3: Handelinge 7:56 En hy het gesê: Kyk, ek sien die hemele geopend en die Seun van die mens aan die regterhand van God staan.

column2: Acts 7:57 Then they cried out with a loud voice, and stopped their ears, and ran upon him with one accord,
column3: Handelinge 7:57 Maar hulle het met ’n groot stem geskreeu en hulle ore toegestop en soos een man op hom aangestorm.

column2: Acts 7:58 And cast [him] out of the city, and stoned [him]: and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man's feet, whose name was Saul.
column3: Handelinge 7:58 En hulle het hom buitekant die stad uitgewerp en hom gestenig; en die getuies het hulle klere neergelê by die voete van ’n jongman met die naam van Saulus.

column2: Acts 7:59 And they stoned Stephen, calling upon [God], and saying, Lord Jesus, receive my spirit.
column3: Handelinge 7:59 En hulle het Stéfanus gestenig terwyl hy die Here aanroep en sê: Here Jesus, ontvang my gees!
