column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:20 Laat elkeen in die roeping bly waarin hy geroep is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:21 Art thou called [being] a servant? care not for it: but if thou mayest be made free, use [it] rather.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:21 Is jy as slaaf geroep, laat dit jou nie kwel nie; maar as jy ook vry kan word, maak daar des te meer gebruik van.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:22 For he that is called in the Lord, [being] a servant, is the Lord's freeman: likewise also he that is called, [being] free, is Christ's servant.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:22 Want die slaaf wat in die Here geroep is, is ’n vrygemaakte van die Here; so is ook hy wat as vryman geroep is, ’n slaaf van Christus.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:23 Ye are bought with a price; be not ye the servants of men.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:23 Julle is duur gekoop; moenie slawe van mense word nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:24 Brethren, let every man, wherein he is called, therein abide with God.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:24 Laat elkeen, broeders, in die staat waarin hy geroep is, daarin bly voor God.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:25 Now concerning virgins I have no commandment of the Lord: yet I give my judgment, as one that hath obtained mercy of the Lord to be faithful.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:25 In verband met die maagde het ek geen bevel van die Here nie, maar ek gee my mening as iemand wat deur die barmhartigheid van die Here betroubaar is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:26 I suppose therefore that this is good for the present distress, [I say], that [it is] good for a man so to be.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:26 Ek meen dat dit goed is vanweë die aanstaande nood — dat dit goed is vir ’n mens om so te bly.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:27 Art thou bound unto a wife? seek not to be loosed. Art thou loosed from a wife? seek not a wife.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:27 Is jy aan ’n vrou verbonde, moenie losmaking soek nie; is jy los van ’n vrou, moenie ’n vrou soek nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:28 But and if thou marry, thou hast not sinned; and if a virgin marry, she hath not sinned. Nevertheless such shall have trouble in the flesh: but I spare you.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:28 Maar as jy tog trou, sondig jy nie; en as ’n maagd trou, sondig sy nie. Maar sulke mense sal verdrukking hê vir die vlees, en ek wil julle spaar.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:29 But this I say, brethren, the time [is] short: it remaineth, that both they that have wives be as though they had none;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:29 Maar dit sê ek, broeders, die tyd is kort; van nou af moet ook die wat vroue het, wees asof hulle nie het nie;

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:30 And they that weep, as though they wept not; and they that rejoice, as though they rejoiced not; and they that buy, as though they possessed not;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:30 en die wat ween, asof hulle nie ween nie; en die wat bly is, asof hulle nie bly is nie; en die wat koop, asof hulle nie besit nie;

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:31 And they that use this world, as not abusing [it]: for the fashion of this world passeth away.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:31 en die wat hierdie wêreld gebruik, asof hulle dit nie ten volle gebruik nie; want die gedaante van hierdie wêreld gaan verby.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:32 But I would have you without carefulness. He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord, how he may please the Lord:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:32 En ek wil hê dat julle onbesorg moet wees. Die ongetroude is besorg oor die dinge van die Here, hoe hy die Here sal behaag,

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:33 But he that is married careth for the things that are of the world, how he may please [his] wife.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:33 maar die getroude is besorg oor die dinge van die wêreld, hoe hy die vrou sal behaag.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:34 There is difference [also] between a wife and a virgin. The unmarried woman careth for the things of the Lord, that she may be holy both in body and in spirit: but she that is married careth for the things of the world, how she may please [her] husband.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:34 Daar is ook onderskeid tussen ’n vrou en ’n maagd; die ongetroude is besorg oor die dinge van die Here om heilig te wees na die liggaam sowel as na die gees, maar die getroude is besorg oor die dinge van die wêreld, hoe sy die man sal behaag.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:35 And this I speak for your own profit; not that I may cast a snare upon you, but for that which is comely, and that ye may attend upon the Lord without distraction.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:35 Ek sê dit tot julle eie voordeel, nie om julle van jul vryheid te beroof nie, maar met die oog op ’n welvoeglike en onafgebroke toewyding aan die Here.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:36 But if any man think that he behaveth himself uncomely toward his virgin, if she pass the flower of [her] age, and need so require, let him do what he will, he sinneth not: let them marry.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:36 Maar as iemand meen dat hy onwelvoeglik met sy maagd handel as sy oor die jeugdige leeftyd is, en dit so moet wees, laat hom doen wat hy wil. Hy sondig nie. Laat hulle trou.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:37 Nevertheless he that standeth stedfast in his heart, having no necessity, but hath power over his own will, and hath so decreed in his heart that he will keep his virgin, doeth well.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:37 Maar hy wat in sy hart vasstaan en nie onder dwang verkeer nie, maar mag het oor sy eie wil en dit in sy eie hart besluit het om sy maagd te bewaar, hy doen goed.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:38 So then he that giveth [her] in marriage doeth well; but he that giveth [her] not in marriage doeth better.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:38 Daarom, ook hy wat in die huwelik uitgee, doen goed; maar hy wat in die huwelik nie uitgee nie, doen beter.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:39 The wife is bound by the law as long as her husband liveth; but if her husband be dead, she is at liberty to be married to whom she will; only in the Lord.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:39 ’n Vrou is deur die wet gebonde so lank as haar man lewe; maar as die man ontslaap het, is sy vry om te trou met wie sy wil, maar net in die Here.

column2: 1 Corinthians 7:40 But she is happier if she so abide, after my judgment: and I think also that I have the Spirit of God.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 7:40 Sy is egter gelukkiger as sy so bly, volgens my gevoele. En ek meen dat ek ook die Gees van God het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:1 Now as touching things offered unto idols, we know that we all have knowledge. Knowledge puffeth up, but charity edifieth.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:1 EN met betrekking tot die offervleis aan die afgode weet ons dat ons almal kennis het. Die kennis maak opgeblase, maar die liefde stig.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:2 And if any man think that he knoweth any thing, he knoweth nothing yet as he ought to know.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:2 As iemand meen dat hy enige kennis het, weet hy nog niks soos ’n mens behoort te weet nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:3 But if any man love God, the same is known of him.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:3 Maar as iemand God liefhet, dié word deur Hom geken.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:4 As concerning therefore the eating of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto idols, we know that an idol [is] nothing in the world, and that [there is] none other God but one.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:4 Wat dan die eet van die offervleis aan die afgode betref, weet ons dat ’n afgod niks in die wêreld is nie, en dat daar geen ander God is nie, behalwe Een.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:5 For though there be that are called gods, whether in heaven or in earth, (as there be gods many, and lords many,)
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:5 Want al is daar ook sogenaamde gode, of dit in die hemel en of dit op die aarde is — soos daar baie gode en baie here is —

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:6 But to us [there is but] one God, the Father, of whom [are] all things, and we in him; and one Lord Jesus Christ, by whom [are] all things, and we by him.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:6 tog is daar vir ons maar een God, die Vader uit wie alles is, en ons tot Hom, en een Here Jesus Christus deur wie alles is, en ons deur Hom.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:7 Howbeit [there is] not in every man that knowledge: for some with conscience of the idol unto this hour eat [it] as a thing offered unto an idol; and their conscience being weak is defiled.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:7 Die kennis is egter nie in almal nie; maar sommige, nog altyd bewus van die afgod, eet dit as ’n afgodsoffer, en hulle gewete, wat swak is, word besoedel.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:8 But meat commendeth us not to God: for neither, if we eat, are we the better; neither, if we eat not, are we the worse.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:8 Maar die voedsel bring ons nie nader by God nie; want as ons eet, het ons geen oorvloed nie, en as ons nie eet nie, ly ons geen gebrek nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:9 But take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:9 Maar pas op dat hierdie vryheid van julle nie miskien ’n struikelblok word vir die wat swak is nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:10 For if any man see thee which hast knowledge sit at meat in the idol's temple, shall not the conscience of him which is weak be emboldened to eat those things which are offered to idols;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:10 Want as iemand jou wat kennis het, aan tafel sien in ’n afgodstempel, sal sy gewete, as hy ’n swak man is, nie aangemoedig word om van die offervleis aan die afgode te eet nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:11 And through thy knowledge shall the weak brother perish, for whom Christ died?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:11 En moet die swakke broeder vir wie Christus gesterf het, verlore gaan deur jou kennis?

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:12 But when ye sin so against the brethren, and wound their weak conscience, ye sin against Christ.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:12 Maar deur so teen die broeders te sondig en hulle gewete wat swak is, seer te maak, sondig julle teen Christus.

column2: 1 Corinthians 8:13 Wherefore, if meat make my brother to offend, I will eat no flesh while the world standeth, lest I make my brother to offend.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 8:13 Daarom, as voedsel my broeder laat struikel, sal ek in der ewigheid geen vleis eet nie, om my broeder nie te laat struikel nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:1 Am I not an apostle? am I not free? have I not seen Jesus Christ our Lord? are not ye my work in the Lord?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:1 IS ek nie ’n apostel nie? Is ek nie vry nie? Het ek nie Jesus Christus, onse Here, gesien nie? Is julle nie my werk in die Here nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:2 If I be not an apostle unto others, yet doubtless I am to you: for the seal of mine apostleship are ye in the Lord.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:2 As ek vir ander geen apostel is nie, is ek dit tog seker vir julle, want julle is die seël op my apostelskap in die Here.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:3 Mine answer to them that do examine me is this,
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:3 My verantwoording aan die wat my beskuldig, is dít:

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:4 Have we not power to eat and to drink?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:4 Het ons dan geen vryheid om te eet en te drink nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:5 Have we not power to lead about a sister, a wife, as well as other apostles, and [as] the brethren of the Lord, and Cephas?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:5 Het ons dan geen reg om ’n suster as vrou met ons rond te neem net soos die ander apostels en die broers van die Here en Céfas nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:6 Or I only and Barnabas, have not we power to forbear working?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:6 Of het net ek en Bárnabas geen reg om die hande-arbeid na te laat nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:7 Who goeth a warfare any time at his own charges? who planteth a vineyard, and eateth not of the fruit thereof? or who feedeth a flock, and eateth not of the milk of the flock?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:7 Wie dien ooit as soldaat op eie koste? Wie plant ’n wingerd en eet nie van sy vrug nie? Of wie pas ’n kudde op en geniet nie van die melk van die kudde nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:8 Say I these things as a man? or saith not the law the same also?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:8 Sê ek dit miskien menslikerwys, of sê die wet dit nie ook nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:9 For it is written in the law of Moses, Thou shalt not muzzle the mouth of the ox that treadeth out the corn. Doth God take care for oxen?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:9 Want in die wet van Moses is geskrywe: ’n Os wat graan dors, mag jy nie muilband nie. Is dit miskien oor die osse dat God Hom bekommer?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:10 Or saith he [it] altogether for our sakes? For our sakes, no doubt, [this] is written: that he that ploweth should plow in hope; and that he that thresheth in hope should be partaker of his hope.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:10 Of spreek Hy inderdaad om ons ontwil? Ja, want om ons ontwil is dit geskrywe, omdat hy wat ploeg, op hoop moet ploeg; en hy wat dors, op hoop om wat hy hoop, deelagtig te word.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:11 If we have sown unto you spiritual things, [is it] a great thing if we shall reap your carnal things?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:11 As ons vir julle die geestelike gesaai het, is dit ’n groot saak as ons julle stoflike goed maai?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:12 If others be partakers of [this] power over you, [are] not we rather? Nevertheless we have not used this power; but suffer all things, lest we should hinder the gospel of Christ.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:12 As ander deel het aan die reg op julle diens, het ons nie nog meer nie? Ons het ewenwel nie gebruik gemaak van hierdie reg nie, maar ons verdra alles om geen hindernis vir die evangelie van Christus te veroorsaak nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:13 Do ye not know that they which minister about holy things live [of the things] of the temple? and they which wait at the altar are partakers with the altar?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:13 Weet julle nie dat die wat met die heilige dinge werk, uit die heiligdom eet nie; en dat die wat by die altaar besig is, met die altaar deel nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:14 Even so hath the Lord ordained that they which preach the gospel should live of the gospel.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:14 So het die Here ook vir die wat die evangelie verkondig, bepaal dat hulle van die evangelie moet lewe.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:15 But I have used none of these things: neither have I written these things, that it should be so done unto me: for [it were] better for me to die, than that any man should make my glorying void.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:15 MAAR ék het van geeneen van hierdie dinge gebruik gemaak nie. En ek skryf dít nie met die bedoeling dat dit so met my moet wees nie, want dit sou vir my beter wees om te sterwe as dat iemand my roem sou verydel.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:16 For though I preach the gospel, I have nothing to glory of: for necessity is laid upon me; yea, woe is unto me, if I preach not the gospel!
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:16 Want as ek die evangelie verkondig, is dit vir my geen roem nie; want die dwang is my opgelê, en wee my as ek die evangelie nie verkondig nie!

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:17 For if I do this thing willingly, I have a reward: but if against my will, a dispensation [of the gospel] is committed unto me.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:17 Want as ek dit vrywillig doen, het ek loon; maar as ek dit onwillig doen, is ’n rentmeesterskap aan my toevertrou.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:18 What is my reward then? [Verily] that, when I preach the gospel, I may make the gospel of Christ without charge, that I abuse not my power in the gospel.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:18 Watter loon het ek dan? Dat as ek die evangelie verkondig, ek die evangelie van Christus kosteloos bring, om nie van my reg in die evangelie ten volle gebruik te maak nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:19 For though I be free from all [men], yet have I made myself servant unto all, that I might gain the more.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:19 Want alhoewel ek van almal vry was, het ek my aan almal diensbaar gemaak om soveel van hulle as moontlik te win.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:20 And unto the Jews I became as a Jew, that I might gain the Jews; to them that are under the law, as under the law, that I might gain them that are under the law;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:20 Vir die Jode het ek soos ’n Jood geword om die Jode te win; vir die wat onder die wet is, soos een wat onder die wet is, om die wat onder die wet is, te win.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:21 To them that are without law, as without law, (being not without law to God, but under the law to Christ,) that I might gain them that are without law.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:21 Vir die wat sonder die wet is, soos een sonder wet — al is ek nie sonder die wet van God nie, maar onder die wet van Christus — om die wat sonder die wet is, te win;

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:22 To the weak became I as weak, that I might gain the weak: I am made all things to all [men], that I might by all means save some.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:22 vir die swakkes het ek soos ’n swakke geword om die swakke te win; vir almal het ek alles geword om in alle geval sommige te red.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:23 And this I do for the gospel's sake, that I might be partaker thereof with [you].
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:23 En ek doen dit ter wille van die evangelie, dat ek ’n deelgenoot daarvan kan word.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:24 Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:24 Weet julle nie dat die wat op die baan hardloop, wel almal hardloop, maar dat een die prys ontvang nie? Hardloop só dat julle dit sekerlik kan behaal.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:25 And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they [do it] to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:25 En elkeen wat aan ’n wedstryd deelneem, onthou hom in alles — húlle nogal om ’n verwelklike krans te ontvang, maar ons ’n onverwelklike.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:26 I therefore so run, not as uncertainly; so fight I, not as one that beateth the air:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:26 Ek hardloop dan soos een wat nie onseker is nie; ek slaan met die vuis soos een wat nie in die lug slaan nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 9:27 But I keep under my body, and bring [it] into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 9:27 Maar ek kasty my liggaam en maak dit diensbaar, dat ek nie miskien, terwyl ek vir ander gepreek het, self verwerplik sou wees nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:1 Moreover, brethren, I would not that ye should be ignorant, how that all our fathers were under the cloud, and all passed through the sea;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:1 WANT ek wil nie hê, broeders, dat julle nie sou weet nie dat ons vaders almal onder die wolk was en almal deur die see deurgegaan het,

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:2 And were all baptized unto Moses in the cloud and in the sea;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:2 en almal in Moses gedoop is in die wolk en in die see,

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:3 And did all eat the same spiritual meat;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:3 en almal dieselfde geestelike spys geëet het,

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:4 And did all drink the same spiritual drink: for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them: and that Rock was Christ.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:4 en almal dieselfde geestelike drank gedrink het, want hulle het gedrink uit ’n geestelike rots wat gevolg het, en die rots was Christus.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:5 But with many of them God was not well pleased: for they were overthrown in the wilderness.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:5 Maar God het in die meeste van hulle geen welgevalle gehad nie, want hulle is neergeslaan in die woestyn.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:6 Now these things were our examples, to the intent we should not lust after evil things, as they also lusted.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:6 En hierdie dinge was voorbeelde vir ons, dat ons nie begerig moet wees na slegte dinge soos hulle begerig was nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:7 Neither be ye idolaters, as [were] some of them; as it is written, The people sat down to eat and drink, and rose up to play.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:7 En wees ook nie afgodedienaars soos sommige van hulle was nie, soos geskrywe is: Die volk het gaan sit om te eet en te drink en het opgestaan om te speel.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:8 Neither let us commit fornication, as some of them committed, and fell in one day three and twenty thousand.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:8 En laat ons nie hoereer soos sommige van hulle gehoereer het nie, en daar het op een dag drie-en-twintigduisend geval.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:9 Neither let us tempt Christ, as some of them also tempted, and were destroyed of serpents.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:9 En laat ons Christus nie versoek soos ook sommige van hulle gedoen het nie, en hulle het deur die slange omgekom.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:10 Neither murmur ye, as some of them also murmured, and were destroyed of the destroyer.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:10 En moenie murmureer soos ook sommige van hulle gemurmureer het nie, en hulle het deur die verderwer omgekom.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:11 Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples: and they are written for our admonition, upon whom the ends of the world are come.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:11 Maar al hierdie dinge het hulle oorgekom as voorbeelde en is opgeskrywe as ’n waarskuwing aan ons op wie die eindes van die eeue gekom het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:12 Wherefore let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:12 Daarom, wie meen dat hy staan, moet oppas dat hy nie val nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:13 There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God [is] faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear [it].
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:13 Geen versoeking het julle aangegryp behalwe ’n menslike nie; maar God is getrou, wat nie sal toelaat dat julle bo julle kragte versoek word nie; maar Hy sal saam met die versoeking ook die uitkoms gee, sodat julle dit sal kan verdra.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:14 Wherefore, my dearly beloved, flee from idolatry.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:14 DAAROM, my geliefdes, vlug vir die afgodediens.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:15 I speak as to wise men; judge ye what I say.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:15 Ek spreek soos met verstandige mense; oordeel self wat ek sê:

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:16 The cup of blessing which we bless, is it not the communion of the blood of Christ? The bread which we break, is it not the communion of the body of Christ?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:16 die beker van danksegging wat ons met danksegging seën, is dit nie die gemeenskap met die bloed van Christus nie? Die brood wat ons breek, is dit nie die gemeenskap met die liggaam van Christus nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:17 For we [being] many are one bread, [and] one body: for we are all partakers of that one bread.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:17 Omdat dit een brood is, is ons almal een liggaam, want ons het almal deel aan die een brood.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:18 Behold Israel after the flesh: are not they which eat of the sacrifices partakers of the altar?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:18 Let op Israel na die vlees: het die wat die offers eet, nie gemeenskap met die altaar nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:19 What say I then? that the idol is any thing, or that which is offered in sacrifice to idols is any thing?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:19 Wat sê ek dan? Dat ’n afgod iets is, of dat ’n afgodsoffer iets is?

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:20 But I [say], that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice, they sacrifice to devils, and not to God: and I would not that ye should have fellowship with devils.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:20 Nee, maar dat die heidene wat dit offer, aan duiwels offer en nie aan God nie. En ek wil nie hê dat julle met die duiwels gemeenskap moet hou nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:21 Ye cannot drink the cup of the Lord, and the cup of devils: ye cannot be partakers of the Lord's table, and of the table of devils.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:21 Julle kan nie die beker van die Here drink en ook die beker van die duiwels nie. Julle kan nie deel hê aan die tafel van die Here en ook aan die tafel van die duiwels nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:22 Do we provoke the Lord to jealousy? are we stronger than he?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:22 Of wil ons die ywer van die Here opwek? Is ons miskien sterker as Hy?

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:23 All things are lawful for me, but all things are not expedient: all things are lawful for me, but all things edify not.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:23 ALLES is my geoorloof, maar nie alles is nuttig nie; alles is my geoorloof, maar nie alles stig nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:24 Let no man seek his own, but every man another's [wealth].
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:24 Laat niemand sy eie voordeel soek nie, maar elkeen die voordeel van ’n ander.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:25 Whatsoever is sold in the shambles, [that] eat, asking no question for conscience sake:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:25 Eet alles wat in die slaghuis verkoop word sonder om navraag te doen, ter wille van die gewete.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:26 For the earth [is] the Lord's, and the fulness thereof.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:26 Want die aarde behoort aan die Here en die volheid daarvan.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:27 If any of them that believe not bid you [to a feast], and ye be disposed to go; whatsoever is set before you, eat, asking no question for conscience sake.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:27 En as een van die ongelowiges julle nooi en julle is gewillig om te gaan, eet dan alles wat julle voorgesit word sonder om navraag te doen, ter wille van die gewete.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:28 But if any man say unto you, This is offered in sacrifice unto idols, eat not for his sake that shewed it, and for conscience sake: for the earth [is] the Lord's, and the fulness thereof:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:28 Maar as iemand aan julle sê: Dit is afgodsoffer — moet dit dan nie eet nie, ter wille van hom wat dit te kenne gegee het, en ter wille van die gewete — want die aarde behoort aan die Here en die volheid daarvan —

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:29 Conscience, I say, not thine own, but of the other: for why is my liberty judged of another [man's] conscience?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:29 ek bedoel die gewete, nie van jouself nie, maar van die ander; want waarom word my vryheid geoordeel deur ’n ander se gewete?

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:30 For if I by grace be a partaker, why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:30 En as ek iets met danksegging geniet, waarom word ek belaster oor iets waarvoor ek dank?

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:31 Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:31 Of julle dan eet of drink of enigiets doen, doen alles tot verheerliking van God.

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:32 Give none offence, neither to the Jews, nor to the Gentiles, nor to the church of God:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:32 Wees geen oorsaak van struikeling vir Jode of Grieke of vir die gemeente van God nie;

column2: 1 Corinthians 10:33 Even as I please all [men] in all [things], not seeking mine own profit, but the [profit] of many, that they may be saved.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 10:33 net soos ek almal in alles behaag en nie my eie voordeel soek nie, maar dié van baie, sodat hulle gered kan word.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:1 Be ye followers of me, even as I also [am] of Christ.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:1 WEES my navolgers, soos ek dit ook van Christus is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:2 Now I praise you, brethren, that ye remember me in all things, and keep the ordinances, as I delivered [them] to you.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:2 EN ek prys julle, broeders, dat julle in alles aan my dink en aan die leringe vashou soos ek dit aan julle oorgelewer het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:3 But I would have you know, that the head of every man is Christ; and the head of the woman [is] the man; and the head of Christ [is] God.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:3 Maar ek wil hê dat julle moet weet dat Christus die hoof is van elke man, en die man die hoof van die vrou, en God die hoof van Christus.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:4 Every man praying or prophesying, having [his] head covered, dishonoureth his head.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:4 Elke man wat bid of profeteer met iets op sy hoof, doen sy hoof oneer aan;

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:5 But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with [her] head uncovered dishonoureth her head: for that is even all one as if she were shaven.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:5 maar elke vrou wat bid of profeteer met onbedekte hoof, doen haar hoof oneer aan; want dit is een en dieselfde asof haar hoof geskeer is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:6 For if the woman be not covered, let her also be shorn: but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven, let her be covered.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:6 Want as ’n vrou se hoof nie bedek is nie, laat sy dan ook haar hare afsny; maar as dit vir ’n vrou lelik is om haar hare af te sny of te skeer, laat sy haar hoof bedek.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:7 For a man indeed ought not to cover [his] head, forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God: but the woman is the glory of the man.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:7 Want ’n man moet die hoof nie bedek nie, omdat hy die beeld en heerlikheid van God is; maar die vrou is die heerlikheid van die man.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:8 For the man is not of the woman; but the woman of the man.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:8 Want die man is nie uit die vrou nie, maar die vrou uit die man.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:9 Neither was the man created for the woman; but the woman for the man.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:9 Want die man is ook nie ter wille van die vrou geskape nie, maar die vrou ter wille van die man.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:10 For this cause ought the woman to have power on [her] head because of the angels.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:10 Daarom moet die vrou ’n aanduiding van gesag op die hoof hê ter wille van die engele.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:11 Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman, neither the woman without the man, in the Lord.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:11 En tog, in die Here is die man nie sonder die vrou nie, en die vrou ook nie sonder die man nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:12 For as the woman [is] of the man, even so [is] the man also by the woman; but all things of God.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:12 Want soos die vrou uit die man is, so is ook die man deur middel van die vrou; maar alles is uit God.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:13 Judge in yourselves: is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:13 Oordeel self: Is dit betaamlik dat ’n vrou met onbedekte hoof tot God bid?

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:14 Doth not even nature itself teach you, that, if a man have long hair, it is a shame unto him?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:14 Of leer ook die natuur self julle nie dat as ’n man lang hare dra, dit vir hom ’n oneer is nie;

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:15 But if a woman have long hair, it is a glory to her: for [her] hair is given her for a covering.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:15 maar as ’n vrou lang hare dra, dit vir haar ’n eer is, omdat die lang hare vir haar gegee is as ’n bedekking?

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:16 But if any man seem to be contentious, we have no such custom, neither the churches of God.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:16 Maar as iemand meen om twisgierig te wees, ons het nie so ’n gewoonte nie, en ook die gemeentes van God nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:17 Now in this that I declare [unto you] I praise [you] not, that ye come together not for the better, but for the worse.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:17 MAAR terwyl ek dit beveel, kan ek dit nie prys nie dat julle saamkom, nie ten goede nie maar ten kwade.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:18 For first of all, when ye come together in the church, I hear that there be divisions among you; and I partly believe it.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:18 Want in die eerste plek hoor ek dat, as julle saamkom in die gemeente, daar skeuringe onder julle is, en gedeeltelik glo ek dit.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:19 For there must be also heresies among you, that they which are approved may be made manifest among you.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:19 Want daar moet ook partyskappe onder julle wees, sodat die beproefdes onder julle openbaar kan word.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:20 When ye come together therefore into one place, [this] is not to eat the Lord's supper.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:20 As julle dus saamkom, dan wil dit nie sê dat julle die nagmaal van die Here eet nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:21 For in eating every one taketh before [other] his own supper: and one is hungry, and another is drunken.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:21 Want as julle eet, gebruik elkeen eers sy eie ete; en die een het honger en die ander is dronk.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:22 What? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in? or despise ye the church of God, and shame them that have not? What shall I say to you? shall I praise you in this? I praise [you] not.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:22 Het julle dan geen huise om in te eet en te drink nie? Of verag julle die gemeente van God, en maak julle dié beskaamd wat nie het nie? Wat sal ek vir julle sê? Sal ek julle prys? Hierin prys ek julle nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:23 For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you, That the Lord Jesus the [same] night in which he was betrayed took bread:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:23 Want ek het van die Here ontvang wat ek ook aan julle oorgelewer het, dat die Here Jesus in die nag waarin Hy verraai is, brood geneem het;

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:24 And when he had given thanks, he brake [it], and said, Take, eat: this is my body, which is broken for you: this do in remembrance of me.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:24 en nadat Hy gedank het, het Hy dit gebreek en gesê: Neem, eet; dit is my liggaam wat vir julle gebreek word; doen dit tot my gedagtenis.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:25 After the same manner also [he took] the cup, when he had supped, saying, This cup is the new testament in my blood: this do ye, as oft as ye drink [it], in remembrance of me.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:25 Net so ook die beker ná die ete, met die woorde: Hierdie beker is die nuwe testament in my bloed; doen dit, so dikwels as julle daaruit drink, tot my gedagtenis.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:26 For as often as ye eat this bread, and drink this cup, ye do shew the Lord's death till he come.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:26 Want so dikwels as julle hierdie brood eet en hierdie beker drink, verkondig julle die dood van die Here totdat Hy kom.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:27 Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread, and drink [this] cup of the Lord, unworthily, shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:27 Wie dan op onwaardige wyse hierdie brood eet of die beker van die Here drink, sal skuldig wees aan die liggaam en bloed van die Here.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:28 But let a man examine himself, and so let him eat of [that] bread, and drink of [that] cup.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:28 Maar die mens moet homself beproef en só van die brood eet en uit die beker drink.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:29 For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily, eateth and drinketh damnation to himself, not discerning the Lord's body.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:29 Want wie op onwaardige wyse eet en drink, eet en drink ’n oordeel oor homself, terwyl hy die liggaam van die Here nie onderskei nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:30 For this cause many [are] weak and sickly among you, and many sleep.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:30 Daarom is daar onder julle baie swakkes en sieklikes, en ’n aantal het ontslaap.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:31 For if we would judge ourselves, we should not be judged.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:31 Want as ons onsself beoordeel het, sou ons nie geoordeel word nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:32 But when we are judged, we are chastened of the Lord, that we should not be condemned with the world.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:32 Maar as ons geoordeel word, word ons deur die Here getugtig, sodat ons nie saam met die wêreld veroordeel mag word nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:33 Wherefore, my brethren, when ye come together to eat, tarry one for another.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:33 Daarom, my broeders, as julle saamkom om te eet, wag vir mekaar;

column2: 1 Corinthians 11:34 And if any man hunger, let him eat at home; that ye come not together unto condemnation. And the rest will I set in order when I come.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 11:34 en as iemand honger het, laat hom by die huis eet, sodat julle nie tot ’n oordeel saamkom nie. Die ander sake sal ek reël wanneer ek kom.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:1 Now concerning spiritual [gifts], brethren, I would not have you ignorant.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:1 EN wat die geestelike gawes betref, broeders, wil ek nie hê dat julle onkundig moet wees nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:2 Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:2 Julle weet dat julle heidene was, weggevoer na die stomme afgode net soos julle ook al gelei is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:3 Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and [that] no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:3 Daarom maak ek julle bekend dat niemand wat deur die Gees van God spreek, Jesus ’n vervloeking noem nie; en niemand kan sê dat Jesus die Here is nie, behalwe deur die Heilige Gees.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:4 Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:4 Daar is wel verskeidenheid van genadegawes, maar dit is dieselfde Gees;

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:5 And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:5 en daar is verskeidenheid van bedieninge, en tog is dit dieselfde Here;

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:6 And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:6 en daar is verskeidenheid van werkinge, en tog is dit dieselfde God wat alles in almal werk.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:7 But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:7 Maar aan elkeen word die openbaring van die Gees gegee met die oog op wat nuttig is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:8 For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:8 Want aan die een word deur die Gees ’n woord van wysheid gegee, en aan die ander ’n woord van kennis vanweë dieselfde Gees;

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:9 To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:9 aan ’n ander weer geloof deur dieselfde Gees, en aan ’n ander genadegawes van gesondmaking deur dieselfde Gees;

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:10 To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another [divers] kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:10 aan ’n ander werkinge van kragte, aan ’n ander profesie, aan ’n ander onderskeiding van die geeste, aan ’n ander allerhande tale, aan ’n ander uitleg van tale.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:11 But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:11 Maar al hierdie dinge werk een en dieselfde Gees wat aan elkeen afsonderlik uitdeel soos Hy wil.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:12 For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also [is] Christ.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:12 WANT net soos die liggaam een is en baie lede het, en al die lede van die een liggaam, al is hulle baie, een liggaam is, so ook Christus.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:13 For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether [we be] Jews or Gentiles, whether [we be] bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:13 Want ons is almal ook deur een Gees gedoop tot een liggaam, of ons Jode of Grieke is, slawe of vrymanne; en ons is almal van een Gees deurdronge.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:14 For the body is not one member, but many.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:14 Want ook die liggaam is nie een lid nie, maar baie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:15 If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:15 As die voet sou sê: Omdat ek nie die hand is nie, behoort ek nie aan die liggaam nie — behoort hy daarom nie aan die liggaam nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:16 And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:16 En as die oor sou sê: Omdat ek nie die oog is nie, behoort ek nie aan die liggaam nie — behoort hy daarom nie aan die liggaam nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:17 If the whole body [were] an eye, where [were] the hearing? If the whole [were] hearing, where [were] the smelling?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:17 As die hele liggaam oog was, waar sou die gehoor wees? As dit geheel en al gehoor was, waar sou die reuk wees?

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:18 But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:18 Maar nou het God elkeen van die lede in die liggaam gestel soos Hy gewil het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:19 And if they were all one member, where [were] the body?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:19 As almal een lid was, waar sou die liggaam wees?

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:20 But now [are they] many members, yet but one body.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:20 Maar nou is daar wel baie lede, maar net een liggaam.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:21 And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:21 En die oog kan nie vir die hand sê: Ek het jou nie nodig nie; of ook die hoof vir die voete: Ek het julle nie nodig nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:22 Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:22 Maar veel eerder is dié lede van die liggaam noodsaaklik wat die swakste lyk;

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:23 And those [members] of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely [parts] have more abundant comeliness.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:23 en dié lede van die liggaam wat vir ons minder eerbaar lyk, beklee ons met oorvloediger eer, en so het ons onsierlike lede oorvloediger sierlikheid,

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:24 For our comely [parts] have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that [part] which lacked:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:24 terwyl ons sierlike lede dit nie nodig het nie; maar God het die liggaam saamgestel en aan die misdeelde lid oorvloediger eer gegee,

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:25 That there should be no schism in the body; but [that] the members should have the same care one for another.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:25 sodat daar geen verdeeldheid in die liggaam mag wees nie, maar dat die lede gelyke sorg vir mekaar mag dra.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:26 And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:26 En as een lid ly, ly al die lede saam; en as een lid geëer word, is al die lede saam bly.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:27 Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:27 Maar julle is die liggaam van Christus en lede afsonderlik.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:28 And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:28 En God het sommige in die gemeente gestel: in die eerste plek apostels, ten tweede profete, ten derde leraars, daarna kragte, daarna genadegawes van gesondmaking, helpers, regeringe, allerhande tale.

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:29 [Are] all apostles? [are] all prophets? [are] all teachers? [are] all workers of miracles?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:29 Almal is tog nie apostels nie, almal is tog nie profete nie, almal is tog nie leraars nie, almal is tog nie kragte nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:30 Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:30 Het almal genadegawes van gesondmaking, spreek almal in tale, kan almal dit uitlê?

column2: 1 Corinthians 12:31 But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 12:31 Maar beywer julle met die oog op die beste gawes; en ek wys julle ’n nog uitnemender weg.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:1 Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels, and have not charity, I am become [as] sounding brass, or a tinkling cymbal.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:1 AL sou ek die tale van mense en engele spreek, en ek het nie die liefde nie, dan het ek ’n klinkende metaal of ’n luidende simbaal geword.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:2 And though I have [the gift of] prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, and have not charity, I am nothing.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:2 En al sou ek die gawe van profesie hê en al die geheimenisse weet en al die kennis, en al sou ek al die geloof hê, sodat ek berge kon versit, en ek het nie die liefde nie, dan sou ek niks wees nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:3 And though I bestow all my goods to feed [the poor], and though I give my body to be burned, and have not charity, it profiteth me nothing.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:3 En al sou ek al my goed uitdeel, en al sou ek my liggaam oorgee om verbrand te word, en ek het nie die liefde nie, dan sou dit my niks baat nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:4 Charity suffereth long, [and] is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:4 Die liefde is lankmoedig en vriendelik; die liefde is nie jaloers nie; die liefde praat nie groot nie, is nie opgeblase nie,

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:5 Doth not behave itself unseemly, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:5 handel nie onwelvoeglik nie, soek nie sy eie belang nie, word nie verbitterd nie, reken die kwaad nie toe nie,

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:6 Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:6 is nie bly oor die ongeregtigheid nie, maar is bly saam met die waarheid.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:7 Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:7 Dit bedek alles, glo alles, hoop alles, verdra alles.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:8 Charity never faileth: but whether [there be] prophecies, they shall fail; whether [there be] tongues, they shall cease; whether [there be] knowledge, it shall vanish away.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:8 Die liefde vergaan nimmermeer; maar profesieë — hulle sal tot niet gaan; of tale — hulle sal ophou; of kennis — dit sal tot niet gaan.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:9 For we know in part, and we prophesy in part.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:9 Want ons ken ten dele en ons profeteer ten dele.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:10 But when that which is perfect is come, then that which is in part shall be done away.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:10 Maar as die volmaakte gekom het, dan sal wat ten dele is, tot niet gaan.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:11 When I was a child, I spake as a child, I understood as a child, I thought as a child: but when I became a man, I put away childish things.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:11 Toe ek ’n kind was, het ek gepraat soos ’n kind, gedink soos ’n kind, geredeneer soos ’n kind; maar nou dat ek ’n man is, het ek die dinge van ’n kind afgelê.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:12 For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:12 Want nou sien ons deur ’n spieël in ’n raaisel, maar eendag van aangesig tot aangesig. Nou ken ek ten dele, maar eendag sal ek ten volle ken, net soos ek ten volle geken is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 13:13 And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these [is] charity.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 13:13 En nou bly geloof, hoop, liefde — hierdie drie; maar die grootste hiervan is die liefde.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:1 Follow after charity, and desire spiritual [gifts], but rather that ye may prophesy.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:1 JAAG die liefde na, en beywer julle met die oog op die geestelike gawes, maar veral om te profeteer.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:2 For he that speaketh in an [unknown] tongue speaketh not unto men, but unto God: for no man understandeth [him]; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:2 Want hy wat in ’n taal spreek, spreek nie tot mense nie, maar tot God; want niemand verstaan dit nie, maar deur die Gees spreek hy verborgenhede.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:3 But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men [to] edification, and exhortation, and comfort.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:3 Maar hy wat profeteer, spreek tot die mense woorde van stigting en troos en bemoediging.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:4 He that speaketh in an [unknown] tongue edifieth himself; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:4 Hy wat in ’n taal spreek, stig homself; maar hy wat profeteer, stig die gemeente.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:5 I would that ye all spake with tongues, but rather that ye prophesied: for greater [is] he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues, except he interpret, that the church may receive edifying.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:5 Ek wens dat julle almal in tale spreek, maar nog liewer dat julle profeteer. Want hy wat profeteer, is groter as hy wat in tale spreek, of hy moet dit uitlê, sodat die gemeente stigting kan ontvang.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:6 Now, brethren, if I come unto you speaking with tongues, what shall I profit you, except I shall speak to you either by revelation, or by knowledge, or by prophesying, or by doctrine?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:6 Maar nou, broeders, as ek na julle kom en in tale spreek, tot watter nut sal ek vir julle wees as ek nie met julle spreek òf deur ’n openbaring, òf deur kennis, òf deur profesie, òf deur lering nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:7 And even things without life giving sound, whether pipe or harp, except they give a distinction in the sounds, how shall it be known what is piped or harped?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:7 Net soos met lewelose dinge wat ’n klank gee, ’n fluit of ’n siter, as hulle nie ’n onderskeid in toon laat hoor nie, hoe sal ’n mens weet wat op die fluit of siter gespeel word?

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:8 For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound, who shall prepare himself to the battle?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:8 Want as die basuin ook ’n onduidelike klank gee, wie sal klaarmaak vir die oorlog?

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:9 So likewise ye, except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood, how shall it be known what is spoken? for ye shall speak into the air.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:9 Net so julle ook, as julle met die tong geen verstaanbare woord uitbring nie, hoe sal ’n mens weet wat gespreek word? Want julle sal wees soos mense wat in die wind praat.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:10 There are, it may be, so many kinds of voices in the world, and none of them [is] without signification.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:10 Daar is wie weet hoeveel soorte tale in die wêreld, en geeneen daarvan is sonder klank nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:11 Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice, I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian, and he that speaketh [shall be] a barbarian unto me.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:11 As ek dan die betekenis van die klank nie ken nie, sal ek vir die spreker ’n vreemdeling wees, en die spreker sal vir my ’n vreemdeling wees.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:12 Even so ye, forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual [gifts], seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:12 So moet julle ook, terwyl julle streef na geestelike gawes, probeer om uit te munt tot stigting van die gemeente.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:13 Wherefore let him that speaketh in an [unknown] tongue pray that he may interpret.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:13 Daarom moet hy wat in ’n taal spreek, bid dat hy dit kan uitlê.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:14 For if I pray in an [unknown] tongue, my spirit prayeth, but my understanding is unfruitful.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:14 Want as ek in ’n taal bid, dan bid my gees, maar my verstand is onvrugbaar.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:15 What is it then? I will pray with the spirit, and I will pray with the understanding also: I will sing with the spirit, and I will sing with the understanding also.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:15 Hoe staan die saak dan? Ek sal met die gees bid, maar ek sal ook met die verstand bid. Ek sal met die gees psalmsing, maar ek sal ook met die verstand psalmsing.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:16 Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit, how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks, seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:16 Anders, as jy met die gees dank, hoe sal hy wat die plek van ’n onkundige inneem, amen sê op jou danksegging, aangesien hy nie weet wat jy sê nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:17 For thou verily givest thanks well, but the other is not edified.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:17 Want jy dank wel goed, maar die ander een word nie gestig nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:18 I thank my God, I speak with tongues more than ye all:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:18 Ek dank my God dat ek meer in tale spreek as julle almal;

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:19 Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding, that [by my voice] I might teach others also, than ten thousand words in an [unknown] tongue.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:19 maar in die gemeente wil ek liewer vyf woorde met my verstand spreek om ook ander te onderrig, as tienduisend woorde in ’n taal.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:20 Brethren, be not children in understanding: howbeit in malice be ye children, but in understanding be men.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:20 Broeders, moenie kinders wees in die verstand nie, maar wees kinders in die boosheid en wees volwassenes in die verstand.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:21 In the law it is written, With [men of] other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people; and yet for all that will they not hear me, saith the Lord.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:21 In die wet is geskrywe: Ek sal deur mense van ander tale en deur ander lippe tot hierdie volk spreek, en ook so sal hulle na My nie luister nie, sê die Here.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:22 Wherefore tongues are for a sign, not to them that believe, but to them that believe not: but prophesying [serveth] not for them that believe not, but for them which believe.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:22 Die tale is dus ’n teken nie vir die gelowiges nie, maar vir die ongelowiges; die profesie egter is nie vir die ongelowiges nie, maar vir die gelowiges.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:23 If therefore the whole church be come together into one place, and all speak with tongues, and there come in [those that are] unlearned, or unbelievers, will they not say that ye are mad?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:23 As die hele gemeente dan saam vergader het en hulle sou almal in tale spreek en daar kom onkundiges of ongelowiges binne, sal hulle nie sê dat julle kranksinnig is nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:24 But if all prophesy, and there come in one that believeth not, or [one] unlearned, he is convinced of all, he is judged of all:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:24 Maar as almal profeteer en daar ’n ongelowige of ’n onkundige binnekom, dan word hy deur almal oortuig, deur almal beoordeel;

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:25 And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest; and so falling down on [his] face he will worship God, and report that God is in you of a truth.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:25 en so kom die geheime van sy hart aan die lig. En so sal hy op sy aangesig val, God aanbid, en verkondig dat God werklik onder julle is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:26 How is it then, brethren? when ye come together, every one of you hath a psalm, hath a doctrine, hath a tongue, hath a revelation, hath an interpretation. Let all things be done unto edifying.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:26 HOE staan die saak dan, broeders? Wanneer julle saamkom, dan het elkeen van julle ’n psalm of ’n lering of ’n taal of ’n openbaring of ’n uitlegging — laat alles tot stigting geskied.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:27 If any man speak in an [unknown] tongue, [let it be] by two, or at the most [by] three, and [that] by course; and let one interpret.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:27 En as iemand in ’n taal spreek, laat dit dan wees twee of hoogstens drie, en by beurte; en laat een dit uitlê.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:28 But if there be no interpreter, let him keep silence in the church; and let him speak to himself, and to God.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:28 Maar as daar geen uitlêer is nie, laat hy in die gemeente swyg, en laat hy met homself en met God spreek.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:29 Let the prophets speak two or three, and let the other judge.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:29 Laat twee of drie profete spreek en die ander dit beoordeel.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:30 If [any thing] be revealed to another that sitteth by, let the first hold his peace.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:30 Maar as daar iets geopenbaar is aan ’n ander wat daar sit, laat die eerste swyg.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:31 For ye may all prophesy one by one, that all may learn, and all may be comforted.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:31 Want julle kan almal een vir een profeteer, sodat almal kan leer en almal bemoedig word.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:32 And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:32 En die geeste van die profete is aan die profete onderworpe;

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:33 For God is not [the author] of confusion, but of peace, as in all churches of the saints.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:33 want God is nie ’n God van wanorde nie, maar van vrede, soos in al die gemeentes van die heiliges.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:34 Let your women keep silence in the churches: for it is not permitted unto them to speak; but [they are commanded] to be under obedience, as also saith the law.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:34 Julle vroue moet in die gemeentes swyg; want dit is hulle nie toegelaat om te spreek nie, maar om onderdanig te wees, soos die wet ook sê.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:35 And if they will learn any thing, let them ask their husbands at home: for it is a shame for women to speak in the church.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:35 Maar as hulle iets wil leer, laat hulle tuis hul eie mans vra, want dit is lelik vir vroue om in die gemeente te spreek.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:36 What? came the word of God out from you? or came it unto you only?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:36 Of het die woord van God van julle uitgegaan, of het dit tot julle alleen gekom?

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:37 If any man think himself to be a prophet, or spiritual, let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:37 As iemand meen dat hy ’n profeet of ’n geestelike mens is, moet hy erken dat wat ek aan julle skrywe, bevele van die Here is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:38 But if any man be ignorant, let him be ignorant.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:38 Maar as iemand onkundig is, laat hom onkundig bly.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:39 Wherefore, brethren, covet to prophesy, and forbid not to speak with tongues.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:39 Daarom, broeders, beywer julle om te profeteer en moenie verhinder dat daar in tale gespreek word nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 14:40 Let all things be done decently and in order.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 14:40 Laat alles welvoeglik en ordelik toegaan.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:1 Moreover, brethren, I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you, which also ye have received, and wherein ye stand;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:1 BROEDERS, ek maak julle die evangelie bekend wat ek aan julle verkondig het, wat julle ook aangeneem het, waarin julle ook staan,

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:2 By which also ye are saved, if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you, unless ye have believed in vain.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:2 waardeur julle ook gered word as julle daaraan vashou op die wyse waarop ek dit aan julle verkondig het, of julle moet tevergeefs geglo het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:3 For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received, how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures;
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:3 Want in die eerste plek het ek aan julle oorgelewer wat ek ook ontvang het, dat Christus vir ons sondes gesterf het volgens die Skrifte;

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:4 And that he was buried, and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:4 en dat Hy begrawe is, en dat Hy op die derde dag opgewek is volgens die Skrifte;

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:5 And that he was seen of Cephas, then of the twelve:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:5 en dat Hy aan Céfas verskyn het; daarna aan die twaalf.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:6 After that, he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once; of whom the greater part remain unto this present, but some are fallen asleep.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:6 Daarna het Hy verskyn aan oor die vyfhonderd broeders tegelyk, waarvan die meeste nou nog lewe, maar sommige al ontslaap het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:7 After that, he was seen of James; then of all the apostles.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:7 Daarna het Hy verskyn aan Jakobus; daarna aan al die apostels;

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:8 And last of all he was seen of me also, as of one born out of due time.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:8 en laaste van almal het Hy verskyn ook aan my as die ontydig geborene.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:9 For I am the least of the apostles, that am not meet to be called an apostle, because I persecuted the church of God.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:9 Want ek is die geringste van die apostels, wat nie werd is om ’n apostel genoem te word nie, omdat ek die gemeente van God vervolg het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:10 But by the grace of God I am what I am: and his grace which [was bestowed] upon me was not in vain; but I laboured more abundantly than they all: yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:10 Maar deur die genade van God is ek wat ek is, en sy genade aan my was nie tevergeefs nie; maar ek het oorvloediger gearbei as hulle almal; nogtans nie ek nie, maar die genade van God wat met my is.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:11 Therefore whether [it were] I or they, so we preach, and so ye believed.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:11 Of dit nou ek of hulle is, so preek ons en so het julle geglo.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:12 Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead, how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:12 As dit dan gepreek word dat Christus uit die dode opgewek is, hoe sê sommige onder julle dat daar geen opstanding van die dode is nie?

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:13 But if there be no resurrection of the dead, then is Christ not risen:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:13 As daar geen opstanding van die dode is nie, dan is Christus ook nie opgewek nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:14 And if Christ be not risen, then [is] our preaching vain, and your faith [is] also vain.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:14 En as Christus nie opgewek is nie, dan is ons prediking vergeefs en vergeefs ook julle geloof;

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:15 Yea, and we are found false witnesses of God; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ: whom he raised not up, if so be that the dead rise not.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:15 en dan word ons valse getuies van God bevind, omdat ons teen God getuig het dat Hy Christus opgewek het, wat Hy nie opgewek het nie, ten minste as die dode nie opgewek word nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:16 For if the dead rise not, then is not Christ raised:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:16 Want as die dode nie opgewek word nie, dan is Christus ook nie opgewek nie;

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:17 And if Christ be not raised, your faith [is] vain; ye are yet in your sins.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:17 en as Christus nie opgewek is nie, dan is julle geloof nutteloos, dan is julle nog in julle sondes;

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:18 Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:18 dan is ook die wat in Christus ontslaap het, verlore.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:19 If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:19 As ons net vir hierdie lewe op Christus hoop, dan is ons die ellendigste van alle mense.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:20 But now is Christ risen from the dead, [and] become the firstfruits of them that slept.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:20 Maar nou, Christus is opgewek uit die dode; Hy het die eersteling geword van die wat ontslaap het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:21 For since by man [came] death, by man [came] also the resurrection of the dead.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:21 Want aangesien die dood deur ’n mens is, is die opstanding van die dode ook deur ’n mens.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:22 For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:22 Want soos hulle almal in Adam sterwe, so sal hulle ook almal in Christus lewend gemaak word;

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:23 But every man in his own order: Christ the firstfruits; afterward they that are Christ's at his coming.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:23 maar elkeen in sy eie orde: as eersteling Christus, daarna die wat aan Christus behoort by sy koms.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:24 Then [cometh] the end, when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God, even the Father; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:24 Daarna kom die einde, wanneer Hy die koninkryk aan God die Vader oorgee, as Hy alle heerskappy en alle gesag en mag vernietig het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:25 For he must reign, till he hath put all enemies under his feet.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:25 Want Hy moet as koning heers totdat Hy al sy vyande onder sy voete gestel het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:26 The last enemy [that] shall be destroyed [is] death.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:26 Die laaste vyand wat vernietig word, is die dood.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:27 For he hath put all things under his feet. But when he saith all things are put under [him, it is] manifest that he is excepted, which did put all things under him.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:27 Want Hy het alles aan sy voete onderwerp, maar wanneer Hy sê dat alles onderwerp is, is dit duidelik dat Hy uitgesonder is wat alles aan Hom onderwerp het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:28 And when all things shall be subdued unto him, then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him, that God may be all in all.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:28 En wanneer alles aan Hom onderwerp is, dan sal ook die Seun self Hom onderwerp aan die Een wat alles aan Hom onderwerp het, sodat God alles in almal kan wees.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:29 Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead, if the dead rise not at all? why are they then baptized for the dead?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:29 Anders, wat sal hulle doen wat hulle vir die dode laat doop, as die dode geheel en al nie opgewek word nie? Waarom laat hulle hul nog vir die dode doop?

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:30 And why stand we in jeopardy every hour?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:30 Waarom is ons ook elke uur in gevaar?

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:31 I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord, I die daily.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:31 Ek sterf dag vir dag, broeders, so waar as ek op julle roem in Christus Jesus, onse Here.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:32 If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus, what advantageth it me, if the dead rise not? let us eat and drink; for to morrow we die.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:32 As ek in Éfese op menslike wyse met wilde diere geveg het, watter voordeel was dit vir my? As die dode nie opgewek word nie, laat ons dan eet en drink, want môre sterf ons!

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:33 Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:33 Moenie dwaal nie; slegte gesprekke bederf goeie sedes.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:34 Awake to righteousness, and sin not; for some have not the knowledge of God: I speak [this] to your shame.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:34 Wees nugter op die regte manier, en sondig nie; want sommige het geen kennis van God nie. Ek sê dit tot julle beskaming.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:35 But some [man] will say, How are the dead raised up? and with what body do they come?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:35 Maar iemand sal sê: Hoe word die dode opgewek, en met hoedanige liggaam kom hulle?

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:36 [Thou] fool, that which thou sowest is not quickened, except it die:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:36 Dwase mens! Wat jy saai, word nie lewendig as dit nie gesterf het nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:37 And that which thou sowest, thou sowest not that body that shall be, but bare grain, it may chance of wheat, or of some other [grain]:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:37 En wat jy saai — jy saai nie die liggaam wat sal word nie, maar ’n blote korrel, byvoorbeeld van koring of van iets anders.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:38 But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him, and to every seed his own body.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:38 Maar God gee dit ’n liggaam soos Hy gewil het, en aan elkeen van die saadkorrels sy eie liggaam.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:39 All flesh [is] not the same flesh: but [there is] one [kind of] flesh of men, another flesh of beasts, another of fishes, [and] another of birds.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:39 Alle vlees is nie dieselfde vlees nie, maar die vlees van mense is anders as die vlees van vee, en dié van visse anders as dié van voëls.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:40 [There are] also celestial bodies, and bodies terrestrial: but the glory of the celestial [is] one, and the [glory] of the terrestrial [is] another.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:40 En daar is hemelse liggame en aardse liggame; maar die heerlikheid van die hemelse is anders as dié van die aardse.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:41 [There is] one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars: for [one] star differeth from [another] star in glory.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:41 Anders is die heerlikheid van die son en anders die heerlikheid van die maan en anders die heerlikheid van die sterre; want die een ster verskil in heerlikheid van die ander ster.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:42 So also [is] the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:42 So is ook die opstanding van die dode: daar word gesaai in verganklikheid, daar word opgewek in onverganklikheid;

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:43 It is sown in dishonour; it is raised in glory: it is sown in weakness; it is raised in power:
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:43 daar word gesaai in oneer, daar word opgewek in heerlikheid; daar word gesaai in swakheid, daar word opgewek in krag.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:44 It is sown a natural body; it is raised a spiritual body. There is a natural body, and there is a spiritual body.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:44 ’n Natuurlike liggaam word gesaai, ’n geestelike liggaam word opgewek. Daar is ’n natuurlike liggaam, en daar is ’n geestelike liggaam.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:45 And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam [was made] a quickening spirit.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:45 So is daar ook geskrywe: Die eerste mens, Adam, het ’n lewende siel geword; die laaste Adam ’n lewendmakende Gees.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:46 Howbeit that [was] not first which is spiritual, but that which is natural; and afterward that which is spiritual.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:46 Die geestelike ewenwel is nie eerste nie, maar die natuurlike; daarna die geestelike.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:47 The first man [is] of the earth, earthy: the second man [is] the Lord from heaven.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:47 Die eerste mens was uit die aarde aards, die tweede mens is die Here uit die hemel.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:48 As [is] the earthy, such [are] they also that are earthy: and as [is] the heavenly, such [are] they also that are heavenly.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:48 Soos die aardse mens was, so is ook die aardse mense; en soos die hemelse mens is, so is ook die hemelse mense.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:49 And as we have borne the image of the earthy, we shall also bear the image of the heavenly.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:49 En soos ons die beeld van die aardse gedra het, so sal ons ook die beeld van die hemelse dra.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:50 Now this I say, brethren, that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:50 Maar dit verklaar ek, broeders, dat vlees en bloed die koninkryk van God nie kan beërwe nie; ook beërwe die verganklikheid nie die onverganklikheid nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:51 Behold, I shew you a mystery; We shall not all sleep, but we shall all be changed,
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:51 Kyk, ek deel julle ’n verborgenheid mee: Ons sal wel nie almal ontslaap nie, maar ons sal almal verander word,

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:52 In a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trump: for the trumpet shall sound, and the dead shall be raised incorruptible, and we shall be changed.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:52 in ’n oomblik, in ’n oogwink, by die laaste basuin; want die basuin sal weerklink, en die dode sal onverganklik opgewek word; en ons sal verander word.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:53 For this corruptible must put on incorruption, and this mortal [must] put on immortality.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:53 Want hierdie verganklike moet met onverganklikheid beklee word, en hierdie sterflike moet met onsterflikheid beklee word.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:54 So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:54 En wanneer hierdie verganklike met onverganklikheid beklee is en hierdie sterflike met onsterflikheid beklee is, dan sal vervul word die woord wat geskrywe is: Die dood is verslind in die oorwinning.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:55 O death, where [is] thy sting? O grave, where [is] thy victory?
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:55 Dood, waar is jou angel? Doderyk, waar is jou oorwinning?

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:56 The sting of death [is] sin; and the strength of sin [is] the law.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:56 Die angel van die dood is die sonde, en die krag van die sonde is die wet.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:57 But thanks [be] to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:57 Maar God sy dank, wat ons die oorwinning gee deur onse Here Jesus Christus.

column2: 1 Corinthians 15:58 Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 15:58 Daarom, my geliefde broeders, wees standvastig, onbeweeglik, altyd oorvloedig in die werk van die Here, omdat julle weet dat julle arbeid in die Here nie tevergeefs is nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:1 Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:1 WAT die insameling vir die heiliges betref, moet julle ook so doen soos ek vir die gemeentes van Galásië gereël het.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:2 Upon the first [day] of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as [God] hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:2 Op elke eerste dag van die week moet elkeen van julle self opsy sit en opspaar namate sy voorspoed is, sodat die insamelinge nie eers plaasvind as ek kom nie.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:3 And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by [your] letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:3 En wanneer ek aangekom het, sal ek die persone wat julle goedkeur, met briewe stuur om julle gawe na Jerusalem te bring.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:4 And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:4 En as dit die moeite werd is dat ek ook gaan, kan hulle saam met my reis.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:5 Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:5 MAAR ek sal na julle kom nadat ek deur Macedónië gereis het, want ek gaan deur Macedónië.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:6 And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:6 En moontlik sal ek by julle vertoef of ook oorwinter, sodat julle my kan voorthelp waarheen ek ook al mag reis.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:7 For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:7 Want ek wil julle nie nou net in die verbygaan sien nie, maar ek hoop om ’n tyd lank by julle te bly as die Here dit toelaat.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:8 But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:8 Maar ek sal in Éfese bly tot Pinkster toe.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:9 For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and [there are] many adversaries.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:9 Want ’n groot en kragtige deur het vir my oopgegaan, en daar is baie teëstanders.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:10 Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also [do].
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:10 En as Timótheüs kom, sorg dat hy sonder vrees by julle is, want hy doen die werk van die Here net soos ek.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:11 Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.
column3: 1 Korinthiers 16:11 Laat niemand hom dan minag nie, maar help hom verder in vrede, dat hy na my toe kan kom; want ek wag vir hom saam met die broeders.

column2: 1 Corinthians 16:12 As touching [our] brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
