column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:2 Ek het dit vroeër gesê, en ek sê dit vooruit soos toe ek die tweede keer aanwesig was, en ek skrywe dit nou in my afwesigheid aan die wat vroeër gesondig het en aan al die ander, dat as ek weer kom, ek nie sal spaar nie,

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:3 Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me, which to you-ward is not weak, but is mighty in you.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:3 aangesien julle ’n bewys soek van Christus wat in my spreek, en Hy is teenoor julle nie swak nie, maar kragtig onder julle.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:4 For though he was crucified through weakness, yet he liveth by the power of God. For we also are weak in him, but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:4 Want al is Hy gekruisig uit swakheid, lewe Hy tog uit die krag van God. Want ons is ook swak in Hom, maar ons sal saam met Hom vir julle lewe deur die krag van God.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:5 Examine yourselves, whether ye be in the faith; prove your own selves. Know ye not your own selves, how that Jesus Christ is in you, except ye be reprobates?
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:5 Ondersoek julself of julle in die geloof is; stel julself op die proef. Of is julle nie seker van julself dat Jesus Christus in julle is nie — as julle ten minste nie verwerplik is nie!

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:6 But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:6 Maar ek hoop dat julle sal insien dat ons nie verwerplik is nie.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:7 Now I pray to God that ye do no evil; not that we should appear approved, but that ye should do that which is honest, though we be as reprobates.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:7 Ek bid God dat julle geen kwaad mag doen nie — nie dat ons beproef mag blyk nie, maar dat julle kan doen wat goed is, en ons as verwerplikes kan wees.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:8 For we can do nothing against the truth, but for the truth.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:8 Want ons kan niks doen teen die waarheid nie, maar wel vír die waarheid.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:9 For we are glad, when we are weak, and ye are strong: and this also we wish, [even] your perfection.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:9 Want ons is bly as ons swak is en julle sterk. En hierom bid ons ook, naamlik om julle volmaking.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:10 Therefore I write these things being absent, lest being present I should use sharpness, according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification, and not to destruction.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:10 Daarom skryf ek dit in my afwesigheid om nie, as ek teenwoordig is, strengheid te gebruik nie, volgens die gesag wat die Here my gegee het om op te bou en nie om af te breek nie.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:11 Finally, brethren, farewell. Be perfect, be of good comfort, be of one mind, live in peace; and the God of love and peace shall be with you.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:11 Verder, broeders, wees bly; word volmaak; laat julle vermaan; wees eensgesind; hou vrede, en die God van liefde en vrede sal met julle wees.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:12 Greet one another with an holy kiss.
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:12 Groet mekaar met ’n heilige kus. Al die heiliges groet julle.

column2: 2 Corinthians 13:13 All the saints salute you.

2 Corinthians 13:14 The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost, [be] with you all. Amen. <<[The second [epistle] to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, [a city] of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.]>>
column3: 2 Korinthiers 13:13 Die genade van die Here Jesus Christus en die liefde van God en die gemeenskap van die Heilige Gees sy met julle almal! Amen.

column2: Galatians 1:1 Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)
column3: Galasiers 1:1 PAULUS, ’n apostel nie vanweë mense of deur ’n mens nie, maar deur Jesus Christus en God die Vader wat Hom uit die dode opgewek het,

column2: Galatians 1:2 And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:
column3: Galasiers 1:2 en al die broeders wat by my is — aan die gemeentes van Galásië:

column2: Galatians 1:3 Grace [be] to you and peace from God the Father, and [from] our Lord Jesus Christ,
column3: Galasiers 1:3 Genade vir julle en vrede van God die Vader en onse Here Jesus Christus,

column2: Galatians 1:4 Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:
column3: Galasiers 1:4 wat Homself gegee het vir ons sondes, sodat Hy ons kan uitred uit die teenwoordige bose wêreld, volgens die wil van onse God en Vader,

column2: Galatians 1:5 To whom [be] glory for ever and ever. Amen.
column3: Galasiers 1:5 aan wie die heerlikheid toekom in alle ewigheid! Amen.

column2: Galatians 1:6 I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:
column3: Galasiers 1:6 EK verwonder my dat julle so gou afvallig word van hom wat julle deur die genade van Christus geroep het, na ’n ander evangelie toe,

column2: Galatians 1:7 Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.
column3: Galasiers 1:7 terwyl daar geen ander is nie; behalwe dat daar sommige mense is wat julle in die war bring en die evangelie van Christus wil verdraai.

column2: Galatians 1:8 But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
column3: Galasiers 1:8 Maar al sou ons of ’n engel uit die hemel julle ’n evangelie verkondig in stryd met die wat ons julle verkondig het, laat hom ’n vervloeking wees!

column2: Galatians 1:9 As we said before, so say I now again, If any [man] preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed.
column3: Galasiers 1:9 Soos ons vantevore gesê het, sê ek nou ook weer: As iemand julle ’n evangelie verkondig in stryd met die wat julle ontvang het, laat hom ’n vervloeking wees!

column2: Galatians 1:10 For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.
column3: Galasiers 1:10 Soek ek dan nou die guns van mense, of van God? Of probeer ek om mense te behaag? As ek nog mense behaag, dan sou ek nie ’n dienskneg van Christus wees nie.

column2: Galatians 1:11 But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man.
column3: Galasiers 1:11 Maar ek maak julle bekend, broeders, dat die evangelie wat deur my verkondig is, nie na die mens is nie.

column2: Galatians 1:12 For I neither received it of man, neither was I taught [it], but by the revelation of Jesus Christ.
column3: Galasiers 1:12 Want ek het dit ook nie van ’n mens ontvang of geleer nie, maar deur ’n openbaring van Jesus Christus.

column2: Galatians 1:13 For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews' religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and wasted it:
column3: Galasiers 1:13 Want julle het gehoor van my lewenswandel vroeër in die Jodedom, dat ek die gemeente van God uitermate vervolg en dit verwoes het;

column2: Galatians 1:14 And profited in the Jews' religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.
column3: Galasiers 1:14 en dat ek in die Jodedom vooruitgegaan het bo baie van my leeftyd onder my stamgenote, terwyl ek veral ’n yweraar was vir die oorleweringe van my voorvaders.

column2: Galatians 1:15 But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother's womb, and called [me] by his grace,
column3: Galasiers 1:15 Maar toe dit God behaag het, wat my afgesonder het van die skoot van my moeder af en deur sy genade geroep het,

column2: Galatians 1:16 To reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:
column3: Galasiers 1:16 om sy Seun in my te openbaar, sodat ek Hom onder die heidene sou verkondig, het ek dadelik nie vlees en bloed geraadpleeg nie,

column2: Galatians 1:17 Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me; but I went into Arabia, and returned again unto Damascus.
column3: Galasiers 1:17 en ook nie na Jerusalem opgegaan na die wat voor my apostels was nie, maar na Arabië vertrek en weer teruggekom na Damaskus.

column2: Galatians 1:18 Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and abode with him fifteen days.
column3: Galasiers 1:18 Vervolgens, drie jaar daarna, het ek na Jerusalem opgegaan om met Petrus kennis te maak en vyftien dae by hom gebly;

column2: Galatians 1:19 But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord's brother.
column3: Galasiers 1:19 en ek het niemand anders van die apostels gesien nie, behalwe Jakobus, die broer van die Here.

column2: Galatians 1:20 Now the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.
column3: Galasiers 1:20 En wat ek julle skryf — voor die aangesig van God, ek lieg nie!

column2: Galatians 1:21 Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;
column3: Galasiers 1:21 Daarna het ek gekom in die streke van Sírië en Cilícië;

column2: Galatians 1:22 And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ:
column3: Galasiers 1:22 en ek was persoonlik onbekend by die Christelike gemeentes van Judéa;

column2: Galatians 1:23 But they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.
column3: Galasiers 1:23 hulle het net gehoor: hy wat ons vroeër vervolg het, verkondig nou die geloof wat hy vroeër besig was om uit te roei.

column2: Galatians 1:24 And they glorified God in me.
column3: Galasiers 1:24 En hulle het God verheerlik in my.

column2: Galatians 2:1 Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas, and took Titus with [me] also.
column3: Galasiers 2:1 DAARNA, veertien jaar later, het ek weer na Jerusalem opgegaan met Bárnabas, en Titus ook saamgeneem.

column2: Galatians 2:2 And I went up by revelation, and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles, but privately to them which were of reputation, lest by any means I should run, or had run, in vain.
column3: Galasiers 2:2 Maar ek het opgegaan op grond van ’n openbaring en hulle die evangelie voorgelê wat ek onder die heidene verkondig; en afsonderlik aan die wat in aansien was, dat ek nie miskien tevergeefs sou loop of geloop het nie.

column2: Galatians 2:3 But neither Titus, who was with me, being a Greek, was compelled to be circumcised:
column3: Galasiers 2:3 Maar selfs is Titus, wat by my was, nie gedwing om besny te word nie, alhoewel hy ’n Griek is;

column2: Galatians 2:4 And that because of false brethren unawares brought in, who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage:
column3: Galasiers 2:4 en dit vanweë die ingesmokkelde valse broeders wat ingesluip het om ons vryheid te bespied wat ons in Christus Jesus het, sodat hulle ons in diensbaarheid kon bring;

column2: Galatians 2:5 To whom we gave place by subjection, no, not for an hour; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you.
column3: Galasiers 2:5 aan wie ons selfs nie ’n oomblik in onderworpenheid toegegee het nie, sodat die waarheid van die evangelie by julle bestendig sou bly.

column2: Galatians 2:6 But of these who seemed to be somewhat, (whatsoever they were, it maketh no matter to me: God accepteth no man's person:) for they who seemed [to be somewhat] in conference added nothing to me:
column3: Galasiers 2:6 Maar van die wat in aansien was — wat hulle vroeër was, maak by my geen verskil nie; God neem die persoon van die mens nie aan nie — hulle dan wat in aansien was, het my niks meer opgelê nie.

column2: Galatians 2:7 But contrariwise, when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me, as [the gospel] of the circumcision [was] unto Peter;
column3: Galasiers 2:7 Maar, inteendeel, toe hulle sien dat aan my die evangelie vir die onbesnedenes toevertrou is, net soos aan Petrus dié vir die besnedenes

column2: Galatians 2:8 (For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision, the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles:)
column3: Galasiers 2:8 — want Hy wat Petrus bekragtig het met die oog op die apostelskap vir die besnedenes, het my ook bekragtig met die oog op die heidene —

column2: Galatians 2:9 And when James, Cephas, and John, who seemed to be pillars, perceived the grace that was given unto me, they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship; that we [should go] unto the heathen, and they unto the circumcision.
column3: Galasiers 2:9 en toe hulle merk die genade wat aan my gegee is, het Jakobus en Céfas en Johannes, wat as pilare geag is, aan my en Bárnabas die regterhand van gemeenskap gegee, sodat ons na die heidene en hulle na die besnedenes kon gaan;

column2: Galatians 2:10 Only [they would] that we should remember the poor; the same which I also was forward to do.
column3: Galasiers 2:10 alleen moes ons aan die armes dink, wat ek my juis ook beywer het om te doen.

column2: Galatians 2:11 But when Peter was come to Antioch, I withstood him to the face, because he was to be blamed.
column3: Galasiers 2:11 Maar toe Petrus in Antiochíë gekom het, het ek hom openlik teëgestaan, omdat hy veroordeeld gestaan het.

column2: Galatians 2:12 For before that certain came from James, he did eat with the Gentiles: but when they were come, he withdrew and separated himself, fearing them which were of the circumcision.
column3: Galasiers 2:12 Want voordat sommige van Jakobus af gekom het, was hy gewoond om saam met die heidene te eet; maar ná hulle koms het hy hom teruggetrek en hom eenkant gehou uit vrees vir die wat uit die besnydenis is.

column2: Galatians 2:13 And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation.
column3: Galasiers 2:13 En saam met hom het ook die ander Jode geveins, sodat selfs Bárnabas hom laat meevoer het deur hulle geveins.

column2: Galatians 2:14 But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel, I said unto Peter before [them] all, If thou, being a Jew, livest after the manner of Gentiles, and not as do the Jews, why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews?
column3: Galasiers 2:14 Maar toe ek sien dat hulle nie reguit loop volgens die waarheid van die evangelie nie, het ek vir Petrus in teenwoordigheid van almal gesê: As jy wat ’n Jood is, soos ’n heiden lewe en nie soos ’n Jood nie, waarom dwing jy die heidene om soos Jode te lewe?

column2: Galatians 2:15 We [who are] Jews by nature, and not sinners of the Gentiles,
column3: Galasiers 2:15 Ons wat van nature Jode en nie sondaars uit die heidene is nie,

column2: Galatians 2:16 Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Jesus Christ, that we might be justified by the faith of Christ, and not by the works of the law: for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.
column3: Galasiers 2:16 terwyl ons weet dat die mens nie geregverdig word uit die werke van die wet nie, maar alleen deur die geloof in Jesus Christus, selfs ons het in Christus Jesus geglo, sodat ons geregverdig kan word uit die geloof in Christus en nie uit die werke van die wet nie; omdat uit die werke van die wet geen vlees geregverdig sal word nie.

column2: Galatians 2:17 But if, while we seek to be justified by Christ, we ourselves also are found sinners, [is] therefore Christ the minister of sin? God forbid.
column3: Galasiers 2:17 Maar as ons wat streef om in Christus geregverdig te word, self ook sondaars bevind is, is Christus dan ’n dienaar van die sonde? Nee, stellig nie!

column2: Galatians 2:18 For if I build again the things which I destroyed, I make myself a transgressor.
column3: Galasiers 2:18 Want as ek weer opbou wat ek afgebreek het, dan betoon ek myself ’n oortreder;

column2: Galatians 2:19 For I through the law am dead to the law, that I might live unto God.
column3: Galasiers 2:19 want deur die wet is ek vir die wet dood om vir God te lewe.

column2: Galatians 2:20 I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
column3: Galasiers 2:20 Ek is met Christus gekruisig, en ék leef nie meer nie, maar Christus leef in my. En wat ek nou in die vlees lewe, leef ek deur die geloof in die Seun van God wat my liefgehad het en Homself vir my oorgegee het.

column2: Galatians 2:21 I do not frustrate the grace of God: for if righteousness [come] by the law, then Christ is dead in vain.
column3: Galasiers 2:21 Ek verwerp nie die genade van God nie; want as daar geregtigheid deur die wet is, dan het Christus tevergeefs gesterwe.

column2: Galatians 3:1 O foolish Galatians, who hath bewitched you, that ye should not obey the truth, before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth, crucified among you?
column3: Galasiers 3:1 O, ONVERSTANDIGE Galásiërs, wie het julle betower om die waarheid nie gehoorsaam te wees nie, julle voor wie se oë Jesus Christus afgeskilder is as onder julle gekruisig?

column2: Galatians 3:2 This only would I learn of you, Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?
column3: Galasiers 3:2 Dit alleen wil ek van julle weet: het julle die Gees ontvang uit die werke van die wet of uit die prediking van die geloof?

column2: Galatians 3:3 Are ye so foolish? having begun in the Spirit, are ye now made perfect by the flesh?
column3: Galasiers 3:3 Is julle so onverstandig? Nadat julle met die Gees begin het, eindig julle nou met die vlees?

column2: Galatians 3:4 Have ye suffered so many things in vain? if [it be] yet in vain.
column3: Galasiers 3:4 Het julle verniet so baie gely? As dit maar verniet was!

column2: Galatians 3:5 He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit, and worketh miracles among you, [doeth he it] by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?
column3: Galasiers 3:5 Hy wat julle dan die Gees verleen en kragte onder julle werk, doen Hy dit uit die werke van die wet of uit die prediking van die geloof?

column2: Galatians 3:6 Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
column3: Galasiers 3:6 Net soos Abraham in God geglo het, en dit is hom tot geregtigheid gereken.

column2: Galatians 3:7 Know ye therefore that they which are of faith, the same are the children of Abraham.
column3: Galasiers 3:7 Julle verstaan dan dat die wat uit die geloof is, hulle is kinders van Abraham.

column2: Galatians 3:8 And the scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith, preached before the gospel unto Abraham, [saying], In thee shall all nations be blessed.
column3: Galasiers 3:8 En die Skrif wat vooruit gesien het dat God die heidene uit die geloof sou regverdig, het vooraf aan Abraham die evangelie verkondig met die woorde: In jou sal al die volke geseën word.

column2: Galatians 3:9 So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham.
column3: Galasiers 3:9 Sodat die wat uit die geloof is, geseën word saam met die gelowige Abraham.

column2: Galatians 3:10 For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse: for it is written, Cursed [is] every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them.
column3: Galasiers 3:10 Want almal wat uit die werke van die wet is, is onder die vloek; want daar is geskrywe: Vervloek is elkeen wat nie bly in alles wat geskryf is in die boek van die wet om dit te doen nie.

column2: Galatians 3:11 But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God, [it is] evident: for, The just shall live by faith.
column3: Galasiers 3:11 En dat niemand deur die wet by God geregverdig word nie, is duidelik; want die regverdige sal uit die geloof lewe.

column2: Galatians 3:12 And the law is not of faith: but, The man that doeth them shall live in them.
column3: Galasiers 3:12 Maar die wet is nie uit die geloof nie, maar die mens wat hierdie dinge doen, sal daardeur lewe.

column2: Galatians 3:13 Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us: for it is written, Cursed [is] every one that hangeth on a tree:
column3: Galasiers 3:13 Christus het ons losgekoop van die vloek van die wet deur vir ons ’n vloek te word — want daar is geskrywe: Vervloek is elkeen wat aan ’n hout hang —

column2: Galatians 3:14 That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.
column3: Galasiers 3:14 sodat die seën van Abraham na die heidene kan kom in Christus Jesus, en dat ons die belofte van die Gees deur die geloof kan ontvang.

column2: Galatians 3:15 Brethren, I speak after the manner of men; Though [it be] but a man's covenant, yet [if it be] confirmed, no man disannulleth, or addeth thereto.
column3: Galasiers 3:15 Broeders, ek spreek menslikerwys: selfs ’n mens se testament wat bekragtig is, maak niemand tot niet of voeg daaraan toe nie.

column2: Galatians 3:16 Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made. He saith not, And to seeds, as of many; but as of one, And to thy seed, which is Christ.
column3: Galasiers 3:16 Nou is aan Abraham die beloftes toegesê en aan sy saad. Hy sê nie: En aan die sade, asof dit op baie sien nie, maar op een: En aan jou saad, dit is Christus.

column2: Galatians 3:17 And this I say, [that] the covenant, that was confirmed before of God in Christ, the law, which was four hundred and thirty years after, cannot disannul, that it should make the promise of none effect.
column3: Galasiers 3:17 Maar ek sê dít: die wet wat vierhonderd-en-dertig jaar later gekom het, maak die verbond wat deur God in Christus vantevore bekragtig is, nie kragteloos om die belofte tot niet te maak nie.

column2: Galatians 3:18 For if the inheritance [be] of the law, [it is] no more of promise: but God gave [it] to Abraham by promise.
column3: Galasiers 3:18 Want as die erfenis uit die wet is, dan is dit nie meer uit die belofte nie. Maar God het dit aan Abraham deur ’n belofte genadiglik geskenk.

column2: Galatians 3:19 Wherefore then [serveth] the law? It was added because of transgressions, till the seed should come to whom the promise was made; [and it was] ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator.
column3: Galasiers 3:19 Wat beteken die wet dan? Dit is bygevoeg weens die oortredinge, totdat die saad aan wie die belofte gedoen is, sou kom; en dit is deur engele beskik deur tussenkoms van ’n middelaar.

column2: Galatians 3:20 Now a mediator is not [a mediator] of one, but God is one.
column3: Galasiers 3:20 En die middelaar is nie net vir een nie; maar God is een.

column2: Galatians 3:21 [Is] the law then against the promises of God? God forbid: for if there had been a law given which could have given life, verily righteousness should have been by the law.
column3: Galasiers 3:21 Is die wet dan teen die beloftes van God? Nee, stellig nie! Want as daar ’n wet gegee was wat krag het om lewend te maak, dan sou die geregtigheid werklik uit die wet wees.

column2: Galatians 3:22 But the scripture hath concluded all under sin, that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe.
column3: Galasiers 3:22 Maar die Skrif het alles ingesluit onder die sonde, sodat die belofte uit die geloof in Jesus Christus aan die gelowiges gegee kon word.

column2: Galatians 3:23 But before faith came, we were kept under the law, shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed.
column3: Galasiers 3:23 Maar voordat die geloof gekom het, is ons onder die wet in bewaring gehou, ingesluit met die oog op die geloof wat geopenbaar sou word.

column2: Galatians 3:24 Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster [to bring us] unto Christ, that we might be justified by faith.
column3: Galasiers 3:24 Die wet was dus ons tugmeester na Christus toe, sodat ons geregverdig kan word uit die geloof.

column2: Galatians 3:25 But after that faith is come, we are no longer under a schoolmaster.
column3: Galasiers 3:25 Maar nou dat die geloof gekom het, is ons nie meer onder ’n tugmeester nie.

column2: Galatians 3:26 For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.
column3: Galasiers 3:26 Want julle is almal kinders van God deur die geloof in Christus Jesus;

column2: Galatians 3:27 For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ.
column3: Galasiers 3:27 want julle almal wat in Christus gedoop is, het julle met Christus beklee.

column2: Galatians 3:28 There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither bond nor free, there is neither male nor female: for ye are all one in Christ Jesus.
column3: Galasiers 3:28 Daar is nie meer Jood of Griek nie, daar is nie meer slaaf of vryman nie, daar is nie meer man en vrou nie; want julle is almal een in Christus Jesus.

column2: Galatians 3:29 And if ye [be] Christ's, then are ye Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise.
column3: Galasiers 3:29 En as julle aan Christus behoort, dan is julle die nageslag van Abraham en volgens die belofte erfgename.

column2: Galatians 4:1 Now I say, [That] the heir, as long as he is a child, differeth nothing from a servant, though he be lord of all;
column3: Galasiers 4:1 MAAR ek sê: So lank as die erfgenaam ’n kind is, verskil hy niks van ’n dienskneg nie, al is hy heer van alles;

column2: Galatians 4:2 But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father.
column3: Galasiers 4:2 maar hy staan onder voogde en bestuurders tot op die tyd tevore deur die vader bepaal.

column2: Galatians 4:3 Even so we, when we were children, were in bondage under the elements of the world:
column3: Galasiers 4:3 So was ons ook, toe ons kinders was, in diensbaarheid onder die eerste beginsels van die wêreld.

column2: Galatians 4:4 But when the fulness of the time was come, God sent forth his Son, made of a woman, made under the law,
column3: Galasiers 4:4 Maar toe die volheid van die tyd gekom het, het God sy Seun uitgestuur, gebore uit ’n vrou, gebore onder die wet,

column2: Galatians 4:5 To redeem them that were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of sons.
column3: Galasiers 4:5 om die wat onder die wet was, los te koop, sodat ons die aanneming tot kinders kan ontvang.

column2: Galatians 4:6 And because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father.
column3: Galasiers 4:6 En omdat julle kinders is, het God die Gees van sy Seun in julle harte uitgestuur, en Hy roep: Abba, Vader!

column2: Galatians 4:7 Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.
column3: Galasiers 4:7 Daarom is jy nie meer dienskneg nie, maar kind; en as jy kind is, dan ook erfgenaam van God deur Christus.

column2: Galatians 4:8 Howbeit then, when ye knew not God, ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods.
column3: Galasiers 4:8 Maar destyds, toe julle God nie geken het nie, het julle dié gedien wat van nature geen gode is nie;

column2: Galatians 4:9 But now, after that ye have known God, or rather are known of God, how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements, whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage?
column3: Galasiers 4:9 maar nou dat julle God ken, of liewer deur God geken is, hoe keer julle weer terug tot die swakke en armoedige eerste beginsels wat julle weer van voor af aan wil dien?

column2: Galatians 4:10 Ye observe days, and months, and times, and years.
column3: Galasiers 4:10 Julle neem dae en maande en tye en jare waar.

column2: Galatians 4:11 I am afraid of you, lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain.
column3: Galasiers 4:11 Ek vrees vir julle dat ek miskien tevergeefs aan julle gearbei het.

column2: Galatians 4:12 Brethren, I beseech you, be as I [am]; for I [am] as ye [are]: ye have not injured me at all.
column3: Galasiers 4:12 Broeders, ek bid julle, word soos ek, want ek is ook soos julle. Julle het my geen onreg aangedoen nie;

column2: Galatians 4:13 Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first.
column3: Galasiers 4:13 maar julle weet dat ek ten gevolge van krankheid van die vlees die eerste keer die evangelie aan julle verkondig het;

column2: Galatians 4:14 And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not, nor rejected; but received me as an angel of God, [even] as Christ Jesus.
column3: Galasiers 4:14 en julle het my beproewing in my vlees nie verag of verfoei nie, maar julle het my ontvang as ’n engel van God, ja, as Christus Jesus.

column2: Galatians 4:15 Where is then the blessedness ye spake of? for I bear you record, that, if [it had been] possible, ye would have plucked out your own eyes, and have given them to me.
column3: Galasiers 4:15 Wat was dan julle saligprysing? Want ek getuig van julle dat julle, as dit moontlik was, jul oë uitgegrawe en vir my sou gegee het.

column2: Galatians 4:16 Am I therefore become your enemy, because I tell you the truth?
column3: Galasiers 4:16 Het ek dan julle vyand geword deur julle die waarheid te vertel?

column2: Galatians 4:17 They zealously affect you, [but] not well; yea, they would exclude you, that ye might affect them.
column3: Galasiers 4:17 Hulle ywer vir julle is nie goed nie, maar hulle wil ons buitesluit, sodat julle vir hulle kan ywer.

column2: Galatians 4:18 But [it is] good to be zealously affected always in [a] good [thing], and not only when I am present with you.
column3: Galasiers 4:18 Dit is goed as daar altyd geywer word in ’n goeie saak en nie alleen wanneer ek by julle teenwoordig is nie,

column2: Galatians 4:19 My little children, of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you,
column3: Galasiers 4:19 my kinders, vir wie ek weer in barensnood is totdat Christus in julle ’n gestalte verkry.

column2: Galatians 4:20 I desire to be present with you now, and to change my voice; for I stand in doubt of you.
column3: Galasiers 4:20 EN ek sou wens om nou by julle teenwoordig te wees en my stem te verander, want ek is buite raad met julle.

column2: Galatians 4:21 Tell me, ye that desire to be under the law, do ye not hear the law?
column3: Galasiers 4:21 Julle wat onder die wet wil wees, sê vir my, luister julle nie na die wet nie?

column2: Galatians 4:22 For it is written, that Abraham had two sons, the one by a bondmaid, the other by a freewoman.
column3: Galasiers 4:22 Want daar is geskrywe dat Abraham twee seuns gehad het, een uit die slavin en een uit die vrye.

column2: Galatians 4:23 But he [who was] of the bondwoman was born after the flesh; but he of the freewoman [was] by promise.
column3: Galasiers 4:23 Maar die een uit die slavin is gebore na die vlees, en die ander een uit die vrye deur die belofte.

column2: Galatians 4:24 Which things are an allegory: for these are the two covenants; the one from the mount Sinai, which gendereth to bondage, which is Agar.
column3: Galasiers 4:24 Dit is sinnebeelde, want dié vroue staan vir twee verbonde: een, van die berg Sinai afkomstig, wat vir die slawerny kinders baar — dit is Hagar;

column2: Galatians 4:25 For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia, and answereth to Jerusalem which now is, and is in bondage with her children.
column3: Galasiers 4:25 want Hagar staan vir die berg Sinai in Arabië en kom ooreen met die teenswoordige Jerusalem en is met haar kinders saam in slawerny.

column2: Galatians 4:26 But Jerusalem which is above is free, which is the mother of us all.
column3: Galasiers 4:26 Maar Jerusalem daarbo is vry; en dit is die moeder van ons almal.

column2: Galatians 4:27 For it is written, Rejoice, [thou] barren that bearest not; break forth and cry, thou that travailest not: for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband.
column3: Galasiers 4:27 Want daar is geskrywe: Verbly jou, onvrugbare wat nie baar nie; breek uit en roep, jy wat geen barensnood het nie, want die kinders van die eensame is meer as van haar wat ’n man het.

column2: Galatians 4:28 Now we, brethren, as Isaac was, are the children of promise.
column3: Galasiers 4:28 Maar ons, broeders, is soos Isak, kinders van die belofte;

column2: Galatians 4:29 But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him [that was born] after the Spirit, even so [it is] now.
column3: Galasiers 4:29 maar soos destyds hy wat na die vlees gebore is, hom wat na die Gees was, vervolg het, so is dit nou ook.

column2: Galatians 4:30 Nevertheless what saith the scripture? Cast out the bondwoman and her son: for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman.
column3: Galasiers 4:30 Maar wat sê die Skrif? Werp die slavin en haar seun uit, want nooit mag die seun van die slavin saam met die seun van die vrye erwe nie.

column2: Galatians 4:31 So then, brethren, we are not children of the bondwoman, but of the free.
column3: Galasiers 4:31 Daarom, broeders, ons is nie kinders van die slavin nie, maar van die vrye.

column2: Galatians 5:1 Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
column3: Galasiers 5:1 STAAN dan vas in die vryheid waarmee Christus ons vrygemaak het, en laat julle nie weer onder die juk van diensbaarheid bring nie.

column2: Galatians 5:2 Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.
column3: Galasiers 5:2 Kyk, ek, Paulus, sê vir julle dat as julle jul laat besny, Christus vir julle tot geen nut sal wees nie.

column2: Galatians 5:3 For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.
column3: Galasiers 5:3 En ek betuig dit weer aan elke mens wat hom laat besny, dat hy onder verpligting is om die hele wet te onderhou.

column2: Galatians 5:4 Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.
column3: Galasiers 5:4 Julle wat geregverdig wil wees deur die wet, is losgemaak van Christus; julle het van die genade verval.

column2: Galatians 5:5 For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.
column3: Galasiers 5:5 Want óns verwag deur die Gees uit die geloof die geregtigheid waarop ons hoop.

column2: Galatians 5:6 For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.
column3: Galasiers 5:6 Want in Christus Jesus het nòg die besnydenis nòg die onbesnedenheid enige krag, maar die geloof wat deur die liefde werk.

column2: Galatians 5:7 Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?
column3: Galasiers 5:7 Julle het goed geloop: wie het julle verhinder om die waarheid gehoorsaam te wees?

column2: Galatians 5:8 This persuasion [cometh] not of him that calleth you.
column3: Galasiers 5:8 Hierdie oortuiging kom nie van Hom wat julle roep nie.

column2: Galatians 5:9 A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.
column3: Galasiers 5:9 ’n Bietjie suurdeeg maak die hele deeg suur.

column2: Galatians 5:10 I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.
column3: Galasiers 5:10 Ek vertrou van julle in die Here dat julle nie anders sal dink nie; maar die een wat julle in die war bring, sal die oordeel dra, wie dit ook mag wees.

column2: Galatians 5:11 And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.
column3: Galasiers 5:11 Maar ek, broeders, as ek nog die besnydenis verkondig, waarom word ek nog vervolg? Dan is die struikelblok van die kruis vernietig!

column2: Galatians 5:12 I would they were even cut off which trouble you.
column3: Galasiers 5:12 Ag, as die wat julle opstandig maak, hulleself tog maar ook wou vermink!

column2: Galatians 5:13 For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only [use] not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
column3: Galasiers 5:13 Want julle is tot vryheid geroep, broeders; gebruik net nie julle vryheid as ’n aanleiding vir die vlees nie, maar dien mekaar deur die liefde.

column2: Galatians 5:14 For all the law is fulfilled in one word, [even] in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
column3: Galasiers 5:14 Want die hele wet word vervul in een woord, naamlik: Jy moet jou naaste liefhê soos jouself.

column2: Galatians 5:15 But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.
column3: Galasiers 5:15 Maar as julle mekaar byt en opeet, pas op dat julle nie die een deur die ander verteer word nie.

column2: Galatians 5:16 [This] I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
column3: Galasiers 5:16 MAAR ek sê: Wandel deur die Gees, dan sal julle nooit die begeerlikheid van die vlees volbring nie;

column2: Galatians 5:17 For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
column3: Galasiers 5:17 want die vlees begeer teen die Gees, en die Gees teen die vlees; en hulle staan teenoor mekaar, sodat julle nie kan doen wat julle wil nie.

column2: Galatians 5:18 But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.
column3: Galasiers 5:18 Maar as julle deur die Gees gelei word, dan is julle nie onder die wet nie.

column2: Galatians 5:19 Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are [these]; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,
column3: Galasiers 5:19 En die werke van die vlees is openbaar, naamlik owerspel, hoerery, onreinheid, ongebondenheid;

column2: Galatians 5:20 Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,
column3: Galasiers 5:20 afgodery, towery, vyandskap, twis, jaloersheid, toornigheid, naywer, tweedrag, partyskap;

column2: Galatians 5:21 Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told [you] in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.
column3: Galasiers 5:21 afguns, moord, dronkenskap, brassery en dergelike dinge, waarvan ek julle vooraf sê, soos ek al vroeër gesê het, dat die wat sulke dinge doen, die koninkryk van God nie sal beërwe nie.

column2: Galatians 5:22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
column3: Galasiers 5:22 Maar die vrug van die Gees is liefde, blydskap, vrede, lankmoedigheid, vriendelikheid, goedheid, getrouheid, sagmoedigheid, selfbeheersing.

column2: Galatians 5:23 Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
column3: Galasiers 5:23 Teen sulke dinge is die wet nie.

column2: Galatians 5:24 And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.
column3: Galasiers 5:24 Maar die wat aan Christus behoort, het die vlees met sy hartstogte en begeerlikhede gekruisig.

column2: Galatians 5:25 If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
column3: Galasiers 5:25 As ons deur die Gees lewe, laat ons ook deur die Gees wandel.

column2: Galatians 5:26 Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
column3: Galasiers 5:26 Laat ons nie word soekers van ydele eer wat mekaar uittart en mekaar beny nie.

column2: Galatians 6:1 Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
column3: Galasiers 6:1 BROEDERS, as iemand ewenwel deur een of ander misdaad oorval word, moet julle wat geestelik is, so een reghelp met die gees van sagmoedigheid, terwyl jy op jouself let, dat jy ook nie versoek word nie.

column2: Galatians 6:2 Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
column3: Galasiers 6:2 Dra mekaar se laste en vervul so die wet van Christus.

column2: Galatians 6:3 For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.
column3: Galasiers 6:3 Want as iemand meen dat hy iets is, terwyl hy niks is nie, mislei hy homself.

column2: Galatians 6:4 But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.
column3: Galasiers 6:4 Maar laat elkeen sy eie werk op die proef stel; en dan sal hy grond vir roem hê alleen wat homself betref en nie wat die ander betref nie.

column2: Galatians 6:5 For every man shall bear his own burden.
column3: Galasiers 6:5 Want elkeen sal sy eie pak dra.

column2: Galatians 6:6 Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.
column3: Galasiers 6:6 Maar laat hom wat in die Woord onderwys ontvang, meedeel van alle goeie dinge aan hom wat onderwys gee.

column2: Galatians 6:7 Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
column3: Galasiers 6:7 Moenie dwaal nie; God laat Hom nie bespot nie; want net wat die mens saai, dit sal hy ook maai.

column2: Galatians 6:8 For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
column3: Galasiers 6:8 Hy wat in sy vlees saai, sal uit die vlees verderf maai; maar hy wat in die Gees saai, sal uit die Gees die ewige lewe maai.

column2: Galatians 6:9 And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
column3: Galasiers 6:9 En laat ons nie moeg word om goed te doen nie, want op die regte tyd sal ons maai as ons nie verslap nie.

column2: Galatians 6:10 As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all [men], especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
column3: Galasiers 6:10 Laat ons dan, terwyl ons geleentheid het, aan almal goed doen, maar die meeste aan die huisgenote van die geloof.

column2: Galatians 6:11 Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.
column3: Galasiers 6:11 Kyk met watter groot letters ek met my eie hand aan julle skrywe.

column2: Galatians 6:12 As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.
column3: Galasiers 6:12 Almal wat ’n mooi vertoning in die vlees wil maak, dié dwing julle om julle te laat besny net om nie ter wille van die kruis van Christus vervolg te word nie.

column2: Galatians 6:13 For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.
column3: Galasiers 6:13 Want ook hulle wat besny word, hou self nie die wet nie; maar hulle wil hê dat julle besny moet word, sodat hulle in julle vlees kan roem.

column2: Galatians 6:14 But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.
column3: Galasiers 6:14 Maar wat my betref, mag ek nooit roem nie, behalwe in die kruis van onse Here Jesus Christus, deur wie die wêreld vir my gekruisig is en ek vir die wêreld.

column2: Galatians 6:15 For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.
column3: Galasiers 6:15 Want in Christus Jesus het nòg die besnydenis nòg die onbesnedenheid enige krag, maar ’n nuwe skepsel.

column2: Galatians 6:16 And as many as walk according to this rule, peace [be] on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.
column3: Galasiers 6:16 En mag daar vrede en barmhartigheid wees oor almal wat sal wandel volgens hierdie reël, en oor die Israel van God!

column2: Galatians 6:17 From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
column3: Galasiers 6:17 Verder moet niemand my moeite aandoen nie, want ek dra die littekens van die Here Jesus in my liggaam.

column2: Galatians 6:18 Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ [be] with your spirit. Amen. <<[To [the] Galatians written from Rome.]>>
column3: Galasiers 6:18 Die genade van onse Here Jesus Christus sy met julle gees, broeders! Amen.

column2: Ephesians 1:1 Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:
column3: Efesiers 1:1 PAULUS, ’n apostel van Jesus Christus deur die wil van God, aan die heiliges wat in Éfese is, en die gelowiges in Christus Jesus:

column2: Ephesians 1:2 Grace [be] to you, and peace, from God our Father, and [from] the Lord Jesus Christ.
column3: Efesiers 1:2 Genade vir julle en vrede van God, onse Vader, en die Here Jesus Christus!

column2: Ephesians 1:3 Blessed [be] the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly [places] in Christ:
column3: Efesiers 1:3 GESEËND is die God en Vader van onse Here Jesus Christus wat ons geseën het met alle geestelike seëninge in die hemele in Christus,

column2: Ephesians 1:4 According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:
column3: Efesiers 1:4 soos Hy ons in Hom uitverkies het voor die grondlegging van die wêreld om heilig en sonder gebrek voor Hom in liefde te wees,

column2: Ephesians 1:5 Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,
column3: Efesiers 1:5 deurdat Hy ons voorbeskik het om ons as sy kinders vir Homself aan te neem deur Jesus Christus, na die welbehae van sy wil,

column2: Ephesians 1:6 To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.
column3: Efesiers 1:6 tot lof van die heerlikheid van sy genade waarmee Hy ons begenadig het in die Geliefde.

column2: Ephesians 1:7 In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;
column3: Efesiers 1:7 In Hom het ons die verlossing deur sy bloed, die vergifnis van die misdade na die rykdom van sy genade,

column2: Ephesians 1:8 Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;
column3: Efesiers 1:8 wat Hy oorvloedig aan ons bewys het in alle wysheid en verstand,

column2: Ephesians 1:9 Having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:
column3: Efesiers 1:9 deurdat Hy aan ons die verborgenheid van sy wil bekend gemaak het na sy welbehae wat Hy in Homself voorgeneem het,

column2: Ephesians 1:10 That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; [even] in him:
column3: Efesiers 1:10 om die volheid van die tye te reël, met die doel om alle dinge wat in die hemele sowel as wat op die aarde is, onder een hoof in Christus te verenig —

column2: Ephesians 1:11 In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:
column3: Efesiers 1:11 in Hom in wie ons ook ’n erfdeel ontvang het nadat ons vantevore daartoe verordineer is ooreenkomstig die voorneme van Hom wat alles werk volgens die raad van sy wil,

column2: Ephesians 1:12 That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.
column3: Efesiers 1:12 sodat ons kan wees tot lof van sy heerlikheid, ons wat reeds tevore op Christus gehoop het,

column2: Ephesians 1:13 In whom ye also [trusted], after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,
column3: Efesiers 1:13 in wie julle ook, nadat julle die woord van die waarheid, die evangelie van julle redding, gehoor het, in wie julle, nadat julle ook geglo het, verseël is met die Heilige Gees van die belofte,

column2: Ephesians 1:14 Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.
column3: Efesiers 1:14 wat die onderpand is van ons erfdeel om sy eiendom te verlos tot lof van sy heerlikheid.

column2: Ephesians 1:15 Wherefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus, and love unto all the saints,
column3: Efesiers 1:15 Daarom — vandat ek gehoor het van die geloof in die Here Jesus wat onder julle is en die liefde tot al die heiliges —

column2: Ephesians 1:16 Cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;
column3: Efesiers 1:16 hou ek ook nie op om vir julle te dank as ek aan julle in my gebede dink nie,

column2: Ephesians 1:17 That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:
column3: Efesiers 1:17 dat die God van onse Here Jesus Christus, die Vader van die heerlikheid, aan julle die Gees van wysheid en openbaring in kennis van Hom mag gee,

column2: Ephesians 1:18 The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
column3: Efesiers 1:18 verligte oë van julle verstand, sodat julle kan weet wat die hoop van sy roeping en wat die rykdom van die heerlikheid van sy erfdeel onder die heiliges is;

column2: Ephesians 1:19 And what [is] the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power,
column3: Efesiers 1:19 en wat die uitnemende grootheid van sy krag is vir ons wat glo, na die werking van die krag van sy sterkte

column2: Ephesians 1:20 Which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set [him] at his own right hand in the heavenly [places],
column3: Efesiers 1:20 wat Hy gewerk het in Christus toe Hy Hom uit die dode opgewek het en Hom laat sit het aan sy regterhand in die hemele,

column2: Ephesians 1:21 Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:
column3: Efesiers 1:21 bo alle owerheid en mag en krag en heerskappy en elke naam wat genoem word, nie alleen in hierdie wêreld nie, maar ook in die toekomstige.

column2: Ephesians 1:22 And hath put all [things] under his feet, and gave him [to be] the head over all [things] to the church,
column3: Efesiers 1:22 En Hy het alle dinge onder sy voete onderwerp en Hom as Hoof bo alle dinge aan die gemeente gegee,

column2: Ephesians 1:23 Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
column3: Efesiers 1:23 wat sy liggaam is, die volheid van Hom wat alles in almal vervul.

column2: Ephesians 2:1 And you [hath he quickened], who were dead in trespasses and sins;
column3: Efesiers 2:1 EN julle het Hy lewend gemaak, wat dood was deur die misdade en die sondes

column2: Ephesians 2:2 Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:
column3: Efesiers 2:2 waarin julle tevore gewandel het volgens die loop van hierdie wêreld, volgens die owerste van die mag van die lug, van die gees wat nou in die kinders van die ongehoorsaamheid werk,

column2: Ephesians 2:3 Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath, even as others.
column3: Efesiers 2:3 onder wie ons almal ook vroeër gewandel het in die begeerlikhede van ons vlees toe ons die wil van die vlees en van die sinne gedoen het; en ons was van nature kinders van die toorn net soos ook die ander.

column2: Ephesians 2:4 But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,
column3: Efesiers 2:4 Maar God, wat ryk is in barmhartigheid, het ons deur sy grote liefde waarmee Hy ons liefgehad het,

column2: Ephesians 2:5 Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)
column3: Efesiers 2:5 ook toe ons dood was deur die misdade, lewend gemaak saam met Christus — uit genade is julle gered —

column2: Ephesians 2:6 And hath raised [us] up together, and made [us] sit together in heavenly [places] in Christ Jesus:
column3: Efesiers 2:6 en saam opgewek en saam laat sit in die hemele in Christus Jesus,

column2: Ephesians 2:7 That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in [his] kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.
column3: Efesiers 2:7 sodat Hy in die eeue wat kom, kan betoon die uitnemende rykdom van sy genade in goedertierenheid oor ons in Christus Jesus.

column2: Ephesians 2:8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: [it is] the gift of God:
column3: Efesiers 2:8 Want uit genade is julle gered, deur die geloof, en dit nie uit julleself nie: dit is die gawe van God;

column2: Ephesians 2:9 Not of works, lest any man should boast.
column3: Efesiers 2:9 nie uit die werke nie, sodat niemand mag roem nie.

column2: Ephesians 2:10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
column3: Efesiers 2:10 Want ons is sy maaksel, geskape in Christus Jesus tot goeie werke wat God voorberei het, sodat ons daarin kan wandel.

column2: Ephesians 2:11 Wherefore remember, that ye [being] in time past Gentiles in the flesh, who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands;
column3: Efesiers 2:11 DAAROM, onthou dat julle wat vroeër heidene in die vlees was en onbesnedenes genoem word deur die sogenaamde besnydenis wat in die vlees met hande verrig word,

column2: Ephesians 2:12 That at that time ye were without Christ, being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of promise, having no hope, and without God in the world:
column3: Efesiers 2:12 dat julle in dié tyd sonder Christus was, vervreemd van die burgerskap van Israel en vreemdelinge ten aansien van die verbonde van die belofte, sonder hoop en sonder God in die wêreld.

column2: Ephesians 2:13 But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.
column3: Efesiers 2:13 Maar nou in Christus Jesus het julle wat vroeër ver was, naby gekom deur die bloed van Christus.

column2: Ephesians 2:14 For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition [between us];
column3: Efesiers 2:14 Want Hy is ons vrede, Hy wat albei een gemaak en die middelmuur van skeiding afgebreek het

column2: Ephesians 2:15 Having abolished in his flesh the enmity, [even] the law of commandments [contained] in ordinances; for to make in himself of twain one new man, [so] making peace;
column3: Efesiers 2:15 deurdat Hy in sy vlees die vyandskap tot niet gemaak het, naamlik die wet van gebooie wat in insettinge bestaan; sodat Hy, deur vrede te maak, die twee in Homself tot een nuwe mens kon skep

column2: Ephesians 2:16 And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross, having slain the enmity thereby:
column3: Efesiers 2:16 en albei in een liggaam met God kon versoen deur die kruis, nadat Hy daaraan die vyandskap doodgemaak het.

column2: Ephesians 2:17 And came and preached peace to you which were afar off, and to them that were nigh.
column3: Efesiers 2:17 En Hy het die evangelie van vrede kom verkondig aan julle wat ver was en aan die wat naby was;

column2: Ephesians 2:18 For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.
column3: Efesiers 2:18 want deur Hom het ons albei die toegang deur een Gees tot die Vader.

column2: Ephesians 2:19 Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;
column3: Efesiers 2:19 So is julle dan nie meer vreemdelinge en bywoners nie, maar medeburgers van die heiliges en huisgenote van God,

column2: Ephesians 2:20 And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner [stone];
column3: Efesiers 2:20 gebou op die fondament van die apostels en profete, terwyl Jesus Christus self die hoeksteen is,

column2: Ephesians 2:21 In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord:
column3: Efesiers 2:21 in wie die hele gebou, goed saamgevoeg, verrys tot ’n heilige tempel in die Here,

column2: Ephesians 2:22 In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.
column3: Efesiers 2:22 in wie julle ook saam opgebou word tot ’n woning van God in die Gees.

column2: Ephesians 3:1 For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles,
column3: Efesiers 3:1 OM hierdie rede is ek, Paulus, die gevangene van Christus Jesus vir julle wat heidene is —

column2: Ephesians 3:2 If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to you-ward:
column3: Efesiers 3:2 as julle ten minste gehoor het van die bediening van die genade van God wat aan my verleen is vir julle,

column2: Ephesians 3:3 How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery; (as I wrote afore in few words,
column3: Efesiers 3:3 dat Hy aan my deur ’n openbaring bekend gemaak het die verborgenheid, soos ek tevore kortliks geskryf het;

column2: Ephesians 3:4 Whereby, when ye read, ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)
column3: Efesiers 3:4 waardeur julle, as julle dit lees, my insig in die verborgenheid van Christus kan verstaan,

column2: Ephesians 3:5 Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men, as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit;
column3: Efesiers 3:5 wat in ander tye aan die mensekinders nie bekend gemaak is nie soos dit nou aan sy heilige apostels en profete geopenbaar is deur die Gees, naamlik

column2: Ephesians 3:6 That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs, and of the same body, and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel:
column3: Efesiers 3:6 dat die heidene mede-erfgename is en medelede van die liggaam en mededeelgenote aan sy belofte in Christus deur die evangelie

column2: Ephesians 3:7 Whereof I was made a minister, according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power.
column3: Efesiers 3:7 waarvan ek ’n dienaar geword het, volgens die gawe van die genade van God wat aan my gegee is ooreenkomstig die werking van sy krag.

column2: Ephesians 3:8 Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, is this grace given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ;
column3: Efesiers 3:8 Aan my, die geringste van al die heiliges, is hierdie genade gegee om onder die heidene die evangelie van die onnaspeurlike rykdom van Christus te verkondig,

column2: Ephesians 3:9 And to make all [men] see what [is] the fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God, who created all things by Jesus Christ:
column3: Efesiers 3:9 en vir almal aan die lig te bring wat die gemeenskap is van die verborgenheid wat van alle eeue af verborge was in God wat alles geskape het deur Jesus Christus,

column2: Ephesians 3:10 To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly [places] might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God,
column3: Efesiers 3:10 sodat nou deur die gemeente aan die owerhede en magte in die hemele die menigvuldige wysheid van God bekend gemaak kan word,

column2: Ephesians 3:11 According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord:
column3: Efesiers 3:11 volgens die ewige voorneme wat Hy opgevat het in Christus Jesus, onse Here,

column2: Ephesians 3:12 In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him.
column3: Efesiers 3:12 in wie ons die vrymoedigheid en die toegang het met vertroue deur die geloof in Hom.

column2: Ephesians 3:13 Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you, which is your glory.
column3: Efesiers 3:13 Daarom bid ek dat julle nie moedeloos word by my verdrukkinge ter wille van julle nie. Dit is julle eer.

column2: Ephesians 3:14 For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,
column3: Efesiers 3:14 OM hierdie rede buig ek my knieë voor die Vader van onse Here Jesus Christus,

column2: Ephesians 3:15 Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named,
column3: Efesiers 3:15 van wie elke geslag in die hemele en op die aarde sy naam ontvang,

column2: Ephesians 3:16 That he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man;
column3: Efesiers 3:16 dat Hy aan julle mag gee na die rykdom van sy heerlikheid om met krag versterk te word deur sy Gees in die innerlike mens,

column2: Ephesians 3:17 That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,
column3: Efesiers 3:17 sodat Christus deur die geloof in julle harte kan woon, julle wat in die liefde gewortel en gegrond is,

column2: Ephesians 3:18 May be able to comprehend with all saints what [is] the breadth, and length, and depth, and height;
column3: Efesiers 3:18 en julle in staat kan wees om saam met al die heiliges ten volle te begryp wat die breedte en lengte en diepte en hoogte is,

column2: Ephesians 3:19 And to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.
column3: Efesiers 3:19 en die liefde van Christus te ken wat die kennis oortref, sodat julle vervul kan word tot al die volheid van God.

column2: Ephesians 3:20 Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us,
column3: Efesiers 3:20 En aan Hom wat mag het om te doen ver bo alles wat ons bid of dink, volgens die krag wat in ons werk,

column2: Ephesians 3:21 Unto him [be] glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages, world without end. Amen.
column3: Efesiers 3:21 aan Hom die heerlikheid in die gemeente in Christus Jesus deur alle geslagte tot in ewigheid! Amen.

column2: Ephesians 4:1 I therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,
column3: Efesiers 4:1 EK vermaan julle dan, ek, die gevangene in die Here, om te wandel waardig die roeping waarmee julle geroep is,

column2: Ephesians 4:2 With all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;
column3: Efesiers 4:2 met alle nederigheid en sagmoedigheid, met lankmoedigheid, terwyl julle mekaar in liefde verdra

column2: Ephesians 4:3 Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
column3: Efesiers 4:3 en ernstig strewe om die eenheid van die Gees te bewaar deur die band van die vrede.

column2: Ephesians 4:4 [There is] one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;
column3: Efesiers 4:4 Dit is een liggaam en een Gees, soos julle ook geroep is in een hoop van julle roeping;

column2: Ephesians 4:5 One Lord, one faith, one baptism,
column3: Efesiers 4:5 een Here, een geloof, een doop,

column2: Ephesians 4:6 One God and Father of all, who [is] above all, and through all, and in you all.
column3: Efesiers 4:6 een God en Vader van almal, wat oor almal en deur almal en in julle almal is.

column2: Ephesians 4:7 But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
column3: Efesiers 4:7 Maar aan elkeen van ons is die genade gegee volgens die mate van die gawe van Christus.

column2: Ephesians 4:8 Wherefore he saith, When he ascended up on high, he led captivity captive, and gave gifts unto men.
column3: Efesiers 4:8 Daarom sê Hy: Toe Hy opgevaar het in die hoogte, het Hy die gevangenes gevange geneem en gawes aan die mense gegee.

column2: Ephesians 4:9 (Now that he ascended, what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth?
column3: Efesiers 4:9 Maar dít: Hy het opgevaar — wat beteken dit anders as dat Hy ook eers neergedaal het in die onderste dele van die aarde?

column2: Ephesians 4:10 He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens, that he might fill all things.)
column3: Efesiers 4:10 Hy wat neergedaal het, is dieselfde as Hy wat opgevaar het bokant al die hemele, sodat Hy alles tot volheid kan bring.

column2: Ephesians 4:11 And he gave some, apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers;
column3: Efesiers 4:11 En Hy het gegee sommige as apostels, ander as profete, ander as evangeliste, ander as herders en leraars,

column2: Ephesians 4:12 For the perfecting of the saints, for the work of the ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ:
column3: Efesiers 4:12 om die heiliges toe te rus vir hulle dienswerk, tot opbouing van die liggaam van Christus,

column2: Ephesians 4:13 Till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:
column3: Efesiers 4:13 totdat ons almal kom tot die eenheid van die geloof en van die kennis van die Seun van God, tot ’n volwasse man, tot die mate van die volle grootte van Christus;

column2: Ephesians 4:14 That we [henceforth] be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, [and] cunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive;
column3: Efesiers 4:14 sodat ons nie meer kinders sou wees nie wat soos golwe geslinger en heen en weer gedryf word deur elke wind van lering, deur die bedrieëry van die mense, deur sluheid om listiglik tot dwaling te bring;

column2: Ephesians 4:15 But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, [even] Christ:
column3: Efesiers 4:15 maar, terwyl ons in liefde die waarheid betrag, in alles sou opgroei in Hom wat die Hoof is, naamlik Christus,

column2: Ephesians 4:16 From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth, according to the effectual working in the measure of every part, maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.
column3: Efesiers 4:16 uit wie die hele liggaam — goed saamgevoeg en saamverbind deur die ondersteuning wat elke lid gee volgens die werking van elke afsonderlike deel in sy mate — die groei van die liggaam bevorder vir sy eie opbouing in liefde.

column2: Ephesians 4:17 This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,
column3: Efesiers 4:17 DIT sê en betuig ek dan in die Here, dat julle nie meer moet wandel soos die ander heidene ook wandel in die verdwaasdheid van hulle gemoed nie —

column2: Ephesians 4:18 Having the understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them, because of the blindness of their heart:
column3: Efesiers 4:18 mense wat verduisterd is in die verstand en vervreemd van die lewe van God deur die onkunde wat in hulle is vanweë die verharding van hulle hart;

column2: Ephesians 4:19 Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greediness.
column3: Efesiers 4:19 wat ongevoelig geword het en hulle oorgegee het aan die ongebondenheid om in hebsug allerhande onreinheid te bedrywe.

column2: Ephesians 4:20 But ye have not so learned Christ;
column3: Efesiers 4:20 Maar julle het Christus nie so leer ken nie,

column2: Ephesians 4:21 If so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus:
column3: Efesiers 4:21 as julle ten minste van Hom gehoor het en in Hom onderrig is soos die waarheid is in Jesus:

column2: Ephesians 4:22 That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;
column3: Efesiers 4:22 dat julle, wat die vorige lewenswandel betref die oue mens moet aflê wat deur die begeerlikhede van die verleiding te gronde gaan,

column2: Ephesians 4:23 And be renewed in the spirit of your mind;
column3: Efesiers 4:23 en dat julle vernuwe moet word in die gees van julle gemoed

column2: Ephesians 4:24 And that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.
column3: Efesiers 4:24 en julle met die nuwe mens moet beklee wat na God geskape is in ware geregtigheid en heiligheid.

column2: Ephesians 4:25 Wherefore putting away lying, speak every man truth with his neighbour: for we are members one of another.
column3: Efesiers 4:25 Daarom, lê die leuen af en spreek die waarheid, elkeen met sy naaste, want ons is mekaar se lede.

column2: Ephesians 4:26 Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:
column3: Efesiers 4:26 Word toornig en moenie sondig nie; laat die son nie ondergaan oor julle toorn nie;

column2: Ephesians 4:27 Neither give place to the devil.
column3: Efesiers 4:27 en gee aan die duiwel geen plek nie.

column2: Ephesians 4:28 Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working with [his] hands the thing which is good, that he may have to give to him that needeth.
column3: Efesiers 4:28 Laat die een wat steel, nie meer steel nie; maar laat hom liewer arbei deur met sy hande te werk wat goed is, sodat hy iets kan hê om mee te deel aan die een wat gebrek het.

column2: Ephesians 4:29 Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.
column3: Efesiers 4:29 Laat daar geen vuil woord uit julle mond uitgaan nie, maar net ’n woord wat goed is vir die nodige stigting, sodat dit genade kan gee aan die wat dit hoor.

column2: Ephesians 4:30 And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.
column3: Efesiers 4:30 En bedroef nie die Heilige Gees van God nie, deur wie julle verseël is tot die dag van verlossing.

column2: Ephesians 4:31 Let all bitterness, and wrath, and anger, and clamour, and evil speaking, be put away from you, with all malice:
column3: Efesiers 4:31 Alle bitterheid en woede en toorn en geskreeu en lastering moet van julle verwyder word, saam met alle boosheid.

column2: Ephesians 4:32 And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
column3: Efesiers 4:32 Maar wees vriendelik en vol ontferming teenoor mekaar; vergeef mekaar soos God ook in Christus julle vergewe het.

column2: Ephesians 5:1 Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;
column3: Efesiers 5:1 WEES dan navolgers van God soos geliefde kinders;

column2: Ephesians 5:2 And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.
column3: Efesiers 5:2 en wandel in liefde, soos Christus ons ook liefgehad het en Hom vir ons oorgegee het as ’n gawe en offer aan God tot ’n lieflike geur.

column2: Ephesians 5:3 But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;
column3: Efesiers 5:3 Maar hoerery en allerhande onreinheid of hebsug moet onder julle selfs nie genoem word nie, soos dit die heiliges betaam;

column2: Ephesians 5:4 Neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.
column3: Efesiers 5:4 ook nie gemeenheid en dwase of lawwe praatjies wat nie pas nie, maar liewer danksegging.

column2: Ephesians 5:5 For this ye know, that no whoremonger, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.
column3: Efesiers 5:5 Want dit moet julle weet dat geen hoereerder of onreine of gierigaard, wat ’n afgodedienaar is, ’n erfdeel het in die koninkryk van Christus en van God nie.

column2: Ephesians 5:6 Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience.
column3: Efesiers 5:6 Laat niemand julle met ydel woorde verlei nie, want daardeur kom die toorn van God oor die kinders van die ongehoorsaamheid.

column2: Ephesians 5:7 Be not ye therefore partakers with them.
column3: Efesiers 5:7 Wees dan nie hulle deelgenote nie.

column2: Ephesians 5:8 For ye were sometimes darkness, but now [are ye] light in the Lord: walk as children of light:
column3: Efesiers 5:8 Want vroeër was julle duisternis, maar nou is julle lig in die Here — wandel soos kinders van die lig.

column2: Ephesians 5:9 (For the fruit of the Spirit [is] in all goodness and righteousness and truth;)
column3: Efesiers 5:9 Want die vrug van die Gees bestaan in alle goedheid en geregtigheid en waarheid.

column2: Ephesians 5:10 Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.
column3: Efesiers 5:10 En beproef wat die Here welbehaaglik is;

column2: Ephesians 5:11 And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove [them].
column3: Efesiers 5:11 en hou nie gemeenskap met die onvrugbare werke van die duisternis nie, maar bestraf dit liewer.

column2: Ephesians 5:12 For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.
column3: Efesiers 5:12 Want wat in die geheim deur hulle gedoen word, is skandelik selfs om te noem.

column2: Ephesians 5:13 But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.
column3: Efesiers 5:13 Maar al die dinge wat deur die lig bestraf word, word openbaar; want alles wat openbaar word, is lig.

column2: Ephesians 5:14 Wherefore he saith, Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.
column3: Efesiers 5:14 Daarom sê Hy: Ontwaak, jy wat slaap, en staan op uit die dode, en Christus sal oor jou skyn.

column2: Ephesians 5:15 See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,
column3: Efesiers 5:15 Pas dan op dat julle nougeset wandel, nie as onwyse nie, maar as wyse;

column2: Ephesians 5:16 Redeeming the time, because the days are evil.
column3: Efesiers 5:16 en koop die tyd uit, omdat die dae boos is.

column2: Ephesians 5:17 Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord [is].
column3: Efesiers 5:17 Daarom moet julle nie onverstandig wees nie, maar verstaan wat die wil van die Here is.

column2: Ephesians 5:18 And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;
column3: Efesiers 5:18 Moenie dronk word van wyn nie — daarin is losbandigheid; maar word met die Gees vervul.

column2: Ephesians 5:19 Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;
column3: Efesiers 5:19 Spreek onder mekaar met psalms en lofsange en geestelike liedere; en sing en psalmsing in julle hart tot eer van die Here,

column2: Ephesians 5:20 Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;
column3: Efesiers 5:20 terwyl julle God die Vader altyd vir alles dank in die Naam van onse Here Jesus Christus,

column2: Ephesians 5:21 Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.
column3: Efesiers 5:21 en aan mekaar onderdanig is in die vrees van God.

column2: Ephesians 5:22 Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.
column3: Efesiers 5:22 VROUE, wees aan julle eie mans onderdanig, soos aan die Here.

column2: Ephesians 5:23 For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.
column3: Efesiers 5:23 Want die man is die hoof van die vrou, soos Christus ook Hoof is van die gemeente; en Hy is die Verlosser van die liggaam.

column2: Ephesians 5:24 Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so [let] the wives [be] to their own husbands in every thing.
column3: Efesiers 5:24 Maar soos die gemeente aan Christus onderdanig is, so moet die vroue dit ook in alles aan hul eie mans wees.

column2: Ephesians 5:25 Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
column3: Efesiers 5:25 Manne, julle moet jul eie vroue liefhê, soos Christus ook die gemeente liefgehad en Homself daarvoor oorgegee het

column2: Ephesians 5:26 That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,
column3: Efesiers 5:26 om dit te heilig, nadat Hy dit gereinig het met die waterbad deur die woord,

column2: Ephesians 5:27 That he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.
column3: Efesiers 5:27 sodat Hy die gemeente voor Hom kon stel, verheerlik, sonder vlek of rimpel of iets dergeliks; maar dat dit heilig en sonder gebrek sou wees.

column2: Ephesians 5:28 So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.
column3: Efesiers 5:28 So behoort die mans hulle eie vroue lief te hê soos hul eie liggame. Wie sy eie vrou liefhet, het homself lief;

column2: Ephesians 5:29 For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:
column3: Efesiers 5:29 want niemand het ooit sy eie vlees gehaat nie, maar hy voed en koester dit, net soos die Here die gemeente.

column2: Ephesians 5:30 For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.
column3: Efesiers 5:30 Want ons is lede van sy liggaam, van sy vlees en van sy bene.

column2: Ephesians 5:31 For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.
column3: Efesiers 5:31 Daarom moet die man sy vader en sy moeder verlaat en sy vrou aankleef en hulle twee sal een vlees word.

column2: Ephesians 5:32 This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.
column3: Efesiers 5:32 Hierdie verborgenheid is groot, maar ek sê dit met die oog op Christus en die gemeente.

column2: Ephesians 5:33 Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife [see] that she reverence [her] husband.
column3: Efesiers 5:33 In alle geval moet elkeen van julle ook afsonderlik sy eie vrou liefhê net soos homself, en die vrou moet die man eerbiedig.

column2: Ephesians 6:1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.
column3: Efesiers 6:1 KINDERS, julle moet jul ouers gehoorsaam wees in die Here, want dit is reg.

column2: Ephesians 6:2 Honour thy father and mother; (which is the first commandment with promise;)
column3: Efesiers 6:2 Eer jou vader en jou moeder — dit is die eerste gebod met ’n belofte —

column2: Ephesians 6:3 That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.
column3: Efesiers 6:3 sodat dit met jou goed mag gaan en jy lank mag lewe op die aarde.

column2: Ephesians 6:4 And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
column3: Efesiers 6:4 En vaders, moenie julle kinders vertoorn nie, maar voed hulle op in die tug en vermaning van die Here.

column2: Ephesians 6:5 Servants, be obedient to them that are [your] masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;
column3: Efesiers 6:5 Diensknegte, wees gehoorsaam aan julle here na die vlees, met vrees en bewing, in opregtheid van julle hart, soos aan Christus;

column2: Ephesians 6:6 Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;
column3: Efesiers 6:6 nie met oëdiens soos mensebehaers nie, maar soos diensknegte van Christus wat die wil van God van harte doen
