column2: Ephesians 6:7 With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:
column3: Efesiers 6:7 en met goedwilligheid die Here dien en nie mense nie,

column2: Ephesians 6:8 Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether [he be] bond or free.
column3: Efesiers 6:8 omdat julle weet dat elkeen vir die goeie wat hy doen, loon van die Here sal ontvang, of hy ’n slaaf is of ’n vryman.

column2: Ephesians 6:9 And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.
column3: Efesiers 6:9 En, here, doen dieselfde teenoor hulle en laat staan die dreigemente, omdat julle weet dat ook julle eie Here in die hemele is en by Hom geen aanneming van die persoon is nie.

column2: Ephesians 6:10 Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
column3: Efesiers 6:10 EINDELIK, my broeders, word kragtig in die Here en in die krag van sy sterkte.

column2: Ephesians 6:11 Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
column3: Efesiers 6:11 Trek die volle wapenrusting van God aan, sodat julle staande kan bly teen die liste van die duiwel.

column2: Ephesians 6:12 For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high [places].
column3: Efesiers 6:12 Want ons worstelstryd is nie teen vlees en bloed nie, maar teen die owerhede, teen die magte, teen die wêreldheersers van die duisternis van hierdie eeu, teen die bose geeste in die lug.

column2: Ephesians 6:13 Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
column3: Efesiers 6:13 Daarom, neem die volle wapenrusting van God op, sodat julle weerstand kan bied in die dag van onheil en, nadat julle alles volbring het, staande kan bly.

column2: Ephesians 6:14 Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;
column3: Efesiers 6:14 Staan dan vas, julle lendene met die waarheid omgord, met die borswapen van die geregtigheid aan,

column2: Ephesians 6:15 And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;
column3: Efesiers 6:15 en as skoene aan julle voete die bereidheid vir die evangelie van vrede.

column2: Ephesians 6:16 Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.
column3: Efesiers 6:16 Behalwe dit alles neem die skild van die geloof op waarmee julle al die vurige pyle van die Bose sal kan uitblus.

column2: Ephesians 6:17 And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:
column3: Efesiers 6:17 En neem aan die helm van verlossing en die swaard van die Gees — dit is die woord van God —

column2: Ephesians 6:18 Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;
column3: Efesiers 6:18 terwyl julle met alle gebed en smeking by elke geleentheid bid in die Gees, en juis daartoe waak met alle volharding en smeking vir al die heiliges

column2: Ephesians 6:19 And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,
column3: Efesiers 6:19 en vir my, sodat ’n woord my gegee mag word as ek my mond oopmaak om met vrymoedigheid die verborgenheid van die evangelie bekend te maak,

column2: Ephesians 6:20 For which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.
column3: Efesiers 6:20 waarvoor ek ’n gesant is in kettings, sodat ek daarin vrymoediglik mag spreek soos ek moet spreek.

column2: Ephesians 6:21 But that ye also may know my affairs, [and] how I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:
column3: Efesiers 6:21 EN dat julle ook my omstandighede kan ken, hoe dit met my gaan, alles sal Tíchikus, die geliefde broeder en getroue dienaar in die Here, julle bekend maak.

column2: Ephesians 6:22 Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, and [that] he might comfort your hearts.
column3: Efesiers 6:22 Ek het hom juis daarvoor na julle gestuur, dat julle ons omstandighede kan ken en hy julle harte kan troos.

column2: Ephesians 6:23 Peace [be] to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
column3: Efesiers 6:23 Vrede vir die broeders en liefde, met geloof, van God die Vader en die Here Jesus Christus!

column2: Ephesians 6:24 Grace [be] with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen. <<[To [the] Ephesians written from Rome, by Tychicus.]>>
column3: Efesiers 6:24 Die genade sy met almal wat onse Here Jesus Christus in onverganklikheid liefhet! Amen.

column2: Philippians 1:1 Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:
column3: Filippense 1:1 PAULUS en Timótheüs, diensknegte van Jesus Christus, aan al die heiliges in Christus Jesus wat in Filíppi is, saam met die opsieners en diakens:

column2: Philippians 1:2 Grace [be] unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and [from] the Lord Jesus Christ.
column3: Filippense 1:2 Genade vir julle en vrede van God onse Vader en die Here Jesus Christus!

column2: Philippians 1:3 I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,
column3: Filippense 1:3 EK dank my God elke maal as ek aan julle dink —

column2: Philippians 1:4 Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,
column3: Filippense 1:4 en ek bid altyd in al my gebede vir julle almal met blydskap —

column2: Philippians 1:5 For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;
column3: Filippense 1:5 oor julle gemeenskap aan die evangelie van die eerste dag af tot nou toe,

column2: Philippians 1:6 Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform [it] until the day of Jesus Christ:
column3: Filippense 1:6 omdat ek juis hierop vertrou, dat Hy wat ’n goeie werk in julle begin het, dit sal voleindig tot op die dag van Jesus Christus;

column2: Philippians 1:7 Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.
column3: Filippense 1:7 soos dit vir my reg is om dit van julle almal te dink, omdat ek julle in my hart dra, aangesien julle almal in my boeie sowel as in die verdediging en bevestiging van die evangelie my deelgenote in die genade is.

column2: Philippians 1:8 For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.
column3: Filippense 1:8 Want God is my getuie hoe ek na julle almal verlang met die innige tederheid van Jesus Christus.

column2: Philippians 1:9 And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and [in] all judgment;
column3: Filippense 1:9 En dit bid ek dat julle liefde nog meer en meer oorvloedig mag word in kennis en alle ervaring,

column2: Philippians 1:10 That ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;
column3: Filippense 1:10 om die dinge waar dit op aankom, te onderskei, sodat julle rein en vir niemand ’n aanstoot mag wees nie, tot op die dag van Christus,

column2: Philippians 1:11 Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
column3: Filippense 1:11 vervul met die vrug van geregtigheid wat daar is deur Jesus Christus tot heerlikheid en lof van God.

column2: Philippians 1:12 But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things [which happened] unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;
column3: Filippense 1:12 En ek wil hê dat julle moet weet, broeders, dat wat my wedervaar het, eerder op bevordering van die evangelie uitgeloop het,

column2: Philippians 1:13 So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other [places];
column3: Filippense 1:13 sodat my boeie openbaar geword het in Christus onder die hele keiserlike lyfwag en by al die ander,

column2: Philippians 1:14 And many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.
column3: Filippense 1:14 en die meeste van die broeders wat in die Here deur my boeie vertroue gekry het, dit des te meer waag om die woord onbevrees te spreek.

column2: Philippians 1:15 Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:
column3: Filippense 1:15 Sommige preek Christus wel ook uit afguns en twis, maar ander ook uit welwillendheid:

column2: Philippians 1:16 The one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:
column3: Filippense 1:16 die eerste verkondig Christus uit naywer, nie met suiwer bedoelinge nie, met die mening om aan my boeie verdrukking toe te voeg;

column2: Philippians 1:17 But the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.
column3: Filippense 1:17 maar die ander uit liefde, omdat hulle weet dat ek bestem is tot die verdediging van die evangelie.

column2: Philippians 1:18 What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.
column3: Filippense 1:18 Maar wat maak dit? In alle geval, op allerlei wyse, of dit onder ’n skyn of in waarheid is, word Christus verkondig; en hierin verbly ek my en sal ek my ook verbly.

column2: Philippians 1:19 For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,
column3: Filippense 1:19 Want ek weet dat dit deur julle gebed en die ondersteuning van die Gees van Jesus Christus my tot heil sal strek,

column2: Philippians 1:20 According to my earnest expectation and [my] hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but [that] with all boldness, as always, [so] now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether [it be] by life, or by death.
column3: Filippense 1:20 volgens my reikhalsende verwagting en hoop dat ek in niks beskaam sal word nie; maar dat Christus met alle vrymoedigheid, soos altyd so ook nou, groot gemaak sal word in my liggaam, of dit deur die lewe of deur die dood is.

column2: Philippians 1:21 For to me to live [is] Christ, and to die [is] gain.
column3: Filippense 1:21 Want vir my is die lewe Christus en die sterwe wins.

column2: Philippians 1:22 But if I live in the flesh, this [is] the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.
column3: Filippense 1:22 Maar as ek in die vlees moet lewe, dan beteken dit vir my vrugbare arbeid; en wat ek sal kies, weet ek nie.

column2: Philippians 1:23 For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:
column3: Filippense 1:23 Want ek word van weerskante gedring: ek het verlange om heen te gaan en met Christus te wees, want dit is verreweg die beste;

column2: Philippians 1:24 Nevertheless to abide in the flesh [is] more needful for you.
column3: Filippense 1:24 maar om in die vlees te bly, is nodiger om julle ontwil.

column2: Philippians 1:25 And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;
column3: Filippense 1:25 En dit vertrou en weet ek dat ek sal bly, ja, saam met julle almal sal bly tot julle bevordering en blydskap in die geloof,

column2: Philippians 1:26 That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.
column3: Filippense 1:26 sodat julle roem oor my oorvloedig kan wees in Christus Jesus deur my teenwoordigheid weer by julle.

column2: Philippians 1:27 Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;
column3: Filippense 1:27 ALLEENLIK, gedra julle waardig die evangelie van Christus, sodat, of ek kom en julle sien dan wel of ek afwesig is, ek van julle omstandighede kan hoor dat julle in een gees vasstaan en, een van siel, saam stry vir die geloof van die evangelie,

column2: Philippians 1:28 And in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.
column3: Filippense 1:28 en dat julle jul in geen opsig laat afskrik deur die teëstanders nie. Dit is vir hulle wel ’n bewys van verderf, maar vir julle van redding, en dit van God;

column2: Philippians 1:29 For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;
column3: Filippense 1:29 omdat dit aan julle ter wille van Christus genadiglik gegee is om nie alleen in Hom te glo nie, maar ook vir Hom te ly,

column2: Philippians 1:30 Having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear [to be] in me.
column3: Filippense 1:30 terwyl julle dieselfde stryd het as wat julle in my gesien het en nou van my hoor.

column2: Philippians 2:1 If [there be] therefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies,
column3: Filippense 2:1 AS daar dan enige troos in Christus is, as daar enige vertroosting van die liefde, as daar enige gemeenskap van die Gees, as daar enige innige tederheid en ontferming is,

column2: Philippians 2:2 Fulfil ye my joy, that ye be likeminded, having the same love, [being] of one accord, of one mind.
column3: Filippense 2:2 maak dan my blydskap volkome deur eensgesind te wees en dieselfde liefde te hê, een van siel, een van sin.

column2: Philippians 2:3 [Let] nothing [be done] through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
column3: Filippense 2:3 Moenie iets doen uit selfsug of uit ydele eer nie, maar in nederigheid moet die een die ander hoër ag as homself.

column2: Philippians 2:4 Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others.
column3: Filippense 2:4 Julle moet nie elkeen na sy eie belange omsien nie, maar elkeen ook na die ander s’n.

column2: Philippians 2:5 Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:
column3: Filippense 2:5 Want hierdie gesindheid moet in julle wees wat ook in Christus Jesus was.

column2: Philippians 2:6 Who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God:
column3: Filippense 2:6 Hy, wat in die gestalte van God was, het dit geen roof geag om aan God gelyk te wees nie,

column2: Philippians 2:7 But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:
column3: Filippense 2:7 maar het Homself ontledig deur die gestalte van ’n dienskneg aan te neem en aan die mense gelyk geword;

column2: Philippians 2:8 And being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.
column3: Filippense 2:8 en in gedaante gevind as ’n mens, het Hy Homself verneder deur gehoorsaam te word tot die dood toe, ja, die dood van die kruis.

column2: Philippians 2:9 Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:
column3: Filippense 2:9 Daarom het God Hom ook uitermate verhoog en Hom ’n naam gegee wat bo elke naam is,

column2: Philippians 2:10 That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of [things] in heaven, and [things] in earth, and [things] under the earth;
column3: Filippense 2:10 sodat in die Naam van Jesus sou buig elke knie van die wat in die hemel en die wat op die aarde en die wat onder die aarde is,

column2: Philippians 2:11 And [that] every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ [is] Lord, to the glory of God the Father.
column3: Filippense 2:11 en elke tong sou bely dat Jesus Christus die Here is tot heerlikheid van God die Vader.

column2: Philippians 2:12 Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.
column3: Filippense 2:12 Daarom, my geliefdes, soos julle altyd gehoorsaam gewees het, nie in my teenwoordigheid alleen nie, maar baie meer nou in my afwesigheid, werk julle eie heil uit met vrees en bewing;

column2: Philippians 2:13 For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of [his] good pleasure.
column3: Filippense 2:13 want dit is God wat in julle werk om te wil sowel as om te werk na sy welbehae.

column2: Philippians 2:14 Do all things without murmurings and disputings:
column3: Filippense 2:14 Doen alles sonder murmurering en teëspraak,

column2: Philippians 2:15 That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;
column3: Filippense 2:15 sodat julle onberispelik en opreg kan wees, kinders van God sonder gebrek te midde van ’n krom en verdraaide geslag onder wie julle skyn soos ligte in die wêreld,

column2: Philippians 2:16 Holding forth the word of life; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ, that I have not run in vain, neither laboured in vain.
column3: Filippense 2:16 deurdat julle die woord van die lewe vashou, my tot ’n roem teen die dag van Christus, dat ek nie verniet geloop of verniet gearbei het nie.

column2: Philippians 2:17 Yea, and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all.
column3: Filippense 2:17 Maar al word ek as ’n drankoffer uitgegiet oor die offer en bediening van julle geloof, verbly ek my, ja, verbly ek my saam met julle almal;

column2: Philippians 2:18 For the same cause also do ye joy, and rejoice with me.
column3: Filippense 2:18 en om dieselfde rede moet julle ook bly wees en julle saam met my verbly.

column2: Philippians 2:19 But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.
column3: Filippense 2:19 EN ek hoop in die Here Jesus om Timótheüs gou na julle te stuur, sodat ek ook welgemoed kan wees as ek julle omstandighede te wete gekom het.

column2: Philippians 2:20 For I have no man likeminded, who will naturally care for your state.
column3: Filippense 2:20 Want ek het niemand van dieselfde gesindheid wat julle belange opreg sal behartig nie;

column2: Philippians 2:21 For all seek their own, not the things which are Jesus Christ's.
column3: Filippense 2:21 want hulle soek almal hul eie belange, nie dié van Christus Jesus nie.

column2: Philippians 2:22 But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.
column3: Filippense 2:22 Maar julle ken sy beproefdheid, dat hy, soos ’n kind teenoor sy vader, saam met my in die evangelie gedien het.

column2: Philippians 2:23 Him therefore I hope to send presently, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me.
column3: Filippense 2:23 Ek hoop dan om hom dadelik te stuur, so gou as ek sien hoe dit met my sal gaan;

column2: Philippians 2:24 But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly.
column3: Filippense 2:24 en ek vertrou in die Here dat ek self ook spoedig sal kom.

column2: Philippians 2:25 Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, and companion in labour, and fellowsoldier, but your messenger, and he that ministered to my wants.
column3: Filippense 2:25 Maar ek het dit noodsaaklik geag om Epafrodítus, my broeder en medewerker en medestryder, julle afgevaardigde en bedienaar van my behoefte, na julle te stuur,

column2: Philippians 2:26 For he longed after you all, and was full of heaviness, because that ye had heard that he had been sick.
column3: Filippense 2:26 want hy het na julle almal verlang en was besorg, omdat julle gehoor het dat hy siek was.

column2: Philippians 2:27 For indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow.
column3: Filippense 2:27 Want hy was ook siek tot by die dood; maar God was hom barmhartig, en nie hom alleen nie, maar ook my, dat ek nie droefheid op droefheid sou hê nie.

column2: Philippians 2:28 I sent him therefore the more carefully, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.
column3: Filippense 2:28 Ek het hom dus des te spoediger gestuur, sodat julle hom kan sien en julle weer verbly en ek minder bedroef kan wees.

column2: Philippians 2:29 Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness; and hold such in reputation:
column3: Filippense 2:29 Ontvang hom dan in die Here met alle blydskap en hou sulke manne in eer.

column2: Philippians 2:30 Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death, not regarding his life, to supply your lack of service toward me.
column3: Filippense 2:30 Want ter wille van die werk van Christus het hy tot naby die dood gekom en sy lewe gewaag om aan te vul wat julle kortgekom het in die diensbetoning aan my.

column2: Philippians 3:1 Finally, my brethren, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed [is] not grievous, but for you [it is] safe.
column3: Filippense 3:1 VERDER, my broeders, verbly julle in die Here. Dit is vir my nie lastig om dieselfde dinge aan julle te skrywe nie, en dit gee julle sekerheid.

column2: Philippians 3:2 Beware of dogs, beware of evil workers, beware of the concision.
column3: Filippense 3:2 Let op die honde; let op die slegte arbeiders; let op die versnyding.

column2: Philippians 3:3 For we are the circumcision, which worship God in the spirit, and rejoice in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh.
column3: Filippense 3:3 Want óns is die besnydenis, ons wat God in die Gees dien en in Christus Jesus roem en nie op die vlees vertrou nie;

column2: Philippians 3:4 Though I might also have confidence in the flesh. If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh, I more:
column3: Filippense 3:4 alhoewel ek rede het om ook te vertrou op die vlees. As iemand anders meen dat hy op die vlees kan vertrou, ek nog meer.

column2: Philippians 3:5 Circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, [of] the tribe of Benjamin, an Hebrew of the Hebrews; as touching the law, a Pharisee;
column3: Filippense 3:5 Ek is besny op die agtste dag, uit die geslag van Israel, uit die stam van Benjamin, ’n Hebreër uit die Hebreërs; wat die wet betref, ’n Fariseër;

column2: Philippians 3:6 Concerning zeal, persecuting the church; touching the righteousness which is in the law, blameless.
column3: Filippense 3:6 wat ywer betref, ’n vervolger van die gemeente; wat die geregtigheid in die wet betref, onberispelik.

column2: Philippians 3:7 But what things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ.
column3: Filippense 3:7 Maar wat vir my wins was, dit het ek om Christus wil skade geag.

column2: Philippians 3:8 Yea doubtless, and I count all things [but] loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them [but] dung, that I may win Christ,
column3: Filippense 3:8 Ja waarlik, ek ag ook alles skade om die uitnemendheid van die kennis van Christus Jesus, my Here, ter wille van wie ek alles prysgegee het en as drek beskou, om Christus as wins te verkry

column2: Philippians 3:9 And be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:
column3: Filippense 3:9 en in Hom gevind te word, nie met my geregtigheid wat uit die wet is nie, maar met dié wat deur die geloof in Christus is, die geregtigheid wat uit God is deur die geloof;

column2: Philippians 3:10 That I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made conformable unto his death;
column3: Filippense 3:10 sodat ek Hom kan ken en die krag van sy opstanding en die gemeenskap aan sy lyde terwyl ek aan sy dood gelykvormig word,

column2: Philippians 3:11 If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead.
column3: Filippense 3:11 of ek miskien die opstanding uit die dode kan bereik.

column2: Philippians 3:12 Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.
column3: Filippense 3:12 Nie dat ek dit al verkry het of al volmaak is nie, maar ek jaag daarna of ek dit ook kan gryp, omdat ek ook deur Christus Jesus gegryp is.

column2: Philippians 3:13 Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but [this] one thing [I do], forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before,
column3: Filippense 3:13 Broeders, ek reken nie dat ek dit self gegryp het nie.

column2: Philippians 3:14 I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
column3: Filippense 3:14 Maar een ding: ek vergeet die dinge wat agter is en strek my uit na wat voor is, en jaag na die doel om die prys te verkry van die hoë roeping van God in Christus Jesus.

column2: Philippians 3:15 Let us therefore, as many as be perfect, be thus minded: and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded, God shall reveal even this unto you.
column3: Filippense 3:15 Laat ons almal dan wat volmaak is, so gesind wees; en as julle anders gesind is, sal God dit ook aan julle openbaar.

column2: Philippians 3:16 Nevertheless, whereto we have already attained, let us walk by the same rule, let us mind the same thing.
column3: Filippense 3:16 Maar wat ons reeds bereik het — laat ons volgens dieselfde reël wandel, laat ons eensgesind wees.

column2: Philippians 3:17 Brethren, be followers together of me, and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample.
column3: Filippense 3:17 Wees ook my navolgers, broeders, en let op die wat so wandel soos julle ons tot voorbeeld het.

column2: Philippians 3:18 (For many walk, of whom I have told you often, and now tell you even weeping, [that they are] the enemies of the cross of Christ:
column3: Filippense 3:18 Want baie — van wie ek julle dit dikwels gesê het en nou ook onder trane sê — wandel as vyande van die kruis van Christus.

column2: Philippians 3:19 Whose end [is] destruction, whose God [is their] belly, and [whose] glory [is] in their shame, who mind earthly things.)
column3: Filippense 3:19 Hulle einde is die verderf, hulle god is die buik en hulle eer is in hulle skande; hulle bedink aardse dinge.

column2: Philippians 3:20 For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:
column3: Filippense 3:20 Want ons burgerskap is in die hemele, van waar ons ook as Verlosser verwag die Here Jesus Christus,

column2: Philippians 3:21 Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
column3: Filippense 3:21 wat ons vernederde liggaam van gedaante sal verander, om gelykvormig te word aan sy verheerlikte liggaam volgens die werking waardeur Hy ook alles aan Homself kan onderwerp.

column2: Philippians 4:1 Therefore, my brethren dearly beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand fast in the Lord, [my] dearly beloved.
column3: Filippense 4:1 DAAROM, my geliefde broeders, na wie ek ook verlang, my blydskap en kroon, staan so vas in die Here, geliefdes.

column2: Philippians 4:2 I beseech Euodias, and beseech Syntyche, that they be of the same mind in the Lord.
column3: Filippense 4:2 Ek vermaan Euódia en ek vermaan Síntiché om eensgesind te wees in die Here.

column2: Philippians 4:3 And I intreat thee also, true yokefellow, help those women which laboured with me in the gospel, with Clement also, and [with] other my fellowlabourers, whose names [are] in the book of life.
column3: Filippense 4:3 En ek vra jou ook, opregte metgesel, wees hierdie vroue behulpsaam wat met my saam gestry het in die evangelie, ook saam met Clemens en my ander mede-arbeiders wie se name in die boek van die lewe is.

column2: Philippians 4:4 Rejoice in the Lord alway: [and] again I say, Rejoice.
column3: Filippense 4:4 Verbly julle altyd in die Here; ek herhaal: Verbly julle!

column2: Philippians 4:5 Let your moderation be known unto all men. The Lord [is] at hand.
column3: Filippense 4:5 Laat julle vriendelikheid aan alle mense bekend word. Die Here is naby.

column2: Philippians 4:6 Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
column3: Filippense 4:6 Wees oor niks besorg nie, maar laat julle begeertes in alles deur gebed en smeking met danksegging bekend word by God.

column2: Philippians 4:7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
column3: Filippense 4:7 En die vrede van God, wat alle verstand te bowe gaan, sal julle harte en julle sinne bewaar in Christus Jesus.

column2: Philippians 4:8 Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things [are] honest, whatsoever things [are] just, whatsoever things [are] pure, whatsoever things [are] lovely, whatsoever things [are] of good report; if [there be] any virtue, and if [there be] any praise, think on these things.
column3: Filippense 4:8 Verder, broeders, alles wat waar is, alles wat eerbaar is, alles wat regverdig is, alles wat rein is, alles wat lieflik is, alles wat loflik is — watter deug en watter lof daar ook mag wees, bedink dit.

column2: Philippians 4:9 Those things, which ye have both learned, and received, and heard, and seen in me, do: and the God of peace shall be with you.
column3: Filippense 4:9 En wat julle geleer en ontvang en gehoor en in my gesien het, doen dit, en die God van vrede sal met julle wees.

column2: Philippians 4:10 But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly, that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again; wherein ye were also careful, but ye lacked opportunity.
column3: Filippense 4:10 EK het my grootliks verbly in die Here dat julle nou eindelik weer opgeleef het om aan my belange te dink; waaraan julle ook gedink het, maar julle het die geleentheid nie gehad nie.

column2: Philippians 4:11 Not that I speak in respect of want: for I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, [therewith] to be content.
column3: Filippense 4:11 Nie dat ek dit uit gebrek sê nie, want ek het geleer om vergenoeg te wees met die omstandighede waarin ek is.

column2: Philippians 4:12 I know both how to be abased, and I know how to abound: every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry, both to abound and to suffer need.
column3: Filippense 4:12 Ek weet om verneder te word, ek weet ook om oorvloed te hê; in elke opsig en in alle dinge is ek onderrig: om versadig te word sowel as om honger te ly, om oorvloed te hê sowel as om gebrek te ly.

column2: Philippians 4:13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
column3: Filippense 4:13 Ek is tot alles in staat deur Christus wat my krag gee.

column2: Philippians 4:14 Notwithstanding ye have well done, that ye did communicate with my affliction.
column3: Filippense 4:14 Nogtans het julle goed gedoen toe julle deel gehad het in my verdrukking.

column2: Philippians 4:15 Now ye Philippians know also, that in the beginning of the gospel, when I departed from Macedonia, no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving, but ye only.
column3: Filippense 4:15 En julle, Filippense, weet ook dat in die begin van die evangelie, toe ek van Macedónië vertrek het, geen gemeente deel gehad het in my rekening van uitgawe en inkomste nie, behalwe julle alleen.

column2: Philippians 4:16 For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity.
column3: Filippense 4:16 Want ook in Thessaloníka het julle vir my behoefte meer as een maal iets gestuur.

column2: Philippians 4:17 Not because I desire a gift: but I desire fruit that may abound to your account.
column3: Filippense 4:17 Nie dat ek die gawe soek nie, maar ek soek die vrug wat oorvloedig word op julle rekening.

column2: Philippians 4:18 But I have all, and abound: I am full, having received of Epaphroditus the things [which were sent] from you, an odour of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, wellpleasing to God.
column3: Filippense 4:18 Maar ek het alles ontvang, en ek het oorvloed. Ek het dit volop noudat ek van Epafrodítus ontvang het wat deur julle gestuur is, ’n lieflike geur, ’n welgevallige offer, welbehaaglik by God.

column2: Philippians 4:19 But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
column3: Filippense 4:19 En my God sal elke behoefte van julle vervul na sy rykdom in heerlikheid deur Christus Jesus.

column2: Philippians 4:20 Now unto God and our Father [be] glory for ever and ever. Amen.
column3: Filippense 4:20 Aan onse God en Vader die heerlikheid tot in alle ewigheid! Amen.

column2: Philippians 4:21 Salute every saint in Christ Jesus. The brethren which are with me greet you.
column3: Filippense 4:21 Groet elke heilige in Christus Jesus. Die broeders wat saam met my is, groet julle.

column2: Philippians 4:22 All the saints salute you, chiefly they that are of Caesar's household.
column3: Filippense 4:22 Al die heiliges, en veral die wat aan die keiserlike huis behoort, groet julle.

column2: Philippians 4:23 The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ [be] with you all. Amen. <<[To [the] Philippians written from Rome, by Epaphroditus.]>>
column3: Filippense 4:23 Die genade van onse Here Jesus Christus sy met julle almal! Amen.

column2: Colossians 1:1 Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, and Timotheus [our] brother,
column3: Kolossense 1:1 PAULUS, ’n apostel van Jesus Christus deur die wil van God, en die broeder Timótheüs,

column2: Colossians 1:2 To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse: Grace [be] unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
column3: Kolossense 1:2 aan die heilige en gelowige broeders in Christus wat in Kolosse is: Genade vir julle en vrede van God onse Vader en die Here Jesus Christus!

column2: Colossians 1:3 We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,
column3: Kolossense 1:3 ONS dank die God en Vader van onse Here Jesus Christus altyd as ons vir julle bid,

column2: Colossians 1:4 Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love [which ye have] to all the saints,
column3: Kolossense 1:4 omdat ons gehoor het van julle geloof in Christus Jesus en julle liefde tot al die heiliges,

column2: Colossians 1:5 For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel;
column3: Kolossense 1:5 vanweë die hoop wat vir julle weggelê is in die hemele, waarvan julle vroeër gehoor het deur die woord van die waarheid van die evangelie,

column2: Colossians 1:6 Which is come unto you, as [it is] in all the world; and bringeth forth fruit, as [it doth] also in you, since the day ye heard [of it], and knew the grace of God in truth:
column3: Kolossense 1:6 wat julle sowel as die hele wêreld bereik het; en dit dra vrug, net soos onder julle ook, van die dag af dat julle dit gehoor het en die genade van God in waarheid leer ken het;

column2: Colossians 1:7 As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant, who is for you a faithful minister of Christ;
column3: Kolossense 1:7 soos julle ook geleer het van Épafras, ons geliefde mededienskneg, wat ’n getroue dienaar van Christus vir julle is,

column2: Colossians 1:8 Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit.
column3: Kolossense 1:8 wat ook julle liefde in die Gees aan ons te kenne gegee het.

column2: Colossians 1:9 For this cause we also, since the day we heard [it], do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;
column3: Kolossense 1:9 Daarom hou ons ook nie op nie, van die dag af dat ons dit gehoor het, om vir julle te bid en te vra dat julle vervul mag word met die kennis van sy wil in alle wysheid en geestelike insig,

column2: Colossians 1:10 That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;
column3: Kolossense 1:10 sodat julle waardiglik voor die Here mag wandel om Hom in alles te behaag en julle in elke goeie werk vrug mag dra en in die kennis van God mag groei,

column2: Colossians 1:11 Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;
column3: Kolossense 1:11 en met alle krag bekragtig word volgens die mag van sy heerlikheid tot alle lydsaamheid en lankmoedigheid met blydskap,

column2: Colossians 1:12 Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light:
column3: Kolossense 1:12 en die Vader mag dank wat ons bekwaam gemaak het om deel te hê aan die erfdeel van die heiliges in die lig —

column2: Colossians 1:13 Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated [us] into the kingdom of his dear Son:
column3: Kolossense 1:13 Hy wat ons verlos het uit die mag van die duisternis en oorgebring het in die koninkryk van die Seun van sy liefde,

column2: Colossians 1:14 In whom we have redemption through his blood, [even] the forgiveness of sins:
column3: Kolossense 1:14 in wie ons die verlossing het deur sy bloed, naamlik die vergifnis van die sondes.

column2: Colossians 1:15 Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature:
column3: Kolossense 1:15 Hy is die Beeld van die onsienlike God, die Eersgeborene van die hele skepping;

column2: Colossians 1:16 For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether [they be] thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:
column3: Kolossense 1:16 want in Hom is alle dinge geskape wat in die hemele en op die aarde is, wat sienlik en onsienlik is, trone sowel as heerskappye en owerhede en magte — alle dinge is deur Hom en tot Hom geskape.

column2: Colossians 1:17 And he is before all things, and by him all things consist.
column3: Kolossense 1:17 En Hy is voor alle dinge, en in Hom hou alle dinge stand.

column2: Colossians 1:18 And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all [things] he might have the preeminence.
column3: Kolossense 1:18 En Hy is die Hoof van die liggaam, naamlik die gemeente; Hy wat die begin is, die Eersgeborene uit die dode, sodat Hy in alles die eerste kan wees.

column2: Colossians 1:19 For it pleased [the Father] that in him should all fulness dwell;
column3: Kolossense 1:19 Want dit het die Vader behaag dat in Hom die ganse volheid sou woon

column2: Colossians 1:20 And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, [I say], whether [they be] things in earth, or things in heaven.
column3: Kolossense 1:20 en dat Hy deur Hom alles met Homself sou versoen nadat Hy vrede gemaak het deur die bloed van sy kruis — ek sê deur Hom — die dinge op die aarde sowel as die dinge in die hemele.

column2: Colossians 1:21 And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies in [your] mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled
column3: Kolossense 1:21 Ook julle wat vroeër vervreemd was en vyandig gesind deur die bose werke, het Hy nou versoen

column2: Colossians 1:22 In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:
column3: Kolossense 1:22 in die liggaam van sy vlees deur die dood, om julle heilig en sonder gebrek en onberispelik voor Hom te stel;

column2: Colossians 1:23 If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and [be] not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, [and] which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;
column3: Kolossense 1:23 as julle ten minste gegrond en vas bly in die geloof en julle nie laat afbring van die hoop van die evangelie nie, wat julle gehoor het en wat verkondig is in die ganse mensdom onder die hemel, waarvan ek, Paulus, ’n dienaar geword het.

column2: Colossians 1:24 Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body's sake, which is the church:
column3: Kolossense 1:24 NOU verbly ek my in my lyding vir julle en vul in my vlees aan die oorblyfsels van die verdrukking van Christus vir sy liggaam, wat die gemeente is;

column2: Colossians 1:25 Whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, to fulfil the word of God;
column3: Kolossense 1:25 waarvan ek ’n dienaar geword het volgens die bediening van God wat aan my gegee is in julle belang, om die woord van God te vervul,

column2: Colossians 1:26 [Even] the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations, but now is made manifest to his saints:
column3: Kolossense 1:26 naamlik die verborgenheid wat van die eeue en geslagte af verborge was, maar nou geopenbaar is aan sy heiliges,

column2: Colossians 1:27 To whom God would make known what [is] the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:
column3: Kolossense 1:27 aan wie God wou bekend maak wat die rykdom van die heerlikheid van hierdie verborgenheid onder die heidene is, dit is Christus onder julle, die hoop van die heerlikheid.

column2: Colossians 1:28 Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:
column3: Kolossense 1:28 Hom verkondig ons, terwyl ons elke mens vermaan en elke mens in alle wysheid onderrig, om elke mens volmaak in Christus Jesus voor te stel;

column2: Colossians 1:29 Whereunto I also labour, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.
column3: Kolossense 1:29 waarvoor ek arbei en stry volgens sy werking wat in my werk met krag.

column2: Colossians 2:1 For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you, and [for] them at Laodicea, and [for] as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;
column3: Kolossense 2:1 WANT ek wil hê dat julle moet weet wat ’n groot stryd ek oor julle het, en oor die wat in Laodicéa is en almal wat my aangesig in die vlees nie gesien het nie,

column2: Colossians 2:2 That their hearts might be comforted, being knit together in love, and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding, to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God, and of the Father, and of Christ;
column3: Kolossense 2:2 dat hulle harte vertroos mag word, deurdat hulle saamgevoeg word in die liefde en tot alle rykdom van die volle versekerdheid van insig, om die verborgenheid te leer ken van God en die Vader en van Christus,

column2: Colossians 2:3 In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.
column3: Kolossense 2:3 in wie al die skatte van wysheid en kennis verborge is.

column2: Colossians 2:4 And this I say, lest any man should beguile you with enticing words.
column3: Kolossense 2:4 DIT sê ek, sodat niemand julle mag verlei met drogredes nie.

column2: Colossians 2:5 For though I be absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit, joying and beholding your order, and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ.
column3: Kolossense 2:5 Want al is ek ook na die vlees afwesig, tog is ek by julle in die gees, en ek verbly my om julle goeie orde te sien en die vastigheid van julle geloof in Christus.

column2: Colossians 2:6 As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, [so] walk ye in him:
column3: Kolossense 2:6 Soos julle dan Christus Jesus, die Here, aangeneem het, wandel so in Hom,

column2: Colossians 2:7 Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.
column3: Kolossense 2:7 gewortel en opgebou in Hom en bevestig in die geloof, soos julle geleer is, terwyl julle daarin oorvloedig is in danksegging.

column2: Colossians 2:8 Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the rudiments of the world, and not after Christ.
column3: Kolossense 2:8 Pas op dat niemand julle as ’n buit wegvoer deur die wysbegeerte en nietige misleiding nie, volgens die oorlewering van die mense, volgens die eerste beginsels van die wêreld en nie volgens Christus nie.

column2: Colossians 2:9 For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.
column3: Kolossense 2:9 Want in Hom woon al die volheid van die Godheid liggaamlik;

column2: Colossians 2:10 And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:
column3: Kolossense 2:10 en julle het die volheid in Hom wat die Hoof is van alle owerheid en mag;

column2: Colossians 2:11 In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ:
column3: Kolossense 2:11 in wie julle ook besny is met ’n besnydenis wat nie met hande verrig word nie, deur die liggaam van die sondige vlees af te lê in die besnydenis van Christus,

column2: Colossians 2:12 Buried with him in baptism, wherein also ye are risen with [him] through the faith of the operation of God, who hath raised him from the dead.
column3: Kolossense 2:12 omdat julle saam met Hom begrawe is in die doop, waarin julle ook saam opgewek is deur die geloof in die werking van God wat Hom uit die dode opgewek het.

column2: Colossians 2:13 And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;
column3: Kolossense 2:13 En julle, wat dood was deur die misdade en die onbesnedenheid van julle vlees, het Hy saam met Hom lewend gemaak deurdat Hy julle al die misdade vergeef het,

column2: Colossians 2:14 Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;
column3: Kolossense 2:14 en die skuldbrief teen ons, wat met sy insettinge ons vyandig was, uitgedelg en weggeruim het deur dit aan die kruis vas te nael,

column2: Colossians 2:15 [And] having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.
column3: Kolossense 2:15 nadat Hy die owerhede en magte uitgeklee en hulle in die openbaar tentoongestel en daardeur oor hulle getriomfeer het.

column2: Colossians 2:16 Let no man therefore judge you in meat, or in drink, or in respect of an holyday, or of the new moon, or of the sabbath [days]:
column3: Kolossense 2:16 Laat niemand julle dan oordeel in spys of in drank of met betrekking tot ’n fees of nuwemaan of sabbat nie,

column2: Colossians 2:17 Which are a shadow of things to come; but the body [is] of Christ.
column3: Kolossense 2:17 wat ’n skaduwee is van die toekomstige dinge; maar die liggaam behoort aan Christus.

column2: Colossians 2:18 Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels, intruding into those things which he hath not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,
column3: Kolossense 2:18 Laat niemand julle van jul prys beroof nie, al sou hy behae hê in nederigheid en verering van die engele en indring in wat hy nie gesien het nie, en sonder oorsaak opgeblase wees deur sy vleeslike gesindheid,

column2: Colossians 2:19 And not holding the Head, from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered, and knit together, increaseth with the increase of God.
column3: Kolossense 2:19 en nie vashou aan die Hoof nie, uit wie die hele liggaam deur die gewrigte en verbindinge ondersteuning ontvang en saamgebind word en so met goddelike groei groot word.

column2: Colossians 2:20 Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world, why, as though living in the world, are ye subject to ordinances,
column3: Kolossense 2:20 As julle dan saam met Christus die eerste beginsels van die wêreld afgesterf het, waarom is julle, asof julle nog in die wêreld lewe, onderworpe aan insettinge

column2: Colossians 2:21 (Touch not; taste not; handle not;
column3: Kolossense 2:21 soos: raak nie, smaak nie, roer nie aan nie? —

column2: Colossians 2:22 Which all are to perish with the using;) after the commandments and doctrines of men?
column3: Kolossense 2:22 almal dinge wat deur die gebruik bestem is om te vergaan — volgens die gebooie en leringe van mense,

column2: Colossians 2:23 Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship, and humility, and neglecting of the body; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh.
column3: Kolossense 2:23 wat, alhoewel dit ’n skyn van wysheid het, in eiesinnige godsdiens en nederigheid en in gestrengheid teen die liggaam, geen waarde het nie, maar strek tot versadiging van die vlees.

column2: Colossians 3:1 If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.
column3: Kolossense 3:1 AS julle dan saam met Christus opgewek is, soek die dinge daarbo waar Christus is en aan die regterhand van God sit.

column2: Colossians 3:2 Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
column3: Kolossense 3:2 Bedink die dinge wat daarbo is, nie wat op die aarde is nie.

column2: Colossians 3:3 For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
column3: Kolossense 3:3 Want julle het gesterwe, en julle lewe is saam met Christus verborge in God.

column2: Colossians 3:4 When Christ, [who is] our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
column3: Kolossense 3:4 Wanneer Christus, wat ons lewe is, geopenbaar word, dan sal julle ook saam met Hom in heerlikheid geopenbaar word.

column2: Colossians 3:5 Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:
column3: Kolossense 3:5 Maak dood dan julle lede wat op die aarde is, naamlik hoerery, onreinheid, hartstog, slegte begeertes en gierigheid, wat afgodediens is,

column2: Colossians 3:6 For which things' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:
column3: Kolossense 3:6 waardeur die toorn van God oor die kinders van die ongehoorsaamheid kom,

column2: Colossians 3:7 In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.
column3: Kolossense 3:7 waarin julle ook vroeër gewandel het toe julle daarin geleef het.

column2: Colossians 3:8 But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.
column3: Kolossense 3:8 Maar nou moet julle ook dit alles aflê, naamlik toorn, woede, boosheid, laster, skandelike taal uit julle mond.

column2: Colossians 3:9 Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;
column3: Kolossense 3:9 Lieg nie vir mekaar nie, omdat julle die oue mens met sy werke afgelê het

column2: Colossians 3:10 And have put on the new [man], which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:
column3: Kolossense 3:10 en julle jul met die nuwe mens beklee het wat vernuwe word tot kennis na die beeld van sy Skepper,

column2: Colossians 3:11 Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond [nor] free: but Christ [is] all, and in all.
column3: Kolossense 3:11 waar daar nie Griek en Jood, besnedene en onbesnedene, barbaar, Scith, slaaf, vryman is nie, maar Christus is alles en in almal.

column2: Colossians 3:12 Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
column3: Kolossense 3:12 Beklee julle dan, as uitverkorenes van God, heiliges en geliefdes, met innerlike ontferming, goedertierenheid, nederigheid, sagmoedigheid, lankmoedigheid.

column2: Colossians 3:13 Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also [do] ye.
column3: Kolossense 3:13 Verdra mekaar en vergewe mekaar as die een teen die ander ’n klag het; soos Christus julle vergeef het, so moet julle ook doen.

column2: Colossians 3:14 And above all these things [put on] charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
column3: Kolossense 3:14 En beklee julle bo dit alles met die liefde wat die band van die volmaaktheid is.

column2: Colossians 3:15 And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.
column3: Kolossense 3:15 En laat die vrede van God, waartoe julle ook in een liggaam geroep is, in julle harte heers, en wees dankbaar.

column2: Colossians 3:16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
column3: Kolossense 3:16 Laat die woord van Christus ryklik in julle woon in alle wysheid. Leer en vermaan mekaar met psalms en lofsange en geestelike liedere, en sing in julle hart met dankbaarheid tot eer van die Here.

column2: Colossians 3:17 And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, [do] all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.
column3: Kolossense 3:17 En wat julle ook al doen in woord of in daad, doen alles in die Naam van die Here Jesus en dank God die Vader deur Hom.

column2: Colossians 3:18 Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.
column3: Kolossense 3:18 VROUE, wees julle mans onderdanig soos dit betaamlik is in die Here.

column2: Colossians 3:19 Husbands, love [your] wives, and be not bitter against them.
column3: Kolossense 3:19 Manne, julle moet jul vroue liefhê en nie teen hulle verbitter word nie.

column2: Colossians 3:20 Children, obey [your] parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.
column3: Kolossense 3:20 Kinders, julle moet jul ouers in alles gehoorsaam wees, want dit is die Here welbehaaglik.

column2: Colossians 3:21 Fathers, provoke not your children [to anger], lest they be discouraged.
column3: Kolossense 3:21 Vaders, moenie julle kinders terg nie, sodat hulle nie moedeloos word nie.

column2: Colossians 3:22 Servants, obey in all things [your] masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:
column3: Kolossense 3:22 Diensknegte, julle moet jul here na die vlees in alles gehoorsaam wees, nie met oëdiens soos mensebehaers nie, maar in eenvoudigheid van hart, omdat julle God vrees.

column2: Colossians 3:23 And whatsoever ye do, do [it] heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
column3: Kolossense 3:23 En wat julle ook al doen, doen dit van harte soos vir die Here en nie vir mense nie,

column2: Colossians 3:24 Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.
column3: Kolossense 3:24 omdat julle weet dat julle van die Here die erfenis as vergelding sal ontvang, want julle dien die Here Christus.

column2: Colossians 3:25 But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
column3: Kolossense 3:25 Maar wie onreg doen, sal die onreg wat hy gedoen het, terug ontvang; en daar is geen aanneming van die persoon nie.

column2: Colossians 4:1 Masters, give unto [your] servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.
column3: Kolossense 4:1 BETOON reg en billikheid, here, aan julle diensknegte, omdat julle weet dat julle ook ’n Here in die hemele het.

column2: Colossians 4:2 Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;
column3: Kolossense 4:2 VOLHARD in die gebed en waak daarin met danksegging;

column2: Colossians 4:3 Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:
column3: Kolossense 4:3 en bid tegelykertyd ook vir ons, dat God vir ons die deur van die woord mag open om te spreek van die verborgenheid van Christus, waarvoor ek ook in boeie is,

column2: Colossians 4:4 That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.
column3: Kolossense 4:4 dat ek dit openbaar kan maak soos ek dit behoort te spreek.

column2: Colossians 4:5 Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.
column3: Kolossense 4:5 Wandel in wysheid teenoor die wat buite is, en koop die tyd uit.

column2: Colossians 4:6 Let your speech [be] alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.
column3: Kolossense 4:6 Laat julle woord altyd aangenaam wees, met sout besprinkel, sodat julle kan weet hoe julle iedereen moet antwoord.

column2: Colossians 4:7 All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, [who is] a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:
column3: Kolossense 4:7 AL my omstandighede sal Tíchikus, die geliefde broeder en getroue dienaar en mededienskneg in die Here, julle bekend maak.

column2: Colossians 4:8 Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;
column3: Kolossense 4:8 Ek het hom na julle gestuur juis hiervoor, om julle toestande te leer ken en julle harte te vertroos,

column2: Colossians 4:9 With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is [one] of you. They shall make known unto you all things which [are done] here.
column3: Kolossense 4:9 saam met Onésimus, die getroue en geliefde broeder wat van julle mense is. Hulle sal julle alles bekend maak wat hier voorval.

column2: Colossians 4:10 Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister's son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)
column3: Kolossense 4:10 Aristárchus, my medegevangene, groet julle; en Markus, die neef van Bárnabas, oor wie julle bevele ontvang het — as hy by julle kom, ontvang hom —

column2: Colossians 4:11 And Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only [are my] fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.
column3: Kolossense 4:11 ook Jesus wat Justus genoem word, manne wat uit die besnydenis is. Hulle alleen is my medewerkers vir die koninkryk van God en hulle was ’n troos vir my.

column2: Colossians 4:12 Epaphras, who is [one] of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.
column3: Kolossense 4:12 Épafras wat een van julle is, ’n dienskneg van Christus, groet julle en stry altyd vir julle in die gebede, dat julle volmaak en volkome mag staan in die ganse wil van God.

column2: Colossians 4:13 For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them [that are] in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.
column3: Kolossense 4:13 Want ek getuig van hom dat hy ’n groot ywer het vir julle en vir die wat in Laodicéa en die wat in Hiërápolis is.

column2: Colossians 4:14 Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.
column3: Kolossense 4:14 Die geneesheer Lukas, die geliefde, en Demas groet julle.

column2: Colossians 4:15 Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.
column3: Kolossense 4:15 Groet die broeders in Laodicéa en Nimfas en die gemeente wat in sy huis is.

column2: Colossians 4:16 And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the [epistle] from Laodicea.
column3: Kolossense 4:16 En wanneer hierdie brief by julle gelees is, sorg dat dit ook in die gemeente van die Laodicense gelees word en dat julle ook dié uit Laodicéa lees.

column2: Colossians 4:17 And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.
column3: Kolossense 4:17 En sê aan Archíppus: Gee ag op die bediening wat jy ontvang het in die Here, dat jy dit vervul.

column2: Colossians 4:18 The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace [be] with you. Amen. <<[Written from Rome to Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.]>>
column3: Kolossense 4:18 Die groete van Paulus, met my eie hand. Dink aan my boeie. Die genade sy met julle! Amen.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:1 Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians [which is] in God the Father and [in] the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace [be] unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:1 PAULUS en Silvánus en Timótheüs aan die gemeente van die Thessalonicense wat in God die Vader en die Here Jesus Christus is: Genade vir julle en vrede van God onse Vader en die Here Jesus Christus!

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:2 We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:2 ONS dank God altyd oor julle almal as ons aan julle dink in ons gebede

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:3 Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:3 en onophoudelik in gedagte hou die werk van julle geloof en die arbeid van julle liefde en die lydsaamheid van julle hoop op onse Here Jesus Christus, voor onse God en Vader,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:4 Knowing, brethren beloved, your election of God.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:4 omdat ons weet van julle verkiesing, broeders wat deur God bemin word.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:5 For our gospel came not unto you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Ghost, and in much assurance; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:5 Want ons evangelie het tot julle nie gekom in woord alleen nie, maar ook in krag en in die Heilige Gees en in volle versekerdheid, soos julle weet hoedanig ons onder julle om julle ontwil gewees het.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:6 And ye became followers of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Ghost:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:6 En julle het navolgers van ons geword en van die Here deurdat julle die woord in baie verdrukking ontvang het met die blydskap van die Heilige Gees,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:7 So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:7 sodat julle voorbeelde geword het vir al die gelowiges in Macedónië en Acháje.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:8 For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith to God-ward is spread abroad; so that we need not to speak any thing.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:8 Want van julle uit het die woord van die Here weerklink nie alleen in Macedónië en Acháje nie, maar ook op elke plek het julle geloof in God uitgegaan, sodat ons nie nodig het om daar iets van te sê nie.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:9 For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you, and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God;
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:9 Want hulle vertel self aangaande ons watter ingang ons by julle gehad het en hoe julle jul van die afgode bekeer het tot God, om die lewende en waaragtige God te dien

column2: 1 Thessalonians 1:10 And to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, [even] Jesus, which delivered us from the wrath to come.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 1:10 en sy Seun uit die hemele te verwag, wat Hy uit die dode opgewek het, Jesus wat ons van die toekomstige toorn verlos.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:1 For yourselves, brethren, know our entrance in unto you, that it was not in vain:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:1 JULLE weet tog self, broeders, dat ons ingang by julle nie tevergeefs was nie;

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:2 But even after that we had suffered before, and were shamefully entreated, as ye know, at Philippi, we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:2 maar alhoewel ons vantevore, soos julle weet, in Filíppi gely het en mishandel is, het ons in onse God vrymoedigheid gehad om aan julle die evangelie van God te verkondig onder veel stryd.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:3 For our exhortation [was] not of deceit, nor of uncleanness, nor in guile:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:3 Want ons vermaning was nie uit dwaling of uit onsuiwerheid of uit bedrog nie;

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:4 But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel, even so we speak; not as pleasing men, but God, which trieth our hearts.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:4 maar soos ons deur God waardig geag is dat die evangelie aan ons toevertrou sou word, so spreek ons, nie om mense te behaag nie, maar God wat ons harte beproef.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:5 For neither at any time used we flattering words, as ye know, nor a cloke of covetousness; God [is] witness:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:5 Want ons het, soos julle weet, ons nooit met vleitaal opgehou of met bedekte hebsug nie. God is getuie.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:6 Nor of men sought we glory, neither of you, nor [yet] of others, when we might have been burdensome, as the apostles of Christ.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:6 Ook het ons nie eer van mense, òf van julle òf van ander gesoek nie, al kon ons as apostels van Christus met gesag optree.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:7 But we were gentle among you, even as a nurse cherisheth her children:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:7 Maar ons was vriendelik onder julle soos ’n pleegmoeder haar kinders koester.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:8 So being affectionately desirous of you, we were willing to have imparted unto you, not the gospel of God only, but also our own souls, because ye were dear unto us.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:8 Terwyl ons so na julle verlang het, was dit ons aangenaam om aan julle nie alleen die evangelie van God mee te deel nie, maar ook ons eie lewe, omdat julle vir ons dierbaar geword het.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:9 For ye remember, brethren, our labour and travail: for labouring night and day, because we would not be chargeable unto any of you, we preached unto you the gospel of God.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:9 Julle onthou tog, broeders, ons arbeid en inspanning; want terwyl ons nag en dag gewerk het om niemand van julle te beswaar nie, het ons die evangelie van God aan julle verkondig.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:10 Ye [are] witnesses, and God [also], how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:10 Julle is getuies, en God, hoe heilig en regverdig en onberispelik ons ons gedra het teenoor julle wat glo,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:11 As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you, as a father [doth] his children,
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:11 hoe ons, soos julle weet, net soos ’n vader sy kinders, elkeen van julle vermaan en bemoedig het

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:12 That ye would walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:12 en betuig het dat julle waardiglik moet wandel voor God wat julle tot sy koninkryk en heerlikheid roep.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:13 For this cause also thank we God without ceasing, because, when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us, ye received [it] not [as] the word of men, but as it is in truth, the word of God, which effectually worketh also in you that believe.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:13 Daarom dank ons God ook sonder ophou dat, toe julle die woord van God ontvang het wat deur ons verkondig is, julle dit aangeneem het nie as die woord van mense nie, maar, soos dit waarlik is, as die woord van God wat ook werk in julle wat glo.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:14 For ye, brethren, became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus: for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen, even as they [have] of the Jews:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:14 Want julle, broeders, het navolgers geword van die gemeentes van God wat in Christus Jesus is in Judéa, omdat julle ook dieselfde dinge gely het van julle eie stamgenote net soos hulle van die Jode,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:15 Who both killed the Lord Jesus, and their own prophets, and have persecuted us; and they please not God, and are contrary to all men:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:15 wat ook die Here Jesus en hulle eie profete gedood en ons vervolg het en God nie behaag nie en teen alle mense gekant is,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:16 Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved, to fill up their sins alway: for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:16 deurdat hulle ons verhinder om tot die heidene te spreek dat hulle gered kan word, sodat hulle die maat van hulle sondes gedurig vol kan maak. Maar die toorn het oor hulle gekom tot die einde toe.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:17 But we, brethren, being taken from you for a short time in presence, not in heart, endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:17 MAAR nadat ons, broeders, ’n kort tydjie van julle geskeie was — in persoon, nie met die hart nie — het ons met groot verlange ons des te meer beywer om julle aangesig te sien.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:18 Wherefore we would have come unto you, even I Paul, once and again; but Satan hindered us.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:18 Daarom wou ons na julle toe kom, ek Paulus, meer as een maal; maar die Satan het ons verhinder.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:19 For what [is] our hope, or joy, or crown of rejoicing? [Are] not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming?
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:19 Want wie anders as julle is ons hoop of blydskap of kroon van roem in die teenwoordigheid van onse Here Jesus Christus by sy wederkoms?

column2: 1 Thessalonians 2:20 For ye are our glory and joy.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 2:20 Want julle is ons eer en blydskap.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:1 Wherefore when we could no longer forbear, we thought it good to be left at Athens alone;
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:1 DAAROM, toe ons dit nie langer kon uithou nie, het ons besluit om in Athéne alleen agter te bly;

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:2 And sent Timotheus, our brother, and minister of God, and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:2 en ons het Timótheüs, ons broeder en dienaar van God en ons medewerker in die evangelie van Christus, gestuur om julle te versterk en julle te bemoedig in julle geloof,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:3 That no man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:3 sodat niemand verontrus mag word onder hierdie verdrukkinge nie; want julle weet self dat ons hiervoor bestemd is.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:4 For verily, when we were with you, we told you before that we should suffer tribulation; even as it came to pass, and ye know.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:4 Want ook toe ons by julle was, het ons julle vooruit gesê dat ons verdruk sou word, soos dit ook gebeur het en soos julle weet.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:5 For this cause, when I could no longer forbear, I sent to know your faith, lest by some means the tempter have tempted you, and our labour be in vain.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:5 Daarom, toe ek dit nie langer kon uithou nie, het ek ook gestuur om julle geloof te wete te kom, of die versoeker julle nie miskien versoek het en ons arbeid tevergeefs sou wees nie.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:6 But now when Timotheus came from you unto us, and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity, and that ye have good remembrance of us always, desiring greatly to see us, as we also [to see] you:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:6 Maar nou dat Timótheüs net van julle af by ons aangekom het en ons die goeie tyding van julle geloof en liefde gebring het, en dat julle altyd ’n goeie herinnering aan ons behou en verlang om ons te sien, net soos ons ook vir julle —

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:7 Therefore, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:7 daarom, broeders, is ons in al ons verdrukking en nood vertroos oor julle deur jul geloof.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:8 For now we live, if ye stand fast in the Lord.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:8 Want nou leef ons, as julle vasstaan in die Here.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:9 For what thanks can we render to God again for you, for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God;
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:9 Want watter dank kan ons God vergelde oor julle vir al die blydskap waarmee ons om julle ontwil ons verbly voor onse God,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:10 Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face, and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith?
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:10 terwyl ons nag en dag baie ernstig bid om julle aangesig te sien en te voltooi wat aan julle geloof ontbreek?

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:11 Now God himself and our Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way unto you.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:11 Maar mag onse God en Vader self en onse Here Jesus Christus ons weg na julle toe rig;

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:12 And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all [men], even as we [do] toward you:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:12 en mag die Here julle ryk en oorvloedig maak in liefde vir mekaar en vir almal, soos ons ook teenoor julle is,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 3:13 To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God, even our Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 3:13 sodat Hy julle harte kan versterk om onberispelik te wees in heiligheid voor onse God en Vader by die wederkoms van onse Here Jesus Christus met al sy heiliges.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:1 Furthermore then we beseech you, brethren, and exhort [you] by the Lord Jesus, that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God, [so] ye would abound more and more.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:1 VERDER dan, broeders, vra en vermaan ons julle in die Here Jesus dat julle, soos julle van ons geleer het hoe julle moet wandel en God behaag, nog oorvloediger mag wees.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:2 For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:2 Want julle weet watter bevele ons julle deur die Here Jesus gegee het.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:3 For this is the will of God, [even] your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:3 Want dit is die wil van God: julle heiligmaking; dat julle jul moet onthou van die hoerery;

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:4 That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour;
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:4 dat elkeen van julle moet weet om sy eie vrou te verkry in heiligheid en eer,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:5 Not in the lust of concupiscence, even as the Gentiles which know not God:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:5 nie in hartstogtelike begeerlikheid soos die heidene wat God nie ken nie;

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:6 That no [man] go beyond and defraud his brother in [any] matter: because that the Lord [is] the avenger of all such, as we also have forewarned you and testified.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:6 dat niemand sy broeder in hierdie saak moet bedrieg en benadeel nie, omdat die Here ’n wreker is oor al hierdie dinge, soos ons aan julle ook vantevore gesê en betuig het.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:7 For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:7 Want God het ons nie tot onreinheid geroep nie, maar tot heiligmaking.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:8 He therefore that despiseth, despiseth not man, but God, who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:8 Daarom, hy wat dit verwerp, verwerp nie ’n mens nie, maar God wat ook sy Heilige Gees aan ons gegee het.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:9 But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:9 Oor die broederliefde het julle nie nodig dat ons julle skrywe nie, want julle is self deur God geleer om mekaar lief te hê;

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:10 And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia: but we beseech you, brethren, that ye increase more and more;
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:10 en julle doen dit ook aan al die broeders in die hele Macedónië; maar ons vermaan julle, broeders, om oorvloediger te wees

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:11 And that ye study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, as we commanded you;
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:11 en julle eer daarin te stel om rustig te lewe en julle eie sake te behartig en met julle eie hande te werk, soos ons julle beveel het,

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:12 That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without, and [that] ye may have lack of nothing.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:12 sodat julle welvoeglik kan wandel teenoor die wat buite is, en aan niks behoefte mag hê nie.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:13 But I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:13 MAAR, broeders, ek wil nie hê dat julle onkundig moet wees met betrekking tot die ontslapenes nie, sodat julle nie treur soos die ander wat geen hoop het nie.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:14 For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:14 Want as ons glo dat Jesus gesterwe en opgestaan het, dan sal God ook so die wat in Jesus ontslaap het, saam met Hom bring.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:15 For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord, that we which are alive [and] remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:15 Want dit sê ons vir julle deur die woord van die Here, dat ons wat in die lewe oorbly tot by die wederkoms van die Here, die ontslapenes hoegenaamd nie sal vóór wees nie.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:16 For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:16 Want die Here self sal van die hemel neerdaal met ’n geroep, met die stem van ’n aartsengel en met geklank van die basuin van God; en die wat in Christus gesterf het, sal eerste opstaan.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:17 Then we which are alive [and] remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
column3: 1 Thessalonicense 4:17 Daarna sal ons wat in die lewe oorbly, saam met hulle in wolke weggevoer word die Here tegemoet in die lug; en so sal ons altyd by die Here wees.

column2: 1 Thessalonians 4:18 Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
